to de rnams kyang dag slong gi gzugs kyis rab tu byung ba bgyis nas phyogs phyogs su btang ste/ lteng rgyas su gshegs so// stong phrag phyed dang gsum gyi cho 'phrul lta zhing lteng rgyas 'od/
srungs la sogs pa'i spun gsum po dang/ ral pa can stong phrag gcig btul ba dag slong gi gzugs kyis rab tu byung bar byas nas ra'i ga ya'i rtse mo na sdod pa rnams la nyi ma'i rnam grangs mdo
sde bstan nas dgra bcom par byas te/ dos dgra bcom pa stong phrag rnams 'khor du byas nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la khas blangs byin pa dgrol bar bya ba'i dgongs pas rgyal po'i khab kyi

grong khyer dang nye ba'i shing dngar gyi tshal du byon no// skyed mos tshal skyong ba rnams kyis ston pa khyon no zhes rgyal po la smras so// rgyal pos thos te/ khri phrag bcu gnyis kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag la khor du

byas nas ston pa dang nye bar song ste/ 'khor lo sna tshogs pa'i steng du gser gyi zla res dang ba dra ba'i 'od zer phyogs phyogs su 'phro zhing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag lagrwa
bar byas nas 'khor dang bcas pa phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas yang bram ze rnams dang khyim bdag la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur te/ 'on kyang dag sbyong chen pos lteng rgyas 'od srungs kyi/
nga sangs kyis dag sbyong chen po' sa tsazhig mthong/ desnyen sngaganangod dri// bud med 'dra phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gang du shing ta la 'dun

rjeg u tshangs par spyod pa spyad dam/ yang na lteng rgyas 'od srungs kyis dag sbyong chen po'i rjes su tshangs par spyod pa spyad ces bsams so// bcom ldan ba das kyis de rnams kyi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis
mkhyagazhas/ gnas brtan la tshigs su bcad pa gsungs so/ lteng rgyas gnas su gnas nas ci zhig mthong// sbyin sreg 'dor ba'i rgyu mtshan ci zhig sgra/ 'od srungs 'di yi don ni dri bar bya// khyod kyiji
lta sbyin sreg sbyong ba yin// gnas brtan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas/ gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin rodang dri// bud med 'dod pa yang na mchog sbyin spyod// 'di rnams dri ma
legs bar rtogs byas nas// de phyir ma yi sbyin sreg 'ad stangasaso// tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod nas rang nyid nyan thos kyi 'dod pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi khol du
mgo bos re gnas/ bdag ston pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin no zhes smras so// shing rta la gcig dang/ shing ta la gnyis dang/ shing tal gsum dang/ ji srid du shing ta la 'dun
gyi tshad tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas babs te/ du bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'i chob phrul blta zhing mi mang po rnams kyis e ma ho sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po
'das kyis kho bos 'did ltar kho na ma yin par lteng rgyas 'od srungs btul la// 'das pa nyid du'u nga 'di ngas btul lo zhes brjod nas don 'di 'das pa na mi sbyin chen po 'od srungs kyi
skyes rabs su bshad pa'i bden pa bzhi po gsal bar bstan no// de'i mod la yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po 'a khor khri phrag bcu gcig dang bcas pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// khri phrag gcig
dag bstan du gyur to// rgyal po ston pa dang nye nga nyid du 'dug stabaslab pa'i gzhi lnga so sor rab tu thos nas skyabs su song ste sang gi gdugs tshod la mgron du gnyer nas/ stan las langs te bcom

ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas song ngo// slar yang sang gi snga dronyid bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang ma mthong ba rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa rnams kyis bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi grangs kyi mi rnams de bzhin

gshegs pa blta bar 'a dod pas snga dro nyidi rgyal po'i khab nus shing dngar gyi tshul du song ste rgyang grags bcu gnyis su mi shong bar shing dar gyi tshal thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par gyur to/ mi thams cad
kyis stobs bcur 'i gzugs mchog thob par 'dod pa bdag nyid kyi sku la blta bas tshim par ma nus so// 'a dilta bu'i sa gzhi'i kha dog yin no// 'di lta bu'i gzugs kyi ' gnas su de bzhin gsheg
pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang bo lasogs pa'i rab tu byed pa thams cad kyang gzugs kyi sku dpal gyi bsngags par bya bar 'os so// 'di ltar gzugs mchog thob pa'i stobs banu pa'i sku blta ba'i

phyir mi mang po rgyun mi 'chad do// sbyad chos tshul dang lam du dug slong gcig gis kyang phyi ru'athon pa'i skabasamed/ nyi ma de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi gdugs tshod yol ba lta bur gyur to// des/
thag bar brgya byin sdod pa'i snyan dro ba'i rnam par mthong ste/ des rnam par brtags so// de'i rgyu mtshan shes nas bram ze'i khyabu'i gzugs su mngon par sprul to/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dag
'dun so so la jiltar rigs pa bstod pa rjod par byed do// stobs bcu pa'i sdun du chas nas lha'i 'khrus lam thob par byas so// 'dul zhing 'dul ba'i grogs sngon bcas// bram ze rnam grol
ral pa dang/ song ga'i gakhrugs kyis 'thon nas ni// bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab nang byon// grol zhing grol ba'i grogs sngon 'acas// bram rnam grol ral pa dang// sang ga'i gzugs kyis
ba thon nas ni// bcom ldan rgyal bo'i khab na byon// brgal zhing brgal ba'i grogs ston bcas// bram ze rnam grol lag pa dang// sang ga'i gzugs kyis bklonanas na// rgyal po'i khab nang
bcom ldan byon// bcu po gsung ba'i stobs bcud// chos bcul mkhas bcu la gnas// stong phrag bcu yi 'a khor dang ldan// bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab nang byon// tshogs su bcad pa 'dis

ni ston pa la bsngags pa sa bstodacing sdun du la gro ba'i mi rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi dpal mthong nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di shin tu gzugs bzang ba'o// slar yang sngar mthong ba med do zhes
bsams nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di gang na gnas ba yin/ gang zhig gi yin zhes smras so// de thos nas bram ze'i khye'us smras pa// gang zhig bstan pa thams cad ba dul// gang
zag zla med sangs rgyas te// dgra bcom bde gshegs ba jig rten du// den bdag na bar gnas// tshigs su bcad pa brjod de/ ston pas brgya byin gyis skabs phye ba'i lam dudag slong stong phrag gcig
'khor du byas nas rgyal po'i khab kyi nang du gshegs so// rgyal pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin pa chen po phul lo// btsun pa bdag dkon mchog gsum spangs nas sdod par mi zhus so//

dus dang dus ma yin par bcom ldan ba das dang nye bar 'o da bar 'dod do// shing dngar can gyi skyed mos tshal shin tu thag ring ngo// slar yang bdag cag gi 'o dma'i tshal zhes bya ba 'di shin tu 'o bas gshegs
ba dang/ 'o nga ba shin tu nye bas sangs rgyas la 'os pa'i gnas lags pas zhes bar zhu/ des gser gyi ral ba spyi blugs la ma tog gi dris bsgos te/ nog bu'i kha dog can gyi nublangs/ 'od/
ma'i tshal yongs su gtong zhing stobs bcu pa'i phyag tu nu bsgrengs nas der kun dga' ra ba bzhes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i gzhi zhes brjod cings gzhi chen po g.yos so// 'dzam bu gling gi nang
nas 'od ma'i tshal spangs pa'i sa gzhi g.yos pa'i di bzhes te/ sde gzhan nimad do// sing g+ha gling gi gtsug lag khang chen po spangs nas sa gzhi g.yos pa 'a de bzhes te/ sde gzhan ni med do// ston

pas 'od ma'i tshal gyi kun dga' ra ba bzhes nas rgyal po la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing stan las bzhengs te/ dag slong gi dge 'duna' khor du byas nas 'od ma'i tshal du byon no// de'i tshe de'i dus na ngur/
bu dang/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu kun tu rgyuganyis bo rgyal bo'i de khab la brten nas gnas shing bdud rtsi chol par soms so// de'i nang nas shA ri'i bus gnas brtan rtathul bsod snyoms la zhugs pa mthong/
bas sems rab tu dngas par gyur te/ bza' ba byin nas chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang zhes pa'i tshigs bcad thos pas/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// rang gi grogs po//

kun tu rlu mo'u 'gal la'i nga tshigs su bcad pa de nyid smras so// des kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// de gnyis kyis kyang rang nyidargyal ba la bltas nas rang gi lo khor dang bcas pa ston pa'i
drung du rab tu byung ngo// de rnams las mo'u 'a gal gyi bu chen po zhag bdun nas dgra bcom pa thob bo// gnas brtan shAri'i bus zla ba phyed nas dgra bcom pa thob pa ste/ de gnyis po'ang ston pa'i
nyan thos kyi mchog tu gnas par gzung ngo// gnas rtan shA ri'i bus dgra bcom pa thob pa'i nyin mo nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi 'dus pa dang por byas so// slar yang de bzhin gshags pa'i

'od ma'i tshal de nyid dubazhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gis bdag gi sras lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas mchog gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub sta/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas rgyal
bor khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal du bzhugs so zhes pa thos nas/ blon bo phan tshun rnams bos te 'dir shog cig/ skyes bu stong phrag gcig gi 'khor khrid de/ rgyal po'i khab tu song/

la pa'i tshig gis khyed kyi yang rgyal po chen po zas gtsang khyad blta bar 'dod ces brjod bas bdag gi sras khrid la shog ces smras so// blon pos kyang lha de bzhin du gyi'o zhes rgyal po'i gsung spyi bos

blangs nas skyes bu stong phrag gcig gi 'khor de khrid de myur ba nyid du dpag tshad drug cu'i lam du song nas/ stobs bcu pa 'khor bzhi'i nang du bzhugs nas chos ston pa'i dus su gtsug lag khang du bzhugs/

so [(]da rgyal pos btang ba'i don re zhig bzhag nas 'khor thams cad kyi mthar 'a khod de ston pa'i chos bstan ba thos nas/ ji ltar 'khod pa nyid bzhin du skyes bu stong phrag gcig dang lhan cig du dgra'acom
pa thob nas rab tu 'byung bar zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun pa rnams 'dir shog ces phyag brkyang ngo// thams cad de nyid du rdzu 'phrul las byung pa'i lhung bzed dang chos gos gsum bzung
nas lo brgya lon pa'i gnas brtan lta bur gyur to// dgra bcom pa thob pa'i dus nas bzung ste/ slar yang 'phags pa zhes bya bar zhig bar mar gnas par gyur to/ rgyal pos btang ba'i spring yig
stobs bcu pa la ma brjod do// rgyal pos btang ba'i ma rnams las gcig kyang ma byung zhing/ sprang yig kyang ma thos so// 'dir shog la khyed song zhig dang de lta bu'i dos pas blon po gzhan gcig

[btang ngo// des song nas ang sngar bzhin du 'khor dang bcas pa dgra bcom pa thob nas cang mi gsung bar gnas so// rgyal pos de lta bur nges pas skyes bu stong phrag re re'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i blon po/

dgu btang ngo// thams cad rang gi don rdzogs par byas nas cang mi skya bar gyur te de nyid du gnas so// rgyal pos sbyong yig tsam gyi lo rgyus kyang mthob bo zhes bsam nas/ mi 'di rnams nga la mi ga'/
ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis spyi yig tsam gyi lo rgyus kyang ma brjod do// su zhig nga'i tshig bzhin byed par soms/ rgyal pos mi thams cad la brtags pas naag po 'char ka mthong ngo// de'i nga rgyal po'i
don tshams cad sgrub par byed pa'i blon po yin// nang ma yin no// shin tu thugs chos pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig la nyin gcig tu skyes pa yin no// de dang lhan cig tu rtse

ba'i grogs po yin no// de nas na borgyal bos bos te/ bunag po'amar ka bdag gi sras blta bar 'dodapas skyes bu stong phragadagu btang ste mi gcig kyang ma 'ongs nas spring yig tsam gyi 'pho rgyus chung
ma byung/ slar yang thams cad nad kyis thebs pa yin nam/ tsho'i bar chad du gyur pa yin nam/ bdag 'tsho ba nyid kyi bar du sras po blta bar 'dod de/ bdag gi bu blta bar nus sam zhis spyas/
so lhanus lags so// gal te rab tu byung yang blta bar nus so// bu khyod rab tu byung ba la ma ma byung yang/ nga sras po blta'o zhes smras so// des lha legs so zhes rgyal po'i gsung blangs nas
bya@#// rgyal po 'a khab tu song ste/ ston pa chos ston pa'i dus su 'khor rnams kyi mthar 'khod de chos thos nas 'khor dang bcas pa dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur te dag slong gi dngos por
so sor gnas so// ston pa sangs rgyas su gyur nas dang po'i lo la drang srong lhung pa'i gnas su dbyar bzhugs te/ dgag dbye byas nas steng rgyus su gshegs shing der zla ba gsum bzhugs te/ ral pa
can spun rnams btul nas dag slong stong phrag gcig gi 'khor dang bcas pa dgun zla 'bring po'i lha la rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs nas zla ba gnyis bzhugs so// de rnams ni grong khyer wA rA Thasi nas
yongs pa 'bar te/ zla ba lnga song zhing dgun gyi dus thams cad ' das so// gnas brtan 'char ka 'ongs nas zhag bdun dang brgyad song ngo// des dpyid zla ra ba'i yul bsams pa/ dgun gyi dus
'das nas dpyid ka'i dus su sleb pa dang/ mi rnams kyis 'bru rnams blangs te/ phyogs phyogs nas lam du byung bas rtswa rnams ljang khur gyur to// sa gzhi dang nags tshol gyi shing la sogs pa ma

rtog shin tumang ba la phye ba ni lam du 'gro ba'i dus so// stobs bcu pa'i nye du dang phud par byed pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i dus yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du nye bar song nas/ btsun pa ljon shing
dan ljang khur gyur// shing ga lo ma sa la dud pa dang// de rnams bar nas bod zer brgyad pa yin// dpa' bo chen po gnyen gnas gshegs pa'i dus// ha cang mi dro mi grang zhing// mu go dang nabacas
03 pa med// sa stangashing rnams ljang khur gyur// thub pa chen po dus 'dir rgyug/ tshigs su bcad pa drug cu tsam gyis stobs bcu pa la rigs kyi grong khyer du gshegs pa'i phyir bsngags par 'os pa'i
bsngags pa rjod pa'o// de nas ston pa la 'char kas dbyangs snyan pos gshogs pa'i bsngags par 'os pa'i bsngags pa gsungs so// btsun pa khyod kyi ab rgyal po zas gtsang blta bar
ba dod pas nye du rnams rjes su 'a yin par zhu/ legs so 'char ka/ nye du rnams rjes su gzung bar bgyi'o zhes dag slong gi dge 'dun la sbos shig/ gshegs pa'i gnas thams cad
la byi dor gyis shig ces smog shig/ btsun pa legs so zhes gnas brtan song nas smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ul oM g+ha dang ma ga tshan gnas ba'i rigs kyi bu rnams stong phrag bcu dang

bcas pa grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i stong phrag bcu po thams cad zag pa zad pa'i dag slong ba 'or du byas nas rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol tu la thon te/ nyi ma re re la dpa/ga tshad re re bgrod cing
rgyal bo'i khab nas dbag tshad drug cu'i grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zla ba gnyis kyis slob bar dgongs shing bul ba' ngam yin/ myur ba'angag yin par 'bring bor gshegs so// gnas brtan gyis
kyang bcom ldan ' das byon no zhes rgyal po'i drung du smra'o zhes bsams nas nam mkha' la song ste rgyal po'i gnas su slob par gyur to// rgyal bos gnas brtan gzigs nas thugs tshim par gyur
taM gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su banug go// rang la byed pa bzhin bcos nas ro sna tshogs pa'i bza' bas lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo// gnas brtan las nas
khagro bar bsams ba dang/ bu bzhugs la gsol cig/ rgyal po chen po ston pa dang nye bar song ste bza' 'o// slar yang bu ston pa ga na yod/ stong phrag nyi shu'i dgu slong 'khor du byas nas

rgyal bo chen po nyid blta ba'i phyir byonano// rgyal po thugs tshim par gyur nas smras pa/ khyod 'di gsol la bdag gi sras grong khyer 'dir ma byon gyi bar la 'a de nyid nas lhung bzed du bza' ba khyed lasong
tsho zhig ces smras so// gnas brtan gyis rgyal po'i gsung can te/ rgyal pos gnas brtan gyis bza' ba gsol zin ba dang lhung bzed bkrus nas dri bzang dol phyams phyugs te/ bza' ba mchog gis
gang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul cig ces smras nas gnas brtan gyi la ga par byin no// gnas brtan mi thams cad kyis mthong ba dang lhung bzed nam mkha' la 'phags so// rang nyid
kyang nam mkha' la gshegs nas bza' ba'i lhung bzed bzud sta/ ston pa'i phyag tu phul nas ston pas kyang der bza' ba la longs spyod do// gnas brtan thabs 'dis nyi ma re re bzhin dubaza' ba phul

wa la ston pas kyang lag gyi bar du rgyal bo nyid kyi gdugs tshod la longs spyod do// gnas brtan gyis kyang gdugs tshod la longs spyod pa'i mthar nyi ma re re bzhin du de ring 'di tsam nas bcom ldan 'ad/

[04 ]byon no// de ring 'di tsam du bcom ldan 'a das byon zhes pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yangudag par ldan pa nyid brjod cing rgyal rigs thams cad ston pa ma mthong ba nyid kyis ston pa'i drung du rang nyid
kyi sems dngas par mdzad do// de'i rgyu mtshon gyis gnas brtan la bcom ldan ' das kyis dug slong dag badrag gi nyan thos kyi nang nas rigs dud par byed pa rnams kyi mchog gang yin n 'a dini
'char ka zhes pa'o// 'di mchog tu baikhrung bas shAkyi pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das rjes su byon pa'i sdun la bdag la bdag cag gi nye du'i gtso bo blta'o zhes 'dus nas/ bcom ldan
'das bzhugs pa'i gnas rtog cing shAkya n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba yid du 'ong ba sta gon byas so// der thams cad nyer bsdogs byas nas spos dang ma tog so so lag tu thogs te/ bsu ba byed

cing rgyan thams cad kyis so sor brgyan na/ pa gzhon nu dang gzhon num grong khyer gyi khye'u dang bu mo sngaradang por btang ba rnams dang/ de nas rgyal po'i gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma dag de rnams kyi
bar rang rang gis sbos dang/ matog dang/ phyi ma la sogs pas mchod pa byung cing/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes nas na gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nyid du byon no// der bcom ldan 'a dus kyis stong
phrag nyi shu'i zag pa zad pa'i dag slong 'khor du byas nas gdan bshams pa nyag la sangs rgyas bzhugs so// shAkya'i rigs ni nga rgyal dang ldan pa yin/ sems rtsub pa yin pas 'di ni don grub gzhon
nu ded dang lhan cig gzhon nu yin no// ded ni phung bo yin no// 'di ni sring mo'i khuyin no// 'di ni tsha bo yin no zhes bsams nas khye'u dang rgyal po gzhon nu zhes smos te/ khyad
kyi phyag gis bdag khyod kyi rgyab tu sdod ngo zhes bsams so// de rnams de bzhin du gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa gzigs nas/ gzhan rnams bdag la phyag mi byed/
par 'dod kyang da lta phyag byed du gzhug dgos te/ mngon par shes pa'i gzhi dang/ yugs dang/ bsam gtan dang ldan par 'jug ba bskyed dgos snyam ste/ bzhengs nas nam mkha' la gshegrwa

sgyu so de rnams kyi mgo la zhabs kyi rdul lhung ba bzhin du a ma bsrung ba'i a mra'i shing gi drung du so so'i cho 'phrul dang mtshungs par cho 'i phrul mdzad do// rgyal bos de'i ya mtshan che ba mthong ngo zhes
smras so// bcom ldan 'das khyod 'khrungs pa'i nyin moraka' thub pa nag po lha len gyis phyag byed cing nye bar gnas pas khyod kyis zhabs bskyod pa bram ze'i spyi bo la nye bar gnas so// de mthong nas
bdag gis kyang khyod la phyag byas so// 'di'i bdag gi phyag dang po yin no// bkra shis pa'i 'bru 'debs pa'i nyin mo 'dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma'i dpal gyi mal stan la khyod bzhugs pa na shing 'a dzag
bu'i grib mas ma btang bar mthong ba'i tsho'ang zhabs la phyag byas so// 'di ni bdag gi phyag gnyis pa yin no// da lta ni bdag gis sngar ma mthong ba'i cho 'a phul yang mthong bas khyed kyi zhabs la
phyag bgyid do// 'di ni bdag gi phyag gsum pa yin no// slar yang rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing/ phyag byed par mi nus pa'i shAkya'i rigs gcig kyang med do// thams cad kyis kyang
phyag byed pa nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la nye du rnams kyis phyag byed cing nam mkha' las babs nas gdan bshams pa'i mchog gi chungal bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas
du rnams dang 'dus par gyur pa 'a thams cad sems gcig tu gnas so// de nas sprin chen po las pad+ma'i 'dab ma la chu mi chags pa lta bu'i mar 'babs so// chu zangs kyi mdog can s la sgra
sgrogs shing 'bab do/ 'bang bar 'dod pa rnams 'bang ngo// kha bang bar mi ba dod pa rnams mi 'a bang ngo// thigs pa tsam yang mi ltung ngo// de mthong nas thams cad du ma tshan pa dang rgyud

du byung ba skyes so// a ma ho ngo mtshar che/ a ma ho rmad du byung ngo zhes rjod par byed do// ston pas 'di khon ma yin gyi/ bdag gi nye du dang phrad pa na pad+ma'i 'dab ma chu mi chags pa lta bu'i ma/
'babs shing 'das pa'i dus su'ang ngas phab bo// 'di'i don byung ba ni thams cad sgrol gyi skye rabs su bshad do// chos bstan pa thos nas thams cad langs te phyag byas nas song ngo// gcig
gis kyang rgyal po dang/ rgyal tshab dang/ blon po rnams sang bdag gi gnas su bsod snyoms khyar 'o nga ngo zhes sma ba song ba de rnams las gcig kyang ma byung ngo// ston pas slar nyim gnyis pa/
[r/ ]@#/// la stong phrag nyi shu'i dag slong 'khor du byas nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir bsod snyoms 'bazhud do// gang zhig mgron du gnyer ba dang/ lhung bzed khyer ba su'ang med do// bcom

ldan 'das sgo drung du 'a khod de rnam par brtags bas ji ltar sdun gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs kyi grong khyer du byon nas bsod snyoms mdzad pa bzhin du gang jiltar rigs par mi chen po'i khyim du 'a gro zhing
ang na go rims bzhin du bsod snyoms spyod ngo// de nas sangs rgyas gcig gis kyang ji ltar rigs par gshegs pa ma mthong bas bdag gis kyang da ni 'a de'i rigs so// 'di sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs
bzhin du bdag gis kyang rigs par gzung bar bya'o// bdag gi nyan thos kyang bdag nyid bzhin rjes su slob cing bsod snyoms su la rdzogs par byon no// 'a khodapa'i khyim nas bzung nas go rims bzhin du
bsod snyoms la spyod do// 'phags pa gzhon nu don grub bsod snyoms la gshegs so zhes brjod do// nyis thog dang sum thog la sogs pa'i khang bzangs rnams su stong gi sgo chung phunas mi thams cad

blta bar gyur te/ lha mo sgra gcan 'dzin gyi yum ang ba phags ba'i bu grong khyer 'di nyid du rgyal po chen po'i mthus gser gyi do la sogs pa la zhon te/ derid nas skra dang kha spu bregs shing ngur smig
gi gos gyon nas snod lag du khyer te bsod snyoms la 'gro ba mdzes sam mi mdzes zhes stong gi sgo chung byanas blta'o// sna tshogs pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dgaper 'bar zhing sku lus/

kyi 'od kyis grong khyer gyi steng thams cadu snang bar mdzad de/ 'dom gang ba'i 'od kun nas bskor zhing rang du gsal ba/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
gnyis kyis brgyan pa// sangs rgyas kyi dpal dpa med bar rnam par gsal ba mthong ngo// gtsug tor nas bzung nas zhabs kyi mthil gyi bar de srid do// dbu skra g.yas 'khyil 'jam nag snum pa/
dang/ dpral ba drimad ma'i mthil bzhin no// skya dang 'tsham pa'i shangs na mtho ba dang// mi yisang ga 'od zer gsal bar mdzad// 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mi'i seng gal tshigs su bcad
bas mngon par bstod do// khyod kyi sras po bsod snyoms la sbyod do zhes rgyal po la smras so// rgyal po'i sams sdug bsngal bas gosanas bzung ste myur zhing myur bar phyir 'thon te/ bcom ldan
bdasakyi drung du 'khod nas smras pa/ ci btsun pa bdag cag ngo tshabs ci'i don du bsod snyoms mdzod/ dag slong 'di rnams kyi bza' ba bdag gis stor bar mi shes bsams pa yin nam calags/
rgyul po chen po'i rigs kyi spyod pa yin no// btsun pa bdag cag shAkya'i rigs zhes bya ba'i rigs so// de la rgyal rigs gcig kyang bsod snyoms byed pa'i mi tsam yang med do// rgyalapo chen po'i
rigs zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi rigs 'di yin no// bka' stsal ba/ rgyal po chen po ni dbyas ba ma mdzad cig/ slar yang bdag cag gi mar me mdzad dang/ ko'u Di nu dang/ 'od srungs zhes bya ba
00 @#// lasangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no// 'di rnams dang gzhan sangs rgyas stong phrag du mas kyang bsod snyoms spyod cing 'tsho bar mdzad l/ srang gi dbus su 'khod pa nyid do// bag/
tshad lhag mar byed pa med// chos la spyod cing legs par spyod// chos la spyad na bad ba ba byung// 'jig rten 'di dang phyi marab d// chos kyi rkang pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'a di bstan cing bshad do/
tshigs su bcad pa'i mthar rgyal pos rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo// chos spyod pa na legs par spyod// nyes bar spyod pa'i bya zhing// chos spyad pa yis bde ba 'byung// 'jig rtena'adi dang pha

blongol chu'o// slar yang chos kyi rkang pa'i tshogs su bcad ng 'di thos nas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob bar gyur to// chos skyong ba'i skyes rabs thob nas phyir mi 'ong gi 'bras bu thob par gyur to//
'chi ba'i dus su gdugs dkar po'i 'og tu dpal gyi mal stan gyi steng du gzims pa nyid na dgra bcom pa thob par gyur to// dgon par gnas nas dka' thub spyod pa rgyal po la dgos pa mad do// rgyun
du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas nas/ slar yang bcom ldanubs kyi lhung bzed bzung ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa khang bzangs chen po'i stang du spyan drangs nas rgya nom pa'i bza' ba dang bca' khaM
rnams drangs so// gdugs tshod zin pa'i mthar sgra gcan 'dzan gyi ma ma gtogs pa'i btsunamo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas so// gzhan yang des/

'a khor gyi mi rnams la 'phags pa'i bu la phyag bgyis zhes brjod nas/ gal te kho mo 'kha yon tan yodan 'phags pa'i bu rang nyid kyi gnas su 'a byon no// byonapa nyidan de la phyag byed do zhes brjod nas
ma 'ongs so// rgyal pos lhung bzad bzung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos mchog gnyis dang bcas pa rgyal po'i bu mo'i khang bzangs su gshegs te/ rgyal po'i bu mo rang nyid ji ltar mos pa'i
phyag byed cing gzhan dang dga' kho cung zad kyang ma byed ces nas/ gdan bshams pa mchog gi gung la bzhugs so// de myur du 'ongs nas byin pa bzung ste/ zhabs kyi stang du mgo bongazhag nas ji
ltar 'dod pa'i phyag byas so// rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu mos bcom ldan 'das la dga' pa mang pos yon tan la sogs pas yon tan dang ldan par brjod nas/ btsun pa bdag gi bu mos nyid kyis
gos ngur smigagyon pa thos nas/ de nas bzung ste deng gi bar du gos ngur smig gyon no// nyid kyis gdugs tshod lan cig gsol ba thos nas bu chos kyang bza' ba lan cig zos so// nyid kyis nyal
stazhu chen po spangs pa thos nas/ nyal khri chung ba la nyal lo// nyid kyis ma tog gi 'brang ba dang spos la sogs pa la srid pa med par thos nas/ ma tog gi 'phreng ba dang spos la sogs pa la
chags med pa skyes so// rang gi nye du rnams bdag gis gso'o zhes 'phrin bskur nas/ gnyen gcig la'ang lta ba mi 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni bdag gi
[©]// thu mo yin no zhes gsol to// rgyal po chen po ma mtshan mi ma'o// bde da lta khyod srung bar byed pa rgyal po'i bu mo chushes yongs su ma smin pa rang gis bsrung ngo// sdur/
bsrungs pa med cing ri la sogs pa la 'gro ba na/ yi shes yongs sum rdzogs ba rang gis srungs so zhes gsungs nas/ mi 'am ci zla ba'i skyes rabs gsungs te/ gdan las bzhengs nas
gshegs so// nyi ma khaganyis pa la rgyal bu gzhon nu dga' bo rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang/ khang ba gsar ba'i nang du zhugs te bkra shis pa'i bag ma blangs nas nye bar gnas go/ de'i khyim
du gshegs nas gzhon nu lhung bzad zung zhig ces rab tu byung bar dgongs nas bgro shis brjod do// gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so// ljongs kyi dag ba'i bu chos ba go ba mthong ngo//
'phags pa'i bu myur du shog ces brjod nas blta'o// nges kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzud de bzung bar ma nus nas gtsug lag khang nyid du gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das de la 'dod pa med
pa nyid kyis rab tu 'byung ba byed do// 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ser skyar gshegs shing nyim gsum pa la dga' bo rab du byung bar byas so// nyin bdun pa la sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mag/

gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du btang ngo// bu stong phrag nyi shu'i dag slong 'a khor dang bcas pa 'a di rnams ltos/ gsor gyi kha dog can gyi tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi mdog can/
dge sbyong 'di ni khyod kyi yab bo// 'di la gter chen po yod cing de 'thon ba nas bzung nas gter mthong ba med do// song la nor slongs shig/ bdag khyed kyi bu gzhon nu yin no// rgyal por dbang
bskur ba thob nas 'a khoralo sgyur ba la dbang byed par 'gyur ro// bdag la nor gyi don du nor stsal du gsol/ yab kyi nor bu bdag yin no zhes gsol cig ces smras pa dang/ gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das/
dang nye bar song ste/ yab kyi drung du dga' ba skyes so// sems spro bar gyur to// dag sbyong de khyod kyi grib ma de dri'o zhes brjod sa/ gzhan yang rang gi rigs pas brjod cing 'khod do// bcom
ldan 'das gdugs tshod kyi mthar rjes su yi rang ba mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegos so// gzhon nus bdag la dag slonganor stsal du gsol/ bdag la dag slonganor stsal du gsol/
bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su 'brangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu phyir log la/ nga'i rjes su ma 'gro zhes pa dang/ rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das dang 'grogasanas
byon te/ ldog par m zhus nas/ gzhon nu bcom ldan ' das dang lhan cig kun dga' ra ba nyid du phyin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsams pa// 'di ab kyi nor 'a dod cing 'jig rten
pa'i nor ni tsho ba dang bcas pa yin/ da ni gzhon nul byang chub snying po des thob pa'i 'phags pa'i nor rnam pa bdun byin na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gyi bdag po byed par 'gyur bar dgos
nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bos te/ de'i phyir na shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin rab tu byung zhes brjod nas rab du byung bar byas so// slar yang rgyal po
[M?/]gzhon nu'i sdug bsngal cher skyes te bsun bar ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas su phyin to/ btsun pa 'phags pa ma dang pha yis rjes su ma gnang ba'i bu rab tu 'byung bar byed pa ma
tsa legs so zhes dam pa bslangs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dam pa byin no// slar khunganyi ma gnyis pa la rgyal po'i gnas su gdugs tshod gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
rgyu rgyal pos btsun pa nyid dka' ba spyod pa'i dus su lha gcig bdag gi drung du nye bar 'ongs nas khyod kyi bu dus las 'das so zhes pas so// 'i tshig la yid ches pa mad cing/ bdag gi
za sras byang chub ma thob bar du dus las 'da' bar mi byed do// de'i tshig bdag gog bkag go zhes brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da lta ji ltar khyod yid ches par byed/
sngar rus pa mthong nas khyed kyi bu shi'o zhes zer ga la yid ches par ma byas so// 'di'i don 'byung ba ni chos skyong ba chen po'i skyes rabs su bshad do// gtam gyi mthar rgyal pos phyiratshe'od
ba'i 'bras bu la gnas so// de ltar bcom ldan ' das kyi yab 'bras bu gsum la so sor gnas nas dge slong gi re 'dun 'khor du byas so// slar yang rgyal bo'i khab tu gshegs nas bsil
ba'i tshal du zhugs so// de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis shing rtalnga brgya'i nor khyer na rgyal po' khab tu rang nyid dga' ba'i grogs kyi khang par song sta/ des sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das byon no zhes ba thos nas shin tu snga bar lha'i mthus sgo phye ste/ ston pa'i drung du nye bar song nas chos thos te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// nyim gnyis pa la sangs
rgyas la sogs pa'i ngag 'dun la sbyin pa chen po phul lo// mnyan yod du gshag pa'i phyir dkon pa'i drung du dam bca' bsrungs nas bar gyi lam dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i gnas su 'dum

lug re re'i nor byin nas dpag tshod re re'i gtsug lag khang byas so// rgyal byed rtsol bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi dbyig gis nyos nas las kha gsar pa byed cing dbus su stobs bcu pa'i dra'i gtsang khang
byed do/ de la bskor ba rnams la gnas brtan chen po brgyad cu'i bzhugs gnas so// chig thog dang/ nyis thog dang/ khang pa ring bo dang/ bsti gnas la sogs pa'i bzhugs
gnas dang/ rdzung bu dang/ 'chag sa dang/ mtshan mo'i bzhugs gnas dang/ nyin mo'i bzhugs gnas so// byakha phrug bco brgyad kyis nor spol to/ yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs/
yid la 'thad pa'i gtsug lag khong byed do// stobs bcu pa byon pa'i phyir du pho nya ba btang sta/ ston pas pho nya ba'i 'phrin gsan nas dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po 'khor du byas to/ rgya la/
po'i khab nas phyir byon te go rims bzhin du grong khyer mnyan yod du byon no// gtso bo chen bong nga gtsug lag khang chen po sta gon byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal byed tshol
du byon pa'i nyin mo bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan no// slar yang brgyan ba nyid kyi gzhon nu lnga brgya dang bcas pa btang ngo// de 'khor dang bcas ba kha dog lnga'i gos yang dag par ' bar ba'i
khaM rgyalamtshan lnga brgya thogs nas stobs bsu pa'i mdun du song bar gyur to// de rnams kyi phyim la legs bzang chen mo dang/ legs bzang mchung ba de bu mo gnyis/ gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang
bcas pa gsar gyis gang pa'i bum pa lag par thogs nas phyir 'thon no// de'i phyim la tshong dpon gyi chung ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud mdalnga brgya dang bcas ba gsar gyis gab
sngarag chen po thogs nas phyir 'thon to// thams cad phyin nas tshong dpon rang nyid gos bzang po gyon no// de bzhin du gos bzang po gyon pa'i tshong dpon lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi
drung du song ngo// bcom ldan ' das kyi 'khor dag bstun 'di rnams mdunadu byas nas/ dag slong gi dga' dun chen po rnams la khod du byas te/ rang nyid kyi sku lus kyi 'od kyis gsar gyi bcud

'i kyi gong bu lta bu dang mtshungs pa dang/ nags tshal gyi bar du snang bar mdzad cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol pa sangs rgyas kyi dbal zla mad cing mtshungs ba yod pa rgyal byed tshal gyi nang du byon/
no de nas ma gon med zas sbyin gyis zhus pa// btsun pa gtsug lag khang 'di ji lta bu la dbul bar bgyi/ khyim bdag gtsug lag khang 'di 'o nga ba dang ba gro ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la
bul cig/ legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes tshong dpon chen pos gser gyi ril ba spyi blugs blangs nas stobs bsu ba'i phyag tu nubasgrungs te/ rgyal byed tshal gyi gtsug lag khang 'di 'gro ba dang 'ong
ba'i phyogs bzhi'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dga' dun la sbyin zhes bul lo// ston pas gtsug lag khang bzhes nas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do// grang dang dro bas mi nyams shing// de ltar ri dgas
la sogs ba'i// sdig sbrul dang ni sbyang bu dang// ba mo dang ni nar bas so// de ltar rlung dang shin tu dro// so soralus la gos pa dang// khanganang gnas nas bde ba skyes// khang par bsam
gtan lhag mthong rnams// dge 'dun gtsug lag khang 'bul ba// sangs rgyas mchog gi bsngags par mdzod// skyes bu mkhas pas de yi phyir// bdag nyid kyin phyir du ni// dga'
bas gtsug lag khang byed pa// mang du thos ba gnas pa yin// de rnams gyi nib bra' dang btung// gos dang mal na stanadang ni// de rnams sems ni drang pos dbul// rab tu dang ba'i sems
kyis so// des ni de la chos bstan to// sdug bsngal thams cad nyer zhi'i phyir// gang de'i chos ni rtogs pa dang// rten med mya ngan 'das par byed// ces bya ba'i gtsug lag khang gi phan yon
bshad do// mgon med zas sbyin gyis nyin gnyis pa nas bzung nas sbyin pa gtong ba'i 'go brtsams so// sa las byas pa'i khang bzangs ni zla ba bzhis grub bo// slar/

lang mgon tshad zis sbyin gyi gtsugalag khang chen bo zla bdagus grub bo// gtsug lag khang chen po la'ang bya ba stong phrag so brgyad nyid song ngo// 'a dil gtsug lag khang chen po 'di nyid la khyo ga
phrag lnga bcu rtsa ba'i nor yongs su btang ngo// slar yang 'das pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzig kyi dus su/ tshong dpon kun gyi grogs zhes bya bas gsar gyi glang po'i rkang pa'i rmig rjes
lta bu'i gagazhi togazhas gnas la de nyid du dbag tshad gcig gi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas so// bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor can gyi dus su/ dpal la phal zhes bya ba'i rong dbon gyi bus
gsar gyi sdor margyanami 'chadapas nyos pa'i sa gzhi'i gnas de nyid du rgyang grags bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam gyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas so// bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyob kyi dus su/
tshong dpon bkra shis zhes bya bas gsar gyi sa gzhi gsar gyi rkang pa'i rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du dbag tshad byed kyi dge 'dun gyikun dga' ra ba byas so// bcom ldan 'das log
maradad sel gyi dus su/ rong dbon 'bo ba med pa zhes bya bas gsar gyi ba gu lta burgyun mi 'chad pa'i sa gzhinyos nas gnas danyid du rgyang grags bzhi'i tshad kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab/
byas so// bcom ldan 'a des gser thub kyi dus su/ rtsod dpon drag po zhes bya bas gsar gyi rus sba2rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyud grags gnyis kyi tshad kyi kun
dga' r ba byas so// bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyi dus su/ rtsod dpon bkra shis bzang bo zhes bya bas gsar gyi ya ku rgyun gyi 'a chad pa lta bu s sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyud grags
gcig gi tshad kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so// slar yang bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi dus su/ tshong dpon mgonamad zos sbyin gyis bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi dbyig gis gsar gyi 'dra enadu byas
pa rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bu s sa gzhi nyos nas gnas nyid du rgyang grags byed kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so// gnas pa de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma sbas pa'i gnas yin no// 'di ltar byung
chub chen bo'i snying po'i drung du thams cad makhyen pa'i ashes thob pa'i ji srid panas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa de srid du gang dang gangagis gnas su bcom ldan 'das bdag
bzhugs pa 'a din na ba'i gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'o// de'i lugs kyis skyes rabs thams cad du bsngags par mdzad do// skyes pa rabs kyi gleng gzhi bshad pa rdzogs so//
paN+Dita Anan+da b+hA'i zhal snga nas dang/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsA bshAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dbalabazang pos/ skad gnyis sna ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal
thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// sa'i stong du nyi zla ltar gyur cig@#// rgya gar skad du/ A NAnA Ti
ya sa tra/ bod skad du/ lcang lo can gyi bo brang gi mdo/ 'phags ba dkona mchog gsum la gus bas phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skadabadag gis thos pa dug gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal

tsha bo'i khabya rgod phung bo'i'i la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal bochen po bzhi bo gnod spyin mang podza sdo dang/ dri za mang po'i sde dang/ grul bum gyi sde mang po dang/ klu'i sde mang po rnams phyogs bzhi/
bsrung zhing gnas go/ phyogs bzhir tshan tshan du gnas so// phyogs bzhi skyong zhing gnas so// mtshan mo 'ongs te kha dog sna tshogs pa can gyis bya rgodaphung bo'i ri 'ba' zhig snang bar byas te/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song zhing song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig cur khod do// gnod sbyin de rnams las kyang gang la las bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs
! gcig tu 'khod do// gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyan gsol te bsnyan gsol nas/ ji ltar snying bo dang snying po mad pa'i gtam 'dri zhing phyogs gcig du 'khod do// gangasu dag gis
bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gang su dag gis ming dang rigs dpyod cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gang su dag cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig
tub khod do// phyogs gcig dub khod nas denas rgyal po chen bo ma thos kyi lus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gnodasbyin m rungs pa gongal la zhig bcog ldan la dus lam dad par gyur to//
gnod sbyin m rungs pa gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das la dad pa gyur to// gnod sbyin 'bring bo gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin ' khring po gang lal/
zhig btsun pa bcom ldan pa dus la dad bar gyur to// gnod sbyin daman ba gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin dman gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
[']la dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin gangal la zhig btsun ba bcom ldanub das lam dad par gyur ba'i rgyu gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis srog gcod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang/ ma byin

par len kha spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang/ bdodapa log par spyod pa song ba'i chos bstan pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba sbyong ba'i chos bstan pa dang/ myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba song ba'i chos bstan
ba mdzad la/ gnod spyin gang de rnams srog gcod pa sbyong ba la mi dga' ba'agyur pa dang/ ma byin par len ba sbyong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang 'dod ba log par sbyod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar
gyur pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba stong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang/ myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pas/ de rnams la mi dga' zhing mi 'dod bar gyur to//
@#// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos ji snyed yod pa rnams 'brog dgon pa'i lam du zhugs nas nyal ba dang 'dug pa la bstan to// sgrachod cing dbyangs ched pa'i dabanapar gnas/
shing 'du 'dzi'i 'tsho ba yod do// so sor dag sbyong rnams 'thun bar gnas so// de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams kyi gnas yod do// gang zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la ma dad
ba'i bar gyur to/ de rnams dad bar bya ba'i phyir btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya ste/ lcangalo can gyi bo brang gis bsrung du gsol/ dge slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dag bsnyan nam/
dgo bsAn ma rnams la bsrung ba dang/ smra ba dang/ 'tshub yod pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lags bar gnas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung ba'i tshul gyis gnang ngo// de nas rgyal po
chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba shes te/ de'i mo 'a di ltar lcang lo can gyi kho brang gis srungs shig ces gsol to// sbyanaldan dang la dang ldan pa yi// rnam par gzigs la
phyag 'tshal lo// 'byung bo rnams labartsi ba yi// gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon med rnams la gdung ba yi// thams cad skyol phyag 'tshal lo// bdud kyi sde rnams 'a tshogs
ba mi 'khor ba 'jig la phyag 'tshol la// bram ze dpal dang ldan pa yi// gser sgrub la ni phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnam grol mdzad pa yis// 'od srungs lani phyag 'tshal lo//
sras ni dpal dang ldan// nyi ma'i rgyud la phyag 'tshal// sdug bsngal kun las grol mdzad pa// gang zhig chos ni rab ston mdzad// gang yang ' jig rtan par gyur ba// ji lta ba bzhin gzigs
gyur ba// da rnams la ni phra ma med// ba jigs pa med pa chon po go/ gang zhig go'u ta ma phyag byed pa// lha dang mi la phan pa yin// rig pa dang ni zhabs su ljon// 'jigs pa gad pa chen po
sto/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen pon// gang zhig du ni nub cing 'char// gang dunyi ma nubu gyur pa// de ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba yin// gang du nyi ma shar gyur pa// don nyin mo zhes brjod do//
gtingani zab pa'i rgya mtsho ya// dani chu yi bcud bzung ngo// de ltar derani skyes gyur pagi/ rgya mtsho'i muyi bcud bzhin no// 'dir ni shar gyi phyogs kyi ni// skya bo rnams la 'di brjod do// de
mi phyogs ni kun skyong ba'i// rgyal bonon bo grags chen ldan// dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste// ming ni rgyal bo yul 'khor skyong// dri za ba khor dang bcas pani// glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed
de yi bun mang po rnams// ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// da ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang// nyi ma'i gnyan gyi sangs rgyas ni//
'jigs dang bral ba chen po la// thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o// skyes bu cangamakhyen khyod phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshol lo// dgab rtag tu gsung ba la// mi ma yin rnams khyod
phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'di ni shan pa'o// de phyir de ltar 'a di brjod de// smyul ba go'u tam phyag gyis shig/ rgyal ba go'u tam phyag bgyid do// rig pa dang na zhabs su/
ldan sangs rgyas go'u tam phyag 'tshal// gang yang yi dgas rjod byed ba// phra la rgyab kyi sha can dang// srog gcod pa la chags pa dang// skye bo ma lus ba joms pa'o// ba der
sa phyogs gnag pa'i// skya bo rnams la 'di skad brjod// de yi gnas ni yongs skyong ba// rgyal po chen po grags ldan pa// grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes bo
zhes bya// grul bum 'khor dang bcas pa ni// glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed// de yi bu ni mang po rnams// mingan gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang bo zhus bya stobs dang ldan// don dgu bcu
rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang// nyame'i rgyud kyi sangs rgyas ni// 'jigs dang bral ba chen po la// thag ring nas na phyag bgyi'o// skyes bu cang mkhyen khyod phyag 'tshal//
skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dag ba rtag tu gsung ba'i// mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'a di'i nyin pa 'o// de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de// rgyal ba go'u tam phyag gyis shag
rgyal ba go'u tas phyag bgyid do// rig pa dang ni zha bas suldan// sangs rgyas go'u tas phyag 'tshal// nyima'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni// gang nas gang du shar gyur pa// dar ninyin mor 'a gyur ba ste/
nyin mo zhes ni brjod pa yin// gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa// de ni mtshan mor rjod par byed// gtingani ba pa'i rgya mtsho yi// de yi 'khacud bzang ngo// de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i// rgya mtsho'i
yi bcud bzhin no// 'dir ni nub kyi phyogs kyi// skye bo rnams la 'a di brjod do// de yi phyogs ni kun skyong ba// rgyal botshanabo grags chen ldan// klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste// 'di yi ming/
ni mig mi bzang// klu yi 'khor dang bcas pa ni// glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed// de yi bu ni mang bo rnams// ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// de ni dgu/
bsu rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang// nyima'i gnyen gyisangs rgyas ni// 'jigs dang bral ba chen po la// thag ring nas nii phyag bgyi 'o// skyes bu cang mkhyan khyod phyag 'tshal//
skyes bu mchog khyod phyag tshal lo// dag pa rtag tu gsung ba la// mi ga in rnams khyod phyag 'tshal// rtag tu'ang ni nyan pa'o// de phyir de ltar 'di brjod do// rgyalab go ta ma phyag gyis/
shig rgyal ba go'u tas phyag bgyid do// ga pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// sangs rgyus go'u tam phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig byang phyogs sgra mi snyan// lhun po blta na sdug ri dga'// dar skyas
pa yi mi rnams ni// bdag gir yongs su bzung ba med// de rnams sa bon 'debs pa med// rmob mang nimad pa yin// dka' sbyad med par 'bras smin zhing// mi rnams yongs su longs spyod do//
[s p]// sbyanamadu ma grugs shin tu drag/ dri bzang 'bras na ba bras bur ldan// 'bras kyi 'o ma la latshod cing// dubazhin bcos nas longs spyod do// lang rkang gcig lazhon nus//
tshul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// rkang ba gcig pa'i phyugs zhon nas// yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// bud med kyin bzhon pa la// zhon nas tshul dang phyogs su 'gro// skyes pa'i
bzhon pa la zhon nas// ul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// gzhon nu ma li bzhon pa la// zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro// gzhon nu'i bzhon pa la zhon nas// yul dang phyogs su
'gro bar byed// bzhon pa de rnams la zhon nas// phyogs kun tu ni rjes su 'gro// gtso bo rgyulapo khyad med do// glang chen bzhon dang rta yi bzhon// lha yi bzhon ba la gnas nas// kha
bzas dang ni phyogs dang ni// rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan// do'i yang grub pa'i grong khyer ni// drimad par snangal gnas pa// lcang lo can dang ku sha'i grong// tha rol ku sha'i grong dang ni//
na tsha'i grong dang pha rol gyi/ dku shi ta yi grongayin no// byang gi phyogasan thams cad rgyas// skye bo'i tshogs pa mang po gnas// dgu bcu rtsa dgu grong mkha' la// rgyal po'i pho brang lcang
lo can// slar yang drang srong na po dang// rgyal po chen po lus ngan po// TIs zhes pa rgyal po'i pho brang ngo// de'i phyir rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang lus ngan bo zhes brjod do// so sor
rab tu gsal zhing zhi ba dang/ de dang der ni de dang demadangs dang/ de'i gzi brjid dang/ dbal zhing stobs dang ldan ba'i rgyal po stobs dang ldanuba'i ming ngo// sa gzhi dang ni bcud ldan no//
gnas der sprin rnams r ba babs par byed do// de ni b+ha ga la ba tI zhes pa'i rdzing ba'o// gang du gnod sbyin tshogs dang lhan cig tu gnas so// der ni rtag tu shing gi 'bras// sna tshogs bya rnams
lhan cig gnas// rnabya khrung khrung sgra sgrogs shing// khu byug rnams ni tshanatshan gnas// shangashang te bu sgra sgrogs shing// de nas angani ngur pa dang// gong mo nags kyi bya gagani// nags kyi
rdzing bur gnas pa'o// ne tsor skogs de sgra 'byin// dats+tshamA Nabya dkar ni// dus kun tunimadzes par byed// lus ngan rgyal bo'i rdzing rtagamadzes// 'din byang gi phyogs kyi yul// skye bo rnams
ni ba de bzhin brjod// de yi phyogs na yongs skyong ba'i// rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan// gnod sbyin rnasas kyi bdag po ste// 'a de yi ming ni lus na/ gnod spyin la khor dang bcas pa ni//
glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed// de yi bu ni mang po rnams// ming zhi gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// don dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang/
nyoma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas na// 'jigs dang bral ba chen po bo// thagari nas ni phyag bgyi 'o// skyes bu camakhyen khyod phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshalal// dag kha rtag
dugasug la// mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'di ninyan pa'o// de phyir de lta'adi brjod de// rgyal ba go'u tam phyag gyis shig rgyal pa go'u tas phyag
bgyid do/ rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// sangs rgyas go'atan phyag 'tshal lo// 'dirani drang srong chen pos lcang 'do can gyi kho brang dang bcas pas srungs shig dadag slong ngam/ dag slongs/
'tshe bam dag bsnyen nam/ dag bsnyan s rnams la khasung ba dang/ sra ba dang/ 'tsho ba med ba dang/ bde ba dang/ legs bar gnas so// drang srong chen bo gang su dag ngag slong dang bcas pa 'a'/
dag slong ma dang bcas kha 'am/ dag bsnyen dang bcas ba 'am/ ngag bsnyonam dang bcas pa rnams la/ 'dir lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis de bsrung ba dang/ yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad yid l
zung zhig/ de'i yang mi ma yin rnams so// gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu tho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod spyin gyi blon po chen po 'a na/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor
ma 4 gnodasbyin g.yog 'khor rag/ dri za tho 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri bra'i bu bo 'am/ dri za'i bu mo ga/ driwa'i blon po chen po 'am/ dri za'i 'a khor ra// dri ta'i g.yogal khor ram/
grul bus pho ma/ grul bug mo 'am/ grul bum gyi du bo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo ba ma/ grul bum gyi blon po chen po'am/ grul bum gyi 'a khor ram/ grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/
klu bo ga/ klu mo 'tsha/ klu'i bu po' ma/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i blon po r-in ngo ma/ klu la/khor ram/ klu'i g.yog 'khor ram/ rab tu sdudaba'i sems kyis 'a gro 'ag/ lta
rjes su 'gro ba mA/ rjes su 'gro ba dang/ stong pa ga tu song [']dang/ gnas pa dang/ lhan cig tu gnas ba dang/ nyal ba dang/ lhan cig tu nyal kha rnams ni/ drang srong chen
po 'di rnams ni ma yin zhes bya'o// grongs/ thong rgas/ lan pakur stir byed pa 'a ma/ bsti stang du byed pa 'a drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams kyis de thob pa ma yin no// rgyal po'i bro
brang lcang lo can zhes bya ba la gzhi 'a chu gnas sa re da do// dung srong chen po la rin rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams kyis lhan cig tu gnas pab dmi thob bo// drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi
ma yin rnams kyis pa ka/ 2 pa sa rna cha ras kyis bdag 'a pan pa rdzogs pa dang/ pha rol la spyod ba dang/ rtsod pa dang/ drang srong chen po
gzhan mang mi ma yin rnams la snod mar rab tu'o bar ba mgo la bkon pa dang/ drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyi mgo bo tshal ba bdun du gshag par byed do// drang srong chen po
gzhan yang min na na gtum pa dang/ drug pa dang/ co ga'o// de rnams kyis 'di ltar rgyal po chen po la rjod par byed do// rgyal po chen po la brjod mnusan skyes bu la sogs pa la rjod
par byed do// rgyal bo'i skyes bu la brjod par mazhusan/ de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu rnams la brjod pa byago/ drad srongamanabo de'i nga i ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po na 'gal ba

sgruba'o// drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ ma ga d+ha'i yul gyi rgyal bo la chom rkun byungan de ma thag tu rgyal po la rjod par byed do// rgyal po la brjod par ma nus na/ rgyal bo'i skyes bu la rjod par

tsha khyod do// skyes bu la brjod par zhus na 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed pa bzhin no// drang srong chen po de yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po la chos rgyun gyis gnod pa byed ba'i rjod do// drang srong chen po
ba di lta bu 'o zhim yin yod pa rnams gam pa dang/ drag ba dang/ khro ba'o// dem thag tu rgyal po chen po rnams la rjod par byed do// rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus rgyal po'i skyes bu la
rjod par byed do// skyas dul brjod pa'i m nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do// drang srong chen podi ni mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po rnams la dga' bar rjod par byed do// drang srod
chen pomam yin gang zhig gnod sbyin tho 'am/ gnod spyin mo lag/ gnod spyin gyi bu 'am/ gnod spyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi blonapo chen po' ma/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram
gnod sbyin gyi g.yoga' khor ram/ dri za tho 'am/ dra ba mo 'a ma/ dri bra'i bu tho 'am/ dri za'i bu mo ba ma/ dri bra'i na po chen bo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor ram/ driza'i g.yog 'khor
0ram/ grul bum go la na/ grul bum go 'am/ grul bun gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo ma/ grul bum gyi blon po chen po 'an/ grul bum gyi 'khor ram/ gru'adug
gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ klu pho ma/ klumo bam klu'i bu pho 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i blon po chen po'am/ klu'i 'khor ram/ klu'i g.yog 'khor na/ rab tu
sdang ba'i sems kyis dbang slo ngan/ dag slong ma 'am/ dgabasnyan nam/ dag bsAnaka rnams 'gro ba'am/ rjes su 'gro bab ga/ rjes su 'gro ba dad/ sdod pa dang//
lhan gacig tu sdod pa dang/ gnas pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang/ gnus pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa dang/ nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba dang/ 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams
dang gnod sbyin chen po rnams drang/ sde dpon rnams dang/ sde dpon chun po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang/ dar sgrogs par byed pa dang/ sgra cher sgrogs bar byed pa'o// 'dir
gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dres tshe 'phrog par byed da dang/ gnod sbyin 'dis 'tsho bar byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'di rnam par mtho 'tshal bar byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'di
gnod par byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'di rnam par gnod par byed ba dang/ gnod sbyin 'di na mi gtong bar byed do// gnod sbyin rnams dad/ gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang/ sde dpon
nams dang/ sde dpon chen po rnams gang zhin/ dbang po zla ba nubla dang// b+hA ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag/ tsan+dan dngaNo d mchog dang/ mgul ba mdzes dang mgul nges dang/

skye dgu'i bla mar gyur ba dang// lha las byung ba'i kha lo ba// dri zasna tshogs sde dang ni// mi rgyal rgyal ba khyunachog dang// de bzhin ri dang gangs can dang// gang ba smin drug phug dang ni// 'tsho
ba dang ni ba tang bzung dang// sna tshogs bshes gnyen gnya' shing 'a yin// sa skyong rab du rtogs ba dang// ngo tsha mig dang khang pa dang// lnga 'dren gtum po Alab ka/ srid sgrub yid bzang bzhin/
bzang dang// ko gdong nor bu nor bu spyod// de bzhin dbang phyug dang bcas so// 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang/ sde dpon rnams rang/ sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang/
nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang/ sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o// 'dir gnod spyin gyis bzung nas/ gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'dis 'tsho bar byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin
'dis rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'a di gnod par byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'di rnam par gnod par byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do// drang srong nan po/
'dis ni lcang can gyi bo brang gis srungs shig/ dag slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dag pasnyan dang/ dag bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang/ sba ba dang/ 'tshob med pa dang/ bde ba dang/
legs ba'i gnas so// drang srong chen po ning dag cag rnams 'gro bar bgyi'o// bdag cag rnams ni bya ba mang ba dang byed pa mang bas so// bcog ldan ba das kyis bka' stsal// rgyal po chen
bo byed rnams dazhi ba gro bar gyis shig/ de nas rgyal bo chen po bzhi bo rnams langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas der mi snang bar gyur to// gnod sbyin de rnams kyang lags
nas gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang par gyur to// gang su dag gis bcon ldan 'das la bsnyun gsol te/ bsnyun gsol nas/ snying bo tshod/
ba ji ltar zhes zhus bde rnams de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// gang sudag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar zhus de nyid du mi snang bor gyur to// gang la la zhig gis ming dang rigs
rnam par dpyadanas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// gang la la zhig cang mi smabar gyur te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo las skabs rab mchog dang po go
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mtshan mo 'das nas/ dge slong rnams bos nas/ dag slong dag 'di'i mtshan mo rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
rnams dang/ driza'i sde mang po dang/ grul bum gyi sde mang po dang/ klu'i sde mang po dang/ phyogs bzhi bsrung zhing gnas so// phyogs bzhir tshan tshun du gnas so// phyogs bzhi skyong zhing
gnas so// mtshan mo 'ongs te kha dog sna tshogs pa nan gyis bya rgod phung bo'i 'bab zhig snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste song nas po la phyag byas nas//
phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// dag slong dag dang/ gnod spyin da rnams gda' zhig gis nga la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gang su dag gis da la bsunagasol te/ bsnyun gso'anas/

ltar snying po dad snying bo med pa'i gtam 'a dri zhing phyogs gcig tu 'a chod do// gang su dag gis da 'a bralamo sbyar nas phyogs gcig du ba khod do// gang su dag gis ming dang rigs dbyod cing phyogs gcig
tul bod do// gang su dag cang mi sna bar phyogs gcig tu 'a khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'a khod nas dag slong dag dang rgyalapo chen po rnam thos kyi bus nga la 'di skad ces gsol nas// gnod sbyin m rungs
ba yod ba rnams btsun ba bcom ldan 'das lam dad par gyur to// gnod spyin ma rungs ba gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin 'bring bo gad la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan
'das la ma dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin 'bring bo gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'dad bar gyur to// gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'o das la ma dad par gyur to//
gnod sbyin dman ba gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to// gnod sbyin gang 'tshal zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'dasal ma dad par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan
'das kyis srog gcod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang/ ma byin par len pa spong pa'i chos bstan pa dang/ 'a dod pa log par sbyod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang/ brdzun du sgrub slong ba'i chos
bstan pa dang/ rgyus par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba song ba'i chos bstan bas so// gnod sbyin gang de rnams brtun pas srog gcod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang/ ma byin par len pa/
sbyong da 'gri dga' bar gyur ba dang/ 'dod pas log par sbyod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur ba dang/ brdzun du smra ba stong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang/ chos bar 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba
spong bar mi dga' bar gyur pas so// de rnams la mi dga' zhing ma 'a dod par gyur to// btsunapa bcom ldan 'das nyanathos ji snyed yod pa rnams 'brog dgon pa'i lam du zhugs nas
nyal gdong/ 'dug pa dang/ brten to// sku mad cing dbyangs med par dbanapar gnas shing 'adu' 'i 'tsho ba yod do// so sor dag sbyong rnams 'thun cing gnas so// de na gnod sbyin ma rungs
ba rnams kyi gnas yod do// gang zhig bcos ldan ba das kyi gsung rab la ma dad par gyur te/ de rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir btsun ba bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya ste/ lcangalo can gyi pho brang gis
bsrung dugasol/ dge slong dam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nas/ dgo bsnyenam rnams 'du bsrung ba dang/ snab dang/ 'tsho ba med pa dang/ bde ba dang/ legs par gnas so//
dag slong rnams la bdag cag gis cang mi gsung pa'i tshul gyis gnang ba byin no// de nas rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi dus gnang ba byin pa shes te/ de 'di ltar lcang lo can gyi
[） bo brang gis srungs shig ces gsol to// sbyan ldan dpal dang ldan pa yi// rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams la brtse ba yi// gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// mgon
tsho med namasal gdung pa yi// thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa yi// 'khor ba 'jig la thug 'tshal lo// thug dpal dang ldan pa yi/ gser thub la ni phyag
batshal lo// sags can rnam grol mdzad pa yi// 'od srungs la ni phyag 'tshal// shAkya'i sras ni dpal dang ldan// nyi ma'i rgyud la phyag 'tshol lo// sdug bsngal kun las grol mdzad pa/
gang zhig chos ni rab ston mdzad// gang yang 'jig rtan par gyur pa// ji ltar bzhin gzigs gyur pa'i// de rnams ni phrag mad// 'jigs pa medadra chen po ni// gang zhig go'u/
dmajug byed pa// lha dang mi la phan pa yin// rig pa dang zhabs su ldan// 'jigs pa mdab chen po ste// nyama'i dkyil 'khor nabon// gang zhig du ni nub cing 'char// gang du nyika
nub gyur ba// der ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba yin// gang dunyi ma shar gyur pa'i// der ni nyin mo zhes brjod do// gting nizab ba'i rgya mtsho yi// de yi muyi bcud bzang ngo// de ltar dor ni skyes gyur
0 ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu lu bcud bzhin no// 'dir ni shar gyi phyogs kyi ni// skye bo rnams la 'a de brjod do// de yi phyogasani yo ras skyong ba'i// rgyal bo chen po grags chen ldan// dri za rnams
kyi bdag po ste// ming ni rgyal po yul 'a khor skyong// dri za 'a khor dang bcas pa no// klu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed// de yi bu ni mang po rnams// ming ni gcig tu bros ba ste// dbang po zhes bya
stobs dang ldan// nga'i dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang/ nyin gnyan gyi sangs rgyus ni// 'jigs dang bral pa chen po la// thag ring nas ni phyag bgyig/ skyes bu
tsangamakhyen khyod phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dag ba rtag tu gsung ba la// mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'di'i nyan ba 'o// de phyir de ltar 'debarjod do//
rgyal ba go'u tam thugagyis ga/ rgyalab go'u tam thug bgyid do// rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// rgyal ba go'u tam phyag 'tshal lo// gang yang yi dgas rjod byed pa// bram rgyab kyi sha can dang/
srog gcod pa la chags pa dang// skye bo ma lus 'a joms pa// 'dar ni lho yi phyogs gnas pa'i// skya bo rnams la 'di skad brjod// de yi gnas ni yongs skyong ba/ rgyal bo chen po grags ldan/
ba grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste// ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya// cu'abum 'a khor dang bcas ba ni// glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed// de yi bu ni mang bo rnams// ming ni gcig tu
khur+ya// thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang// nyi ma'i rgyud kyi sangs rgyas ni// 'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/
thag ring nasazhi phyag bgyi 'o// skyes bu ngamakhyen khyod phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dag pa rtag tu gsung ba la// mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'di ni nyan
mtsho pa 'o de phyir de ltaga'adi brjod do// rgyal ba go'u tam thugagyis shig/ rgyal ba go'u tam thug bgyid do// rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// sangs rgyas go'u tam phyag 'tshal lo// zhima'i dkyil

ts+tsaM 'khoratshanubo no// gang nas gang du shar gyur ba// der ninyin mor gyur pa ste// nyin mo zhes ni brjod pa yin// gang dunyi ma nub gyur pa// de ni mtshan mor rjod par byed// gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho/

yi du yi chu yi bcud bzang ngo// de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i// rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no// 'dir ni nub kyi phyogs kyi ni// skye bo rnams la 'di brjod de// de rigs phyogs ni kun skyong ba'i// rgyal
pochen po grags chen ldan// klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste// 'di yi mngon mig mi bzang// glu yi 'khor dang bcas pa na// glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed// de yi bu ni na nga bo rnams// ming ni gcig tu

thos ba ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang// nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni// 'jigs dang bral ba chen po la// thagaring nas ni phub/

[d ]bgyid do// skyes bu cang mkhyen khyod phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dag ba rtag tu gsung ba la// mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o// de phyir de ltar 'di

brjod d// rgyal ba go'u tam phyag gyis shig/ rgyal ba go'u tas phyag bgyid do// rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan// sangs rgyas go'u tas phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig byang phyogs sgra mi snyan/ lhun bo blta
na sdugari dgag/ der skyes pa yi mi rnams ni// bdag gi yongs su bzung ba med// de rnams sa bon 'debs pa mad// rmob yang ni yod pa yin// dka' spyad med pa 'bras smin nas/ mi rnams
mos su longs spyod da// spun tshad ma thugs shin tu dag/ dribazad 'bras ni 'bras bur ldan// khrus kyi 'o ma 'a 'tshod cing// de bzhin btsos nas langs spyod do// ba lang rkang gcig la zhonanas/
tshul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// rkang pa gcig pa'i phyugs zhon nas// yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// bud med kyin bzhon pa'i// zhonanas tshul dang phyogs su 'gro// skyes pa'i bzhon ral
zhon nas/ yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed// gzhon num yi bzhon pa la/ gzhon nus yul dang phyogs su bgro// gzhon nu'i bzhon pa la zhon nas// ul dang phyogs su ba gro bar byed// bzhon pa
do rnams la zhon nas// phyogs kun tu ni rjes su 'gro// gtso bo rgyal po khyad med do// glang chen bzhon dang rta yi bzhon/ lha yi bzhon pa la gnas nas// khang bzang dang ni khyogs rnalas na// rgyal
0 @#// po chen drogrags chen ldan// de yang grub pa'i grong khyerani// dri ma da bar snad la gnas pa// lcang can dang ku sha'i grong// pha rol ku sha'i grong dang ni// na Ta'i/
grong dang pha rol gyi// ku shi ta yi grong yin no/ byang gi phyogs na thams cad rgyas// skye bo'i tshogs pa mang po gnas// dgu bcu rtsa dgu grong mkha' la// rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can// slar

yang drang srong chen po dang// rgyal po chen po lus ngan po// lcog ldan zhes pa rgyal po chen po'i pho brang ngo// de'i phyir rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang lus ngan po zhes brjod do// so sor rab tu
gsal zhing zhi ba dang// de dang der ni de dang de madras dang/ de'i gzi brjid dad/ dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal po stobs dang ldan pa'i ming ngo// sa gzhi yang ni ba cud ldan no// gnas
der sbyin rnams char 'babs par byed do// der ni b+ha ga la ba ti zhes pa'i rdzing bu'o// gang du gnod sbyin tshogs dang lhan cig tu gnas so// der ni rtag tu shing gi 'brus// sna tshogs bya rnams lhan
cig gnas// mo bya khrung khrung sgra sgrogs shing// khu byug rnams ni tshan tshana gnas // shangashang te lu sgra sgrogs shing// de nas yang ningur pa dang/ dgong mo nags kyi bya gag rnams/ nags
kyi rdzing bur gnas pa 'o// datso ri sogs de sgron// daN+DamA na bya dkar dang// dus kun tu ni mdzas par byed// lus ngan rgyal po' rjeng rtag mdzes// 'di ni byang gi phyogs kyi yul// skye bo
[c/ ] rnams ni 'a de bzhin brjod// de yi phyogs ni yongs skyong ba'i// rgyal po chen po grugs dad ldan/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste// 'di yi ming ni lus ngan po// gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa
ni glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed// nga yi bu ni nang 7da rnams// ming na kacig tu sbos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan// de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba/
dang nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni// 'jigs dang dra la 2 chen por// thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o// skyes bu cang mkhyen khyod phyag 'tshal// skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// dag
ba rtag tu gsung ba la// mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal// rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa kho// de phyir de ltar 'di brjod do// rgyal pa go'u tam phyag gyis shig/ rgyal ba go'u tas phyag bgyid
[K/ .]rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ ]5ngas rgyas bo// phyaga'atsho blo// der ni drang srong chen pos lcang lo can dang bcas bas srungs shig/ dag slong ngam/ dug slong ma lam/ dge
bstun nam/ dag bsAn ma rnams la bsrung pa dang/ sba ba dang/ 'tshob med pa dang/ bad ngadang/ legs par gnas so// drang srong chen po gang su dag dag slong dang bcas bam/
dag slong ma dang bcas pa 'am/ dag pa snyan dang gon/ wa ga/ dka ba sa na ma dang bcas pa rnams dang/ 'dir ni lcaN na gyi lo brangagis de bsrung ba dang/ yongs su rdzogs ba thams
bya@#// cad yongs su zung zhig/ de'ang mi ma yin rnams so// gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'a ma/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin
]spyi blon bo tshan bo ma/ gnod sbyin gyi 'a khor na/ gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ dri za tho 'am/ dri za mo 'am/ dri bra'i bu pho ma/ dri za'i bu mo 'a ma/ dri za'i blon po
bo bam/ dri za'i 'khor ram/ driza'i g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum pho lam/ grul bus mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi na po
[@ ]rmanabo 'am/ grul bun kyi 'khor ram/ grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ klu lo 'a ma/ klu mo 'am/ klu'i bupho lam/ chu'i bu mo la ma/ ku'i blon po chen po 'am/ klu'i
khor ram/ klu'i g.yog 'khor rnams rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'gro ba 'am/ rjes su 'gro ba 'os/ rjes su 'i gro ba dang sdod pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang/ gnas pa dang lhan cig tu
gnas pa dang/ nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba rnams la/ drang srongachen po 'di rnams ni mi ma yin rnams zhes bya'o// grong dam/ grong rdal lam/ bkur stir byed pa ma/ bsti stang du
byed pa rnams/ drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams kyis de thob pa ma yin no// rgyal bo chen po'i pho brang lcangalo can zhes bya ba gzhi 'am gnas sa med do// drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams kyis

[z/ ]gnod sbyin dang lhan cig tu gnas par da ma 'a thob bo// drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis bka 'a mnyan par bya'o// drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis bdag la ban
ba rdzogs pa dang/ pha rol la rtsod pa dang/ rtsod pa dang/ drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams la snod zer rab tu 'bar ba mgo la bskon pa dang/ drang srong chen po gzhan yang yin
in rnams kyi mgo kho tshal pa bdun gshog par byed do// drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin pa ni gtum pa dang/ drag pa dang/ khro bgo/ de rnams kyi 'a di ltar rgyal po chen po la
brjod do// rgyal bo chen po la brjod par ma nus na skyes bu la sogs pa la rjod par byed do// rgyal pochen po'i skyes bu la brjod bar ma nus na/ de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la brjod par bya'o//
drang srong chen po de'ang mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po la 'gal ba sa bgo/ drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ ma ga lho'i yul gyi rgyal po la chom rkun byung na/ dam thag tu rgyal bo la rjod par

byed do// rgyal po la brjod par mazhus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do// skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed babazhinano// drang srong chen po de'ang ma ga d+ha'i
rgyal dol chom skun gyis gnod pa khyod par brjod do// drang srong chen po pa lta bu'i mi ma yin yod pa rnams gtum pa dang/ drag pa dang/ khro ba'o// de ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rnams/
@#// la rjod par byed do// rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bul rjod par byed do// skyes bu la brjod pa'i cha nus na de'i 'ogama'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do//

[） ]drang srong rin po mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po rnams la dga' ba rjod par byed do// drang srong chen bo ma ma yin gang zhig gnod sbyin nam/gnod sbyin pho 'am/gnod sbyin mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/

'tsho gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'a khor ram/ gnod spyin gyi g.yog 'a khor ram/ dri ba tho 'a ma/ dri wa mo la ma dri zla'i du pho lam/ dri za'i bu mo
'am dri za'i blon po chen po 'am/ dri za'i 'a khor ma/ dri za'i g.yog pa khor ram/ grul bum pho la ma/ grul bum mo' ma/ grul bum gyi bu pho 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am//
grul bum gyi blon po chen po 'a ma/ grul bum gyi 'a khor ram/ grul bum gyi galog 'a khor ram/ klu tho 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu'i bu bo 'am/ klu'i bu mo dag/ klu'i blon po chen po//
bam klu'i 'a khoraram/ klu'i ga yog 'khor ram/ rang du sdang pa'i sems kyis dag slong ngam/ dag slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyan nam/ dge bsnyen ma rnams bgro ba ma/ rjes
su 'gro ba'i ma/ rjes su ba gro ba dang sdod pa dang lhan cig tu sdod ba dang/ nyal po dang lhan cig tu nyal ba dang/ 'di rnams gnod sbyin rnams dang/ gnod sbyin chen bo rnams dang/ sde
dbon rnams dang ( snga dgon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang/ daro sgrogs par byed ba dang/ sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o// 'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas/ gnod sbyin
'dres tsho'athog par byed ba dang/ gnod sbyin ni'atsho bar byed pa dang/ gnodasbyin 'di rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'dI gnod par byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin
'di rnam bar gnod par byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'a dis mi gtong bar byed do// gnod sbyin rnams dang/ gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang/ sde dpon rnams dang/ sde dpon chen
bo rnams gang zhes na/ dbang po zla ba chu zla dang// d+hA ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag/ tsan+dan dang ni 'a dod mchog dang// mgul pa mdzes dang mgul des dang// skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa
dang lha las byung ba'i la lab// dril sna tshogs sde dang ni// mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang// de bzhin ri dang gangs can dang/ gang ba smin drug phug dang ni// 'tsho ba dang ni po tang
bzung dang// sna tshogs bshes gnyan gnya' pashing 'dzin// sa skyong rab tu rtogs ba dang/ ngo tsha mig dang khang pa dang// lnga len gdum bo A la ba ka/ srid sgrub yid bzad bzhin bzad
dang zho stong nor bu nor bu spyod// de bzhin dbang phyug dang bcas so// 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang/ gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang/ sde dpon rnams dang/ sde dpon chen po
la gsol bar byed pa dang/ nga ro sgrogs bar byed pa dang/ sgra cher sgrogs par byed ba'o// 'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas/ gnod sbyin 'dis slob phrog par byed pa//
dang/ gnod spyin nib tshong byed ba dang/ gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par mtho 'tsham par byed ba dang/ gnod sbyin la dwa gnod bur byed pa dang/ gnod sbyin 'dri rnam par gnod par byed pa dang/ gnod
sbyin ba des mi gtong bar byed do// drang srong chen po 'a dis ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig/ dag slong dang/ dag slong ma dang/ dag bsnyen dang/ dgo bsAn ma rnams la bsrung ba
da sba ba dang/ 'tsho ba med pa dang/ bde ba dang/ legs par gnas so// drang srong chen bo da ni bdag cag rnams 'gro bar 'gyigo/ bdag cag rnams ni bya ba mang ba dang/ byad pa
mang bas so// dag slong dag 'dag gis dan rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gro ba'i gnang ba byin no// danas rgyal po chen po bzhi bo rnams langs nas bdag la phyag byas te/ bskor ba byas nas de
nyid dumi snang par gyur to// dag slong dag gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang langs nas bdag laphyag byas bskor ba byas nas danyid dumi snang bar gyur to// gang sudag gis bdag la bsnyun gsol te/

bsnyan gsol nas snying po dang sIng po mad pa ji ltar zhes zhus pa de rnams ng nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// gang su dag gis bdag ga la nga dag thal mo sbyar nas lo dud pa byas te mi snang bar gyur to

gang la la zhig gis ming dang rigs rnam par dpyad na de nyid dus snang bar gyur to// gang la la zhig cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nyid du mi snang par gyur to// dag slong dag kha ton du zung la lcang lo/
can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig/ dag slong dag chongs la lcang len gyi pho brang gis srungs shig/ dag slong dge kha ton dang bcas bas lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig/ dge slong ngam/
dag slong ma la sa/ dag bstun nam/ dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung pa dang/ sba ba dang/ 'chi ba mang pa dang/ bde ba dang legs par gnas so// bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dag slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// skabs rab mchog gnyis pa sta lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo rdzogs so//
paN+Di ta A nan+dashI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i 'atsab shAkya'i dag slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen
po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ sa'i stang du nyi zla ltar gyur cig// @#// rgya gar skad du/ mahA sa ma ya sU tra/ bod
skad du/ 'dus ba chen po'i mdo/ 'phags ba dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshol lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i u la sir skya'i
gzhi'i tshal chen po na dgo slong gi dge 'dun chen po lngakhargya ste/ de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so// 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha
za rnams de ma thag tu'adus te/ bcom ldan pa dag dang dag slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyir ro// de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha ris bzhi po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//

tsha yang bcom ldan 'a dras kyis shAkya'i tshul sor skya'i gzhi'i tshal b+hA chen po na dag slong gi dge 'dun rin po lnga brgya ste/ de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so// 'jig
rten gyi khams bcu'i lhan ms de ma thag tu 'dus te/ bcol ldan ba das kyi dag slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyir ro// gang dag de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la bder da dag song sta song nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi thad dutshugs su bcad pa so sor brjod par bya'o// de nas lha de rnams kyi 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lagapa bsam pa las brkyang g tsam dang/ brkyang ba las
bskum pa de bzhin du/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams mi snang bar gyur to/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang bar gyur to// de nas lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig
tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas yang lhad rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams gsol to// 'dus pa chen po'i tshul 'di ru// lha yi tshogs rnams
'dus pa ste// chos ra de'i phyir du bdag 'ongs pa// dge 'dun mi pham 'dus pa blta// de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan ' das kyi thad du tshigs su dachud pa 'di gsol to// dge 'dun
srams rnams dul ba dwang// rang gi sems ni drang por byas// kha bzo sgyur bas drang por 'dzin// de bzhin mkhas pas dbang po bsrung// de nas lhagazhan rnams kyis bcom ldan ba das kyi thad du
tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to// khyim gyi 'ching ba bton pa dang u0f38/ dbang po nas ni sos 'gro zhing// dug cing dri med dar 'gro ba// rig ldan zla gang po dul ba bzhin// de nas lha gzhan
rnams kyis bcom ldan la dus kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to// gang zhig sangs rgyas skyabs 'grob// da ni ngan song 'gro mi 'gyur// mi yi lus ni spangs nas su// lha yi lus
ni yongs rdzogs 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dag slong rnams bos te/ de ma thag tu dgo slong dag 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams 'dus te de bzhin gshegs pa dag slong
dge 'dun dang bcas pa blta ba'i phyir ro// dag slong dag gang de rnams su gyur ba 'das pa'i dgu bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams bcom ldan 'das de tsam du gyur pa de bzhin
du lha rnams 'dus bar gyur to// 'di lta ste/ bdag kyang 'a de skad ces smras ste/ dag slong dag lha'i tshogs rnams kyi ming brjod par bya ste/ dge slong dag rang tu gsal bar byed ba zhes bya ba'i
[si ]// lha'i tshogs dang/ dag slong dag lha'i tshogs ston par byed pa zhes bya'o// da thos nas legs par yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o// de ltar btsun pa bcom ldan
kha das la dag slong de rnams kyis so sor zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba de skad ces bka' stsal to// tshigs su bcad ba so sor bshad// gang du sa gzhi mthong gyur nas// ri yi
'kho phug tu gang gnas pa// de rumanyam par 'jog par byed/ sa gzhir song gi 'jigs med bzhin// ba spu tsam yang gso ba ched// sems ni dag cing dkar ba dang// chu ni rab tu dngas
ny+nyo ba bzhin// lnga brgya po yis legs shos shing// ser skya'i tshal gzhas mang po rnams// de nas dge slong ston pas bos// bstan pa la dga' nyan thos rnams// lha yi tshogs rnams
za 'ongs nas nii// dag slong las kyis deshes bya// lus ni gdung bar ma byed pa// sangs rgyas bstan pa thos pas so// de rnams ye shes snang bar 'gyur// mi ma yin rnams mthong
'gyur ba// gang zhig gis ni brgya mthong zhing// stong dang bdun cu mthong ba yi// brgya dang stong phrag gcig dang ni// mi ma yin rnams mthong bar 'gyur// gang zhig gis ni mtha' mda mthong/
phyogs kun gang bor 'gyur ba mthong// de rnams kyis ni rtogs pa dang// spyan ldan rnam par dpyad nas ni// de phyir ston pa yis ni bos// bstan la dga' ba'i nyan thos kyis// lha yi
tshogs rnams 'ongs nas ni// dag slong rnams kyis de shes bya// gang zhig lani bdag bshad bya// gorim bzhin du mnyan par gyis// stong phrag bdun gyi gnod sbyin rnams// ser skya'i/
sa la gnas pa ni// rdzu 'a phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog dang ni grags par ldan// chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te// zhi bas dag slong tshul du 'o// stong phrag drug ni gangs can gyi//
gnod sbyin kha dog sna tshogs lus// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog dang na grags par ldan// chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'o ngas te// zhi ba dag slong tshul du'o// sna tshogs
bshes gnyen lnga brgya po// gnod sbyin kha dog sna tshogs lus// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing bod dang ldan// kha dog dang ni rgya gas par ldan// chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te// zhi bas dag
slong tshul du'o// rgyal khab gnod sbyin chu srinani// ngos las ri la gnas pa yin// stobs ldan 'bum phrag gcig po na// gnod sbyin rnams kyi 'khor gyis bskor// rgyal khab gnod
spyin chu srinan// 'khas dag slong tshal du'o// shar phyogs kyi ni rgyal po ni// ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes pa// dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste// rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan// de yi
bu ni mang po rnams// ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog dang ni grags par ldan// chos gtam du phyi 'di 'ongs de//
thubya// zhi bas dag slong tshal du 'o// lho yi phyogs kyi'ang rgyal po ni// ming ni 'a phags skyes bo zhes bya// grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste// rgyal po chen bo grags chen ldan//

]da yi bu ni mang po rnams/ ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'o da dad ldan// kha dog dang ni grags par ldan// chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te//zhi
khas dag slong tshul du go/ nub kyis phyogasakyi rgyal po na/ming ni mig mi bzang zhes grags// klu rnams kyini bdag po sta// rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan// de yi bu ni mang po rnams/
ming ni gcig tu blos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldag/ rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs dang ldan// kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ chos gtam bya phyira' dar 'ongs te// zhi bas dag
slong tshul du'o// byang bag phyogs kyi rgyal po ni// de ming lus ngan po zhes grags// gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste// rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan// de yi bu'i mdapo rnams// ming
ni gcig du thos pa ste// dbang po zhes bya stong sarun po// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan// kha dog dang ni grags par ldan// chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs// zhi bas dag slong tshal du 'o//
shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor skyong// lho phyogs na zhi 'phags skyes bo// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang// byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// de rnams rgyal po chen bo ba'i// phyogs rnams bzhi po
kun du// gzi brjid 'bar bas 'khod nas/// sa skya'i ga'i tshal du 'o// de rnams skyal rtsed mo bas ka/ drung ldan rnams ni nam mkhar 'khod// sgyu ma sku rgyab Dargyu// gi tsub ru

Do bcas// tsan+dan dang ni 'dong mchog dang// mgul pa mdzes dang mgul ngas dang// skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang// lha las byung ba'i kha lab// dri dro sna rogosasnga drang na// mi rgyal rgya la ba'i
khyu mchog dang// mdun du rtsa mo 'de bzhin// g.yo ram ngang ni nyi zer dang// de dang gzhan gyirgyal po rnams// rgyal po dri za dang khaMcas dang// chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs nas// zhi bas
dge slong tshul du 'o// de nas gzhan yang nam mkha'i klu// yangs pa can du lhan cig gnas// la ba rta yi mchog dang ni// rang 'gro gnyen dang lhan cig pa// ya mu na dang yul 'khor skyong/
klu yi spun dang grags ldan dang// sa srungs glang po rin po rnams// de yang nags kyi tshul du// gang zhig klurgyal myur du len// lha dang bya dang ma dag mig/ nam mkha' las 'ongs rol der
slob snya chogs 'a dab bzang zhes de'i ming// 'jigs med byin pas klu yi rgyal// mkha' lding bzod pa rtogs pasaM so// phan tshun du na mi rtsod cing// klu byung sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba//
rdo rje lag gis rgyal ba dang// lha ma yin ni rgya mtshor gnas// spun rnams de yi gnas dang ni// gzi brjid ldan zhing grags dang ldan// nag po mig sman 'jigs byed ldan// lha ma yin rnams khro
khyod dang// thags bzang dang ni thags bzang ris// mtshan 'joms na mo tse dang bcas// stobs kyi bu ni brgya bo rnams// thams cad rnam par snang mdzod cing// stobs
kyi snga ni go bgos pa// sgra gcan 'azang po snyan du bgro// btsun pa de ni 'dus nas nii// zhi bas dag slong tshal du 'o// mu dang lha dang sa dang ni// ma dang rlung yang der bodas so// mu lha chu/
la lha dang ni// zla ba dang ni grags par ldan// byams dang snying rje'i tshogs can dang// lhani grags ldan mdun du 'o// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams ni// thams cad kha dog sna
tshogs lus// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'o da dang ldan// kha dog dang ni grags par ldan// chos gtam bya phyir 'a dir 'ongs te// zhi bas dge slong tshul du 'o// khyab 'jug lha dang lhan cig tu//
