nams dag tu nges par brtag par byas kyang/ brgya'i char ya nga nya ba mi 'gro'o// stong gi ma dang/ brgya stong gi cha dang/ grangs dang/ chadang/ bsrung ba dang/ dpa dang/ rgyur
yang nyabar mi 'gro'o// lha'i du yongs su dga' ldan bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bsod nams gang yin pa de/ 'phrul dka'i lha rnams kyi bsod nams dag tu nges par brtag par byas kyang/ brgya'i
char yang nye bar m 'grogo/ stong gi cha dang/ brgya stong gi chadang/ grangs dang/ chadang/ bsrung ba dang/ dpa dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// 'phrul dga'i lha dag phye ba phrag
'bum gyi bsod nams gang yin pa de/ lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' gcig gi bsod nams dag tu nges par ba rtag nga rabyas kyang/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang/
ba brgya stong gi tshe dang/ grangs dang/ dang/ bgrangab dang/ dpa dang/ rgyur yang nye bar ma 'grog/ lha'i bur 'phrul dga' bye ba phrag 'bum chibasodanams gang yin pa de/
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi bsod nams dag tu ngos par brtag par byaso khyang/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi chu dang/ brgya stong gi mdang/ grangs dang//
chadang/ bgrang ba dang/ dbo dang/ rgyur anganya bar mi 'gro// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dag bya ba phrag 'bum gyi bsod nams gang yin pa de/ lha'i bu dbang sgyur gyi bsod namA
dag khyu nges par brtag par byas kyang/ brgya'i nar yang nye bar m bgro'o// stong gitshe dang/ bsgyu stong gi ma dang/ grangs dang/ chadang/ bgrang ba dang/ dpa dang/ rgyur yang zhu
lami 'gro'o// lha'i bu dngang sgyur dag bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bsod nams gang yin pa de/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyibasod nams dag tu nges par brtag par byas kyang/ brgya'i chur yod
nyi bar mi 'grogo/ stong gi ma dang/ brgya stong gi chu dang/ gros dang/ chadang bgrang ba dang/ dpa dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// tshangs ris kyi lha dag bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bsod
nams gang yin pa de/ 'khoragyi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams dag du ngas par brtag par byas kyang/ brgya'i char yang nye bar 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang/ brgya stong gi chu dang/ grangs
dang cha dang/ bgrang ba dang/ dpe dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// tshangs ris dag ji lta bar tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dag dang/ tshangs pa chen po dag dang//
khod chung dug dang/ tshad med bod dag dang/ bong gsal dag dang/ dge chung dka dang/ tshad med dag dag dang/ dgargyus dag dang/ sprinamed dag dang/ bsod nams skyes dag dang/
'khaM 'bras bu 'dug dang/ ma dag dang/ mi gdung dug dang/ rtsa non snang dag dang/ shin tu mthong dag dang/ 'og min dag kyang de bzhin no// 'og min gyi lha dag bye ba phrag 'bum gyi
bsod nams gang yin pa de/ rad sangs rgyas bas ru lta bu gcig gi bsod nams dag tunges par brtag par byas kyang/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi chadang/ grangs dang
cha dang/ bgrang ba dang/ dngo dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro// rang sangs rgyas bas ru lta bu dag bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bsod nams gang yin nga de/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa gcig
gi bsod nams dag tu nges bar brtag par byas kyang/ brgya char yang dbar mi 'gro'o// stong gi cha dang/ brgya stong gi chu dang/ grangs dung/ ma dang/ bgrang ba dang/ dbo dang//
rgyur yang nye bar mi 'grogo/ byang nub sems dpa' byams pa dag bya ba phrag 'bum gyi bsod nams gang yin pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tham gcig gi bsod nams dag tu nges/
par brtag par byas kyang/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'grogo/ stong gi chu dang/ brgya stong gi chadang/ grangs dang/ chu dang/ bgrang bdang/ dpe dang/ rgyur yang 'bar mi 'gro'o//
byang chub sems dpa'i srid pa tham dag gang ga'i klung gi byam dang mnyam pa snyad kyi bsod nams gang yin pa de/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyus gcig gi bsod nams dag tu nges par brtag par byas kyang/ brgya'i nar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi mdang/ brgya stongagichadang/ grangs dang/ chadang/ bgrang ba dang/
dang dang/ rgyud mang nye bar mib gro'o// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu dag ni/ bsod nams kyi stobs de lta bu dang
ldan pa dag yin zhing/ gang dag 'das pa dang/ gang dag ma khyon ba dang/ gang yang nga da lta da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa de sangs
rgyas thams cad mnyam pa dang mnyam ste/ mtshan mnyam pa/ yon tan mtshungs pa mnyam pa/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mnyam pa dag yin gyi/ rgyugasum po rigs
dang sku tshe dang/ sku lus kyis mnyam pa dag ni sa yin no// btsun pa bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yab yum
[ra ]@#// las byung ba'i stobs kyang thos lags/ bsod nams kyi stobs kyang thos lags na/ btsun pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas
rgyus dag shes rab kyi stobs dza lta bu dang ldan pa dag lags/ gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag khyad de bzhin gshegs pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
sangs rgyus rnams kyi shos ba kyi stobs nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mchogatu'atshal lags so// bdabar gshegs pa mtshotu 'tshal lags so// gnas
( bajog gi rgyud dug de'i phyirakhyadalegs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag rgya mtsho chen po ni khrubs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod la/ rgyur
dpag tu med pa de/ snag tsha'i nying khus yongs su gang bar gyur cing ri'i rgyal po rarab dpag tshadabargyad khri chu'i nang nas mngon du 'phags te/ rinapo sna bzhi las byas shing/ ngos bzhi
yodapa/ de'i ngos gcig zhi gsar las byas pa yin/ ngos gnyis pa ni dngulalasabyas pa'o// gsum pa nib cha slalas byas pa'o// bzhi pa ni shel las byas pa ste/ de la gsar gyi
ngos su ni byang gi sgra masnyan gyi gling snang ngo// dngul las byas pa'i ngos sunI shar gyi lus la phags gling snang ngo/ brdzun las byas pa'i ngos nani'adzam bu'i gling snangang// shel las byas

pa'i ngosan ni ba glang spyod kyi gling snang ngo// pa'i rgyal khorar ba dpag tshad brgyad khri 'og tu chu'i nang du nub ste/ gser las byas pa'i sa steng gi bar n gnas pa de/ gro ga'i shog shog tsam du/
gyural/ gling bzhin sems can gyi khams gang su dag yod du yig pa rnams ni de tsam du gyur to/ sa chen po stong na rtswa dang/ shing dang/ shing gi yal ga dang/ shing gi dum bu/
gangani yung rung/ smyu gu dag ni da tsam du gyur nas/ gnas 'a jog gi rgyud dag snag tsha'i snying khu rgya mtsho chen po tsam drang/ gro ga'i shog shog ri rab tsam dang/ yi ge pa dag glod
bzhi ba'i sems can gyi khams tsam dang/ smyu gu dugs chen por stangan tshu dang/ shing dang/ yal ga dang/ shing gi dum bu tsaman chus myur dulos su 'du ba dang/ yongs su/
gtugs par 'gyur gyi/ dge slong bar 'i bu'i shes rab zad par 'gyur ba nang mi smra// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag dug slong ba ra'i bu ni shes rab kyi stobs de lta bu dang ldan no// gnas
'jog gi rgyud dag 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang byed kyi nyi ma dag ni/ kun tu 'gro ba dang/ phyogs snang bar byed do// de srid du stong gi 'jig rten/ zla ba stong dang/ nyis stong dang/
ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang/ shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang/ ba lang spyod stong dang/ byang gi sgromi snyan stong dang/ 'dzam bu gling stong dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhastong

bajig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o// stong chung ngu'i 'jig rtan gyi khams stong gi stong gang yin nga 'dini/ stong gnyis pa bam 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o// stong gnyis pa bar ma'i
'jig rten gyi khams brag stong gang yin pa 'di ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyikhamA
de yang/ shes rab dag slong ri'i bu dang 'drab dag gis gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i shesarab tu nges par brtag par byas kyang/ brgyu'i char yang nye bar 'gro//
stong gi chu dang/ brgyastong gi ma dang/ grwas dang/ chu dang/ bgrang ba dang/ drapa dang/ rgyur yang nyabar mi 'gro'o// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ni shes rab gyi stobs de lta bu dang ldan pa dag yin zhing/ gong dag 'das ba dag dang/ gang dgam byonab dag dang/ gang yang ng da lta de ltar
byung ba'i dus nad bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ mtshan mnyam pa// yon tan mtshung

ca ga gis de bzhin gshegs pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa mang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshab yum las byung ba'i stobs kyang thos lags/ bsod/
nams kyi stobs kyang thos la/gas// shes rab kyi stobs kyang gros lags na/ btsun pa de bzhin gsheg pa dgu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs de'i sangs rgyas gang rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
ril bu dang ldan pa 'gas/ gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag khyod dngazhin gshegs pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul/
gyi stobs nyan par 'dod dam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mchog duratshadu lags so// bde ba gshegs pa mchog tut+tAtshal lags so// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dgu de'i phyir khyod leg
parab tunyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas bshad do// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag dus 'a di ni gcig ste/ rtswa ba na dang ldan par gnod sbyin 'dam bu dang 'dra bar rtsub pa'i dong kA'i shing
druban bzhugs so// mang de'i ba ra nadang ldan pa na/ dkar 'brog dgon pa slong mo pas bsod snyoms red bar dka' ba'i mu ge byung ste/ dge slong dag tsang zas ngan pas yongs su
dung ba yin no// de nas dag slong mo'u 'chal gyi bu nga ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa da ltar rtswa bi ra na dang ldan pasmad kaka ba
'brog dgon pa slongamo bas bsod snyoms rnyed par dka' ba'i mu ge byung lags te/ dag slong dag kyang g.yar zas nganabs yongs su dug lags so// btsunapa bcom ldan la dus
khaM lasabadag gis mngon du thos shing mngon du bzung lags te/ dogs chen go 'a di la dog sa las byung ba'i ro'i khams gya nom pa gang lags pa de ni/ 'og na gnas lags
shing/ bdag kyang bdag nyid kyi yang dag par shes pa mthong b 'jug lags so// dog sa chen po 'di la dogs las byung ba'i rdo'i khams rgya nom pa gang lags pa de ni/ 'og
na gnas pa lags te/ btsun dang de'i smad du dog sa chen po bsgyur bar bdag 'tshalags so// dogs chen bo 'di'i 'og na ro'i khams gya nom pa gang lags pa de stong na
mchis par bgyi lags so// stongan mchis pa gang lags pa do 'og na mchis par bgyi lags so// de la 'di skad ces kyang ngas bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu sa rnon po/
bsgyurab 'a dod dam/ des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun ba dogs chen po bsgyur bar 'tshal lags so// de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gnas 'dir gnas te sa chen po
ba bskyang bar 'a dod dam/ des 'di skad rjes gsol to// btsun pa khong lug dang khor yug chen po dag gi gnas su gnas te/ dog sa chen po bskyang bar 'tshal lags so// de lam
ba 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bus chen po bsgyur bar 'dod// gang dgas la rten pa'i sems can dang/ srog chagasadi dag ji ltar byang/ des 'di skad ces
gsol to// btsun pa ngogs chen po bsgyur pa lags te/ gang dag dogi saM la rten pa'i sems can dang/ srog chags de dag lag pa g.yon pas blangs te gzung bar bgyi la gas so//
lag pa g.yas pas nis chen po bskyang bar bgyi lags so// de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po sa chen po sbyar bar byed pa na/ ji lta bu'i 'du shes dang
ldan par byed/ des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun ba sa chen po bsgyur bar bgyi ba na/ 'du shes mchog tu yang ba dang ldan par bgyi lags te/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dang
ldan pa zhig chu shing gi 'dab ma bsgyur bar bgyid pa na/ 'dushes mchog tuldan par bgyid lags so// btsun pa de bzhin du bdag sa chen po sgyur bar 'agyid pan/ 'dushes mchog tu
lang ba dang ldan par bgyid lags so// de la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu legs so legs so// mo'u ba gal tsho bu khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul do dag dang thabs
desas chen po bsgyurab raninus par gyur na/ sa chen go bsgyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la gnang bar mi mdzad do// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems
nagang phul rgyurakha zasakyir chags shing/ kha zas kyi ro la rmongs te/ kun tugati mug par 'gyur ro// mo'u 'gal gyi bu de ci'i phyir zhen/ sa chen po'i stongs can n sa las
'tsho byung ba'i ra khams tshanom pa de yang yun ring du mi gnas te// ring po ma thogs par de sa chen po'i snying nas thams cad kyi thams cad du nub par 'gyur ro// de'i phyir sems can dang/
'byung po dang/ srog chags de dag kyang kha khrus kyi ro la chugasashing/ khazos kyi rol rmongs te/ mchog tu myos par 'gyur ba'am/ srog chadanAs shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/
zla mo'u 'gal gyi bu de'i phyir sa chen po bsgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la gnang bar mi mdzad do// gnas 'jogagi rgyud dag dag slong mo'u 'gal gyi buni rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs de lta du
dang ldan no// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag 'di lta ste/ rnam par snang byed gyi nyin dag ni/ kun tu'agro ba na phyogs snangabor byed do// de srid du stong gi 'jig rten zla ba stong dang/ rtsom
stong dang/ ri'i rgyalapor rab stong dang/ shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang/ ba lang spyod stong dang/ byang gi sgromi snyan stongadang/ 'dzam bu gling stong dang/ rgyal chen bazhi'i ris
0 kyi lha stong dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa dag dang/ 'thab bral dag dang/ dga' ldan dug dang/ 'phrul dga' dag dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha stod dang/ tshangs pa'i//
'jig rten stong po ba ni/ stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o// stong pud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stong gang yin pa de ni/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams
zhes bya'o// stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams phrag stong gang yin pa 'don/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigarten gyi khams zhes bya'o//
'phags pa rdor phangs pa'i mdo bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag stong gsum gyi khams chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang rdzu 'phrul
dang ldan pa dag slong mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang 'dra ba dag gis gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i blu'aphrul des par byas kyang/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi chu dang/
brgya stong gi mdung/ grangs dang/ mdung/ bsrang ba dang/ dab dang/ rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhon/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu'aphrul ni lus
kyis 'gro ba yin zhing/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul ni yid ltar mgyogs pa yin pa'i phyir te/ gnas 'jog go rgyud/
rtsa sbyargyu// dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus dag ni rdzu 'a phrul gyi stobs de lta bu dang ldan pa dag yin shing/ gang dag 'das pa dag
dang nga gang dgam byon pa drug dang/ gang yang ng da lta da ltar byung ba'i dusan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas thams
cad manyam pa dang mnyam sto/ mtshan manyam pa/ yon tan mtshungs pa mnyam pa/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mnyam pa dag yin gyi/ rgyu gsum po rigs dang//
rgyu sku tshe dang/ sku lus kyis mnyam pa dag ni ma yin no// btsun pa bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
mas kyi yab yumalas byung ba'i stobs kyang thos lags/ bsod nams kyi stobs kyang thos lags/ shes rab kyi stobs kyang thos lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyang gros lags
na btsunapa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dgabagrom pa'i stobs jilta bu dang ldan pa dag lags/ gnas 'jig gi rgyud dag khyadadabazhin gshegs
palas/ dbazhin gshag pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsgom pa'i stobs nyan par bdodadam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mchog tu 'tshul lags
ba/ so[… ] bde bar gshegs pa mchog tu 'a tshal lags so// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag de'i phyir khyod legs par rab tu nyon yid 'khrung zhig dang ngas bshad do/ gnas 'a rdzog gi rgyud dag 'dzam
bu gling nu dung rgya bani dpag tshadabadun stong yod de/ byang phyogs su ni yangs la/ lho phyogs su shing rta'i dbyibs so// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag shar khyi'usa' phags gling ni nur dpag tshadabcud
stong yod de/ zla gam du gnas so// gnas 'a jog gi rgyud dag ba lang spyod kyi gling ni nu dpag tshad dgu stong yod la/ kun tu zlum po'o// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag byung gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling
rnamug dbag tshad khri yod de/ kun nas khru bzhi'o// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag gang gling bzhi dus med pa'i sprin chen bo yang dag par 'ong ba'i dus da yod da/ de'i tshe gling chen po bzhi nas chu

dang grong rdal che ge mo dang/ ljongs cha ga mo dang/ ljongs kyi phyogs ra ga mo dang/ shing ljon pa ni gomo dang/ sdong po ni ga mo dang/ yal ga dang/ 'dab ma dang/ ma tog dang/

nga'i mas rnam par grol ba/ shes rab rnam par grolal/ mthong ba'i chos nyidakhadag nyid kyis mngon pa mkhyen pas mngon du mdzad de/ rdzogs par mdzad nas rab tumakhyen cing/ nged/

bcom pa yang dag par rdzob/da ni sangs rgyas rnams nazig pa dag zad nas/ zag pa med pa'i sogs rnam par grol ba/ shes rab rnam par grolaMb/ mthong ba'i chos nyid la bdag nyid
kyis mngon par mkhyen pas mngon du mdzad de/ rdzogs pa'i mdzad nas rab tu mkhyen cing/ nged kyi skye ba 'di ni zad de// tshangs par spyod pa ni bsAn to// mdzad pa mdzad do// 'di lasasrid
pagazhan rab tum mkhyen to// gnasa'ajog gi rgyud dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ni stobs bcu pado dang ldan pa dag yin zhing/ khyu mchog
gigs rlabs po zhal gyis bzhes/ tshangs ba'i 'khor lo'an tu bskor zhing/ 'a khor gyi nang du ya de dag bsang ba'i sgra sgrogs par mdzad do// gang dag 'das pa/
dag dang/ gang dag ma byonab dag dang/ gang yang nga daltadaltar byung ba'i dus na/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgrakhacom pa yang dag bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam
'a dang mnyam ste/ mtshan mnyam pa// tshon namtshungs pa mnyamakha/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par sman ba mnyam pa dang/ yigyi/ rgyugasum po rigs dang/ sku tsho dang/ sku lus
'tsho kyis mnyam pa dag ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan ' dasal/ ku shi'i grong khyer nas rgyas pa khyad nams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'o na ci gang stobs de dag las ches stobs/
dang ldan zhing/ gang stobs de dag zil gyis gnon par bgyid pa'i stobs gzhan mchis lags sam/ gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag gang stobs de dag las chos stobs dang ldan zhing/ gang
stobs de dag zalegyis gnon par byed pa'i stobs gzhan yod// 'di lta sta/ gang de nyid kyi mtshan cho' bang thunal/ mtshon gyis rnam par brgyan pa// dpabyad bzang pos rnam par mtshon
par byas ba'i sku la di dang/ stobs de dag gi snod du gyur pa'i sku srog 'di rab tu 'joms par 'gyur ba'i mi rtag pa nyid kyi stobs zhes bya'o/ gnas 'jog gi rgyud 'di'i gang stobs de dag las
chos stobs dang ldan zhing/ gang stobs de dag zil gyis gnon par byed pa'i stobs gzhan de yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa// lus las/
byung pa'i stobs dang bsod nams stobs// ye shegs stobs dang rdzu 'phrul stobs bas kyang// nga yi gzib/de'adzomapa mi rtag nyid// mchog tu stobs dang ldan bar bzheng pa yin// gang du
de dang 'dra ba'i sku lus ni// gsar gyi yi dbang bo'i rtsomo 'dra// mi rtag nyid kyi gzi brjid kyisabcom nas// nga yi 'jig pa 'ong par 'gyur ba yin// ma rtag nyid kyi stobs ni stobs mchog
pag rnamakhas pa yis ni rnam par shes byas te// gang du mi rtag nyid ni mi 'ong pa'i// mi 'chi ba yi gnas de thob par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das las ka shi'i grong khyer nas rgyas pa'i kyang
kyis de skad thos nas rmongs par gyur te/ jiltar yang ba du shes thob pa dag tu gyur nas/ sa 2'gro ldog ste/ 'di lta ste/ shing gi sdong bu bzhin no// kha cig ni dpung pa dag bsnol te
rab tudu bar byed do// kha ci gnas oms kyi sdug bsngal dang kun tu ldan zhing 'a khod do// kha cig ni chos nyid 'on la rton par byed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la dang po nyid du' dod
ba dang/ sdug pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ yid du 'ong ba thams cad las dngos po tha dad pa dang/ med par 'byung ba dang/ 'bral ba dang mi ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs
so snyam mo// de nas ku shi'i grong khyer nas skyes pa'i khyad rnams ldi ba'i skad ltar snyan cing 'jigs pa ring 'jam pa'i dbugs phyung nas// mchi ma dag phyud ste/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs ba/cig tub khod do// de nas bcom ldanub das la/ slong gi dag bdun dang zabs cig tu rdo tshon po langs ba de'i phyogs
'a gcig tu bzhugs so// ku shi'i grong khyer nas skyes pa'i khyad rnams kyang rdo chen po la/ngas pa de nyidakyi phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das ku sha'i grong khyer nas
klu smyos pa'i khyad rnams la shad kyis sbyong ba ltar mdzad cing/ ku shi'i grong khyer na skyes pa'i rgyud rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsa' to// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag rdo chen bo yangs
bab din bskal pa dang po pa'i ma rnams kyi rtsolaba'i rdor gyur te/ 'di ltar deng sang yang d 'gor mo'i rjes dag snang ba'i phyir ro// gnasa'ajog gi rgyudag de ltar 'du khyang thams cad ni
zla mi rtag pa/ mi brtan pa/ yid brtanadusarung ba/ rnam par gyurada'i chos can dag yin te/ 'du byed thams cad kyi bar gyi chog pa nyid do// skyo bar bya ba'i rigs so// 'dod
chags dang bral bar bya ba'i rigs so// rnam par grol bar bya ba'i rigs so// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag rgya mtsho chen po nasmyu'azhis bsam par mi nus so// bzhi gang dag gis shin

'bebs par byed pa dang/ chu bo chen po thums cad ruklung stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho chen por 'bab par byed pa'o// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rgya mtsho 'di yang rgyu bzhis
nub par mi 'gyur ro// bzhigang dag gisashen/ bog tun 'dul ba'i gsar gyi 'khor las kun tubakhru ba dang/ ngos su na mdo sde'i khor yug gis yongs su bzung pa dang/ chos
gdonapa'i klu chen po'i chab gyis kun tu yongs su gang bar byas pa dang/ bsgom pa las byung ba'i dgaba'i rtsabab chu klung dag gis yongs su rgyas par byas pa'o// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag/
'on kyang sa ngos rgyas la dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni/ ba khor bar zad par ma 'gyur/ yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan las 'das pa mi zad par yang thob par byed do//
chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod ba dang/ dag la dun la dga' gi rtsa ba bskyod bzhi/ 'khor bar zed par mi 'gyu/ yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing mya ngan las 'dus pas zad
pa yang thob par byed do// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dga' dzam bu gling 'di ni u dang zhing du dpag tshad bdun stong yod cing/ byang phyogs su ni yang la/ lho phyogs su shing rta'i dbyibs yin no//

ngan las 'das pa mi zad pa yang thob par byed do// chos la ngag ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa dang/ dgo bdun la dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyod pa'i bgrang ba dang tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'khor bar zad
par mi 'gyur/ yongs su gags par mi 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan las 'das pa mi zad pa yang thob par byed do// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag 'dzam bu'i gling lta zhog gi/ gnas 'jog gi rgyud
dgashar gyi lus 'phags glingazhes bya ba nudang rgyar dpag tshad brgyad stong yod cing/ zla gam du gnas pa yod de/ de la yang gos nad snyad cig yod do zhe'am/ gom pa brgya 'am
gom pa stong ngan/ gom pa brgyustobazhig yod do zhes bgrang ba dang tshad gzung bar ni nus kyi/ gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa nabazung ba dang tshad gzung bar mi
nus te/ 'khor bar zad par 'gyur/ yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan las 'das pa mi zad pa yang thob par byed do chos la dgaba'i rtsa babaskyod pa dang/ dag
wa 'dun dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyod bzhi bgrang ba dang tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur/ yongs su gtugs par ni bsgyur zhing/ mya ngan las 'das pa mi zad pa yang thob
pa khyadago/gnas 'a jog gi rgyud dag 'dzam bu'i gling yang zhog/ shar gyi lus 'phags gling yang shog go/ gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag ba lang spyod kyi gling zhes bya ba/ rlu dang rgyar dpag
tshod dgu stong yod cing/ kun du zlum po yod de/ de la yang gom pa 'a disnyad cig yod do zhe nam/ gom pa brgya 'am/ gom pa stong ngam/ gom pa brgya stong zhig yod do zhes bgradab
dang bzung ba ni nus kyi/ gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag sangs rgyas la dgaba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ni bgrang ba dang tshadagazungabar mi nus te/ 'khor ba'akhrad par mi 'gyur/ yongs su gtugs
bar mi 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan las 'das pa mi zad pa yang thob par byed do// chos la dag ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa dang/ dge 'dun la ragaba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa ni bgrang ba dang tshad gzung bar mi
nus te/ 'khor bar zad bar mi 'gyur/ yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma zad pa yang thob par byed do// gnas 'jog gi rgyud dug 'dzam bu'i gling yang
zhog chub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling yang shog/ shar gyi lus 'phags gling yang zhog gi/ gnas 'jog gi rgyudadagatsangagi sgra mi snyan gyi glingazhes bya ba/ chu dang rgyar dpag tshad khri yod pa//
kun tu gru bzhi pa yod de/ de la mang gom pa 'disnyad cig yod do zhe 'am/ gom pa brgya 'am/ gom pa stongadam/ gom pa brgya stong zhig yod do zhes bgrang ba dang tshad/
gzung bar ni nus kyi/ gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag sangs rgyas la dag bab rtsa ba bskyod pa nibagrang ba dang tshad gzung ba mazhus te/ 'khor bar zad pa mi 'a gyur/ yongs su gtugs par
mi 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan las 'das pa so khrid ba yang thob par byed de// chos la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod da dang/ dge 'dun la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa ni bgrang ba dang tshad gzung bar mi
a nus te/ 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur/ yongs su gtugs pa las 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan las 'das pa mi zad pa yang thob par byed do// gnasal jog gi rgyud dag gling bzhi ba'i

gzung bar mi nus te/ 'khor bar zad par mi 'gyur/ gongs su gzhugs par mi 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan las 'das pa mi zad pa yang thob par byed do// chos la dgaba'i rtsa brgyadapa/

'gyur/ yongasaM su gtus pa'i m 'gyur zhing/ mya ngan las 'das pa mazid pa yang thob par byed do// chos dag kha'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang/ dga' dun la dge ba'i rtsa babaskyodapa

rgyudadag/ de ci'i phyir zhon/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas d gnas myon pas dpag tu med pa dgagi phyir ro// tshul khrims kyis dpag
dumed pa dag dang/ bzod pas dang ga tu med pa dag dang/ brtson 'khrus kyis dbag tu med pa dag dang/ bsam gtan gyis dpag tu med pa dag dang/ shes rab kyis dpag tu
yod pa dag dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyis dpag tu med pa dag dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyimo'aphrul gyis dpag tu med pa dag dang/ kun brjod pas dpag tu med pa dag dang/ kun tubarjod pa'i
rmob phrul gyis dang du med pa dag dang/ rjes su bstan pa dpag tu med pa dag dang/ rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis dpag tu med pa dag dang/ stobs bcudang/ mi 'jigs pa/
bzhi dang/ ma 'dres pa'i dranang nye bar gzhug pa gsum dang/ thugs rje chen bo dpag tu tshud pa'i phyir te/ gnas 'jog gi rgyud dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

pa gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di ni ku shi'i grong khyer dang nye bar bzhugs// ku shi'i grong khyer nas skyes pa'i khyad rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi cho'i phul chen

kha cig gisan bzod pa chung dang 'bring drag bskyodado// kha cig gis ni bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams baskyod do// kha cigagis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon

bskyod pa dag tu gyur to// kha cig gis nib+ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyod pa dag tu gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi

bde ba dang/ lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing/ lha'i gablugs dang/ sgradang/ sridang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ lha'i g.yog 'khor dang ldan par 'gyur ro//dge slong dag 'phrul dag ri
ts+tso lha rnams kyi lo bcud stong gang yin pa de ni/ dmyal ba chen po du 'bod chen po'i nyin zhagagacig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu ba rtsis
pa'i lo brgyad stong ni dmyal ba ngu 'bod chen poratsho'i da do// dge slong dag lhag ma'i chos gang dag mi srung ba dang/ mi sdod pa dang/ yongs sus skyong ba dang/ de dag las 'da'
bar byed pa dang/ 'das ba de dag mi ston pa dang/ rab tum ston pa de na lus zhi gnas shi ba'i 'og du dmyal ba chen po nga la bod rin por skye bar gyur to/ de dag der yang sdug bsngal
ska shin tu drag pa dang/ rtsub ba dang/ tsha ba dang/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ro// lhag ma'i ltung ba brtag pa'o// dag slong dag 'dzam bu glingopa'i mi rnamA
gyi lo brgya phrag bsudrug gang yin pa de ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go/ nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go/ zla ba bcu gnyis la gcig tu brtsis
ba pa'i stongaphragakhamudrugani gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad do// dag slong dag pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi po gang dag srung ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ yongs su skyong ba
dang 'da' bar mi byed pa dang/ de dag las 'das pa ston pa dang/ rab tu ston pa de ni lus zhig nas bde 'gro gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag der yab
lha'i tshe dang/ lha'i kha dog dang/ lha'i stobs dang/ lha'i bde ba dang/ lha'i dbang phyug la dbang byed cing/ lha'i gzugs dang/ sgradang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ lha'i
g.yog baboradang ldan par bsgyur ro// dag slong dag gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lo stong phrag bcu drug gang yin pa de ni/ dmyal ba chen potsho ba'i nyamazhag gcig go/ nyin zhag

desum cu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lo khri drug stong ni dmyal ba chen po tshaba'i tsha'i tshad do// dag slong dag pham par 'a gyur ba'i chos bzhi po gang dag mi srung ba
dang mi spyod pa dang/ yongs su mi skyong ba dang/ de dag las 'das par byed pa dang/ 'das pa de dag mi ston pa dang/ rab du mi ston pa de ni lus zhig nas shing 'i 'og tu dmyal ba chen po
tshabar skye bar 'gyurato/ de dag der yang sdug bsngal drag pa dang/ rtsub pa dang/ tsha ba dang/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshorab myong bar 'gyur ro// pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'i ltung ba
brtag pa'o/// dag slong dag de lta bsan/ gang de dag bstan bcos thos pa rnams kyi bdag la phan par bya ba dang/ snying brtse ba dang/ snying rdzob dang/
a don 'dodapa dang/ phanapa tshol bas snying brtseba'as khyed cag rnams kyis 'diltar bya ste/ dag slobadag dgon pa dang/ shing drung dang/ khang stong dang/ ri khrod dang/ riphug dang/
smre la pun dzaM b+hu ba sha dang/ dur khrod dang/ nags 'dab dang/ bsamathapo gnas mal du gnas te/ 'di dgangesaparab sam par bya'o// dag slong dgabag yod par gyis shig/
can s kyang phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ba de ltar ma byed cig/ 'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dag slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom
lnga na 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bastod do// ltung ba sde lnga'i dag ba dang mi dgaba'i 'brasabu brtag pa'i mdo rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po A tsAr+yadz+ha
rgyu na gi gu pa tadang/ bod kyi la rtsabadag slong brgyablo gros kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab la//(@#// rgya gar skad du/ kumAr dr-it+taM ta sku dra
bod skadadu/ gzhon nu'i dpa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshol go/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ko
ba sa la'i ljongs zhing gshegs pa dang/ mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyan gyi kun dga' rab dbazhugs so// ko sa la'i
rgyul po gsal gyis dug sbyong go'u tum ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang/ mnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/
shes ldan go da ma de bla na med pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhalagyis 'gazhes thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang/ yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/ phyogs gcig tu
'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis/ bcom ldan das 'a'adi skad ces gsol to// kyi go'u ta ma bdag gis shes ldan go'u tun
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal e li'o zhes thos lags na/ go'u ta ma gang dag de skad ces lung bstan pa de dag jig dag
sbyong go ta ma la skur pa 'debs pas lags sam/ thalabar sla ba lags sam/ shes ldan go'u tums gsungs pabazhin sa ba lags sam/ chos smra ba lags sam/ chos
dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sam/ jig de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang 'thun partsod pa'i rjes su rtsodapa mchis na/ smod pa'i chos kyi gnas sus
'chung lags m/ rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad du smra ba de dag ni da skad du lung ston pa bdan to/ nga la skur pa 'di 'debs pa ma yin/ thal bar sbyabam yin/ da ni gsungs pa bzhin
stsa ba yin/ chos dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te/ de dag gi drung du pha rol po chos dang 'thun pa'i rtsod pa'i rjes su rtsod pa 'ongasan/ rtsod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur ro//
rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas so// shes ldan go'u tam de skad gsungs mod kyi/ shes ldan go'u
dam la bdag yid ma rnyas lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kyi go'u ta ma rezhog cha/ na zhing rgan pa'i dag sbyong dang bram zen 'di dag lags te/ 'di lta ste/ 'od srungs rdzogs
rgyu khyod dang/ kun tu gnag lhas kyi bu dang/ smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal pa can dang/ mi pham skra'i la ba can dang/ ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang/ gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu gad
lags pa de dag kyang/ dadung bla na med bdag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid g.yar gyis mi khache lags na/ shes ldan go'u ta ma 'khrus
ba ]nas ring por ma lags pa gsar du rag tubyung bas lta smos kyang mi'atshal/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu bzhi po 'di dag la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ zil gyis gnon par mi bya ste/ bzhi gang
zhe na rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs gzhon nukhyad du gsad pa'i bya/ gzhon nu la zil gyis gnan par mi bya'o// rgyal po chen po sbrul gzhon nu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ gzhon
nulazil gyis gnan par mi bya'o/ rgyal po chen po ma chung ngu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/ zil gyis 'a/nan par mi bya'o// rgyal po chen po dag slong gzhon nukhyad du gsad par
mabya gzhon nu la zil gyis gnan par mi bya'o// de ci phyir zhe na/ ga slong gzhon nur gyur kyang de rdzu 'phrul ni zhing mthur ba'i dgra bcom par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
'das kyis de skad skyes// bka' stsal nas niabade gshegs kyis// de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// ston paso gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs// rgyal rigs dpe med ldan pa
dang ngarigs btsun grags par ldan pa na// blo dang ldan pas de bzhin zhes// khyod dus gsad zil mi gzhan// rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa las// rgyal srid dag na
thob tshur nas// chad pas gsad pa'i gnasade yod// de bas de la shin tu btud// de la rang gi srog bsrung zhing// radagi don la lta bas ni// don khyad du mi gsad cing// de
la legs par bag kyang bya// gal te grong ngam dgon pa la nga rung// gang du sprulani mthong gyur na// blo dang ldan pas de bzhin zhes// khyad du mi gsad zilami
gnan// 'di ltar sbrul ni rgyab na// rig/sa ni rnam pa sna tshogs la// grags redanusazhi gzhon nus kyang// skyes pa bud med dumazin// de ltas khang gi srog srung zhing// rang gi don la lta
bsan// dani khyad du mi gsad cing// de la legs par bag kyang bya// 'khar ba mang ba za byed pa// byin za lam ston ldan pa de// chung yang khyad du ma gsad cing// mkhas pasazil
gyis gnan mi bya// chu bar len pas phyin khra ni// chung du gyur las chen por 'gyur// ma lce 'bar bas myur bar ni// grong dang grong khyer sreg par byed// daphyir bdag srog srung byed pas//
thod ni khyad dus gsad cing// bdag nyidadon legs lta bas// de lalegs par bag spyod bya// byin sbra las sngon ldan gyur ba// ma mis tshang tshing gang bsregs pa// de la nyin mtshan
la das gyur pas// la lar 'o ma skyo bar 'gyur// gang gis tshul khrims ldan pa yi// dag slong redanas sug byed pa// de la bu dang tshu'o dang// bgo skal yod par ma gyur to//
wita 'a'i mgo bzhin mi ring bar// rigs rgyud dang yang sngalabar 'gyur// de phyir bdagu srog srung byed pas// den khyadadu gsad mi bya// bdag nyid don legs lta bas// de la legs
ba par bgakyang bya// rgyal rigs dang khyad ldan pa dang// brang 'gro ma dngade zhin du// dag slong tshul khrims ldan pade// mkhas pas zil gyis gnan mi bya// de phyir bdag srog srung
byed pas// da ni khyad du gsad mi ga/ bdag nyid don lalegs lta bas// don la gas par sbyang bar bya// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka'
stsal pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su ya re nga ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyi song// gzhon nu dpo'i mdo
rdzogasas/// #// rgyugar skad du/ nan+dopa nananA ga rA dza dam nasUtra/ bod skad du/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nyi dag 'dzul ba'i mdo
'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshalalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin
gyi kun dga' rab n bzhugs so// khyim bdag mgonamodawas sbyin dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstanapa thosanas/ btsun pa dgo slong lnga brgyadang bcas pa sad
ba bya@#// rangs kyi dus su stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams la thugs kyis rnam par dgongs so// de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nye dga' zhes byab ye shes kyi sgo nas
mngon du byas so// de langs bar legs pa'i sa bon yod dam zhes brtags pa na/ 'din log par lta ba can dkon mchog gsum la dad pa yod par gzigs so// gzigs//
nasagadazhig 'dan khog par lta ba las rnam par grol bar bya'i phyir/ 'dul ba byed pa gnas brtanya po mo'u 'gal la gzigs so// de nas mtshan mo tho rangs kyi dus su skul
[% ]byi dor mdzad nas/ dang ldan pa kun dga' po bos te bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo dag slong lnga brgya dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'jig rten du gshegs so zhes ston/
cig/ desabatsunang bka' bzhin 'tshal lo zhes gsolanas dka slong rnams la dond smras so// de'i nyim la dga' bo nyi dag nyer bsdogs byas so// de lha'i rin po che'i stang du
zla skyi la krung gis gnas te/ lha'i gdugs dkar po bzung ngo// klu dang klu mo bar byed cing klu'i 'a khor g.yog du mas bskor te/ lha'i snod nye bar bzhag nas bza' ba dang btung ba rnam pa
sgra sna tshogs pa la rtog par byed do// donas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'irgyal po ji ltakhar gzigs so// de ltar byas pa gzigs nas de'i mgo bo'i stong gi bla bris kyi stong nyid nasalacom
ldan 'das dag slong lnga brgyudang bcas pas gshegs te/ sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i bar na don sum du gyur to// de'i tshade'i dusan glu'i rgyal po dga' bo dga' de lta
bu'i gzugs kyis sdig pa'i lta bar lhung ba lta ba ngan pa'i sems skyos so// dgasbyong mgo reg 'di nga'i stong nas sun cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'jig rten gyi gnas su gshegapa 'gyur ro// 'di ni da lta
nas nga'i mgo bo la rkang pa'i rdul mgo bo steng du lhung bar byed pa/sa 'gro yi stag ro snyam sta/ langs nas ri rab kyi rtsa bar song ngo// rang gi gzugs bor te ri bo mchog rab stong 'og
thams cad rang gi lus kyis lan bdun du dkros nas steng du gdengs ka byas te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyis mi mthob bya ba'i phyir ro// de nas tshod ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsunupa sngar bzhin gnas 'di'i phyogs su 'dug nas ri'i mchog rab mthong go/ rib mchog rab 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo// sum
cu rtsa gsum mthong ngo// rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzang mthong ngo// rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzung gi stong gi rgyal achona mthong ngo// btsun pa ci'i ci'i rkyen lags/ da ni kho
mchog rabo ma mthong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsal pa/ yul 'khor skyong 'di'i klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nyi dga' zhes bya ba khyod rnams la khros par gyur te/ ri'o
thu// mchog rab la bdun du lus kyis dkris nas stang du gdengs kas bsgribs so// mun pa mun nag tu byas nas gnas so// gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag
[”]gis 'dul bar bgyi'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba mkhyin no// de nas dang ldan pa bzang ldan dang/ tshodang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin te/ go rims bzhin du sha slong thams cad
kyis zhus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su gnang ba mkhyen no// thams cad kyi rdzas su gnas brtan chen po mo'u 'gal gyi bus btsun par dag gis gdul bar bgyi 'a ma zhes zhus pa/
y+Ya dang/ mo'u 'gal bu thul cig ces bcos ldan 'das kyis ga nang ba byin no// gnas brtan rang gi lus bor la klu'i rgyal po'i lus chen por sprul to/ dga' bo nye dga'i lus kyi steng
! du lan bcu dazhi lus kyis dkri ba dang/ de'i gdengs ka'i steng du rang gi gdengs ka bu'o// ri bo mchog rab dang bcas pa brams cad non cig ces bka' stsal ba dang/ gnas brtan
mo'u 'gal gyi bus de bzhin du byas so// de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nyingags kha rlangs kyi du ba btang ngo// gnas brtan gyis kyang khyed kyi lus la kha rlangs kyi dub yod la/ ngedal
med pa yin nam/klu'i rgyal po dag la bo nye dga'i dubos gnas brtan la gnod par ma gyur to// gnas brtan gyi kha rlangs kyi dubs klu'i rgyal po la gnod par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po rab
tul bar yo// gnas brtan gyis khyod kyi lus la 'bar ba yodapa bzhin nged la yod dam zhes 'bar bar byas so// klu'i rgyal po'i gcod kyis gnas brtan laganong par ma skyur to//
gnas brtan gyi ma 'od kyis klu'i rgyal po la gnod par gyur to// klu'i rgyal pos bsamasar// 'di'i bdag gi lus ri bo mchog rab dang bcas pa nges pa gnan nas dub dang lo 'bar bar
byed do snyam nas/ khyed gang yin ces dris so// bdag mo'u 'gal zhes bya ba'o// btsun pa rang gi gzugs kyis gnas par gyis shig/ gnas brtan gyis glu lus dor
nus de rnab ga las pa'i bug nas zhugs te/ rna ba g.yon ba'i lu gnas 'ab+hon no// yang na ba g.yon ba'i yu ga nas zhugs nas/ rnab g.yas pa'i bu ga nas 'thon no//
de bzhin du sna g.yas pa'i bu ga nas zhugs nas/ snag mon pa'i bu ga nas 'thon te/ yang sA g.yon pa'i bu gnas zhugs nas/ tsagayas pa'i bu ga nas 'thon no//
de nas klu'i rgyal bo'i kha gdangs so// gnas brtan khar zhugs nas/ gsus pa'i nang du mdun rgyab tu yang dang yang du rgyus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mo'u 'gal rdzu
'phrul cher yid la gyis shig/ klu smra'aphrul chen bo dang ldan pa yin no zhes bka' stsal to// gnas brtan kyis khatsun pa bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgoms pa dang//
mang dubyas pa dang/ brtson par byas pa dang/ gzhir byas pa dang/ rjes su bsgrubs pa dang/ 'dris pa byas pas legs par brtsams so// btsun pa
dga' bo nye dga' lta zhog/ dga' bo nye dga' dang mtshungs par brgya'i rogs dang/ stongagi tshogs dang/ 'bum gyi tshogs kyang bdag gis gdul bar nus so zhes gsol to// klu//
blo rgyal pos bsams pa// nang na rgyu ba bdag gis ma mthong ngo// phyir 'byung ba'i tshon chob gnyis kyi bar du bza' ro snyam nas/ btsun pa phyir shog/ nga'i ltonga'i nang du yang dang
[% ]yang du sgrub dang/ sdod pas ci bya zhes pas gnas brtan phyir byon nas gnas so// klu'i rgyal pos mthong nas/ 'di yin nam zhes sus te/ sna'i rlung phyir btang ngo// gnas
brtan bsaMm gtan bzhi po mnyam par thob pas/ ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu yang sna'i rlung gis bskyodapar ma nus so// de las gzhan pa 'i dag slong rnams kyis dang po rnams kyi
sku mo' phrul thums cad byad paganusakyis/ gnas 'di rnams la rab tu zhugs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi po myur du bsgrub par mi nus so// de'i phyir bcom ldan 'dasakyis klu'i rgyal
po 'dul ba de rnams la gnang ba mkhyin no// klu'i rgyal bo bdag gis dag slong 'di'i ba spu'i bu ga tsam yang sna'i rlung gis bskyod par ma nus pas rdzu 'phrul chen por bsams so// gnas
brtan gyis dag slong gi gzugasadoranas/ 'dab bzang bya khyung gi gzugs su mngon par sprul/ 'dabobazang gi lus de mthong nas klu'i rgyal po bros par gyur to// 'dab bzang gi rjes/
su 'brang bar klu'i rgyal bos rang gi gzugs dor nas bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su sprul te// btsun pa khyod la skyabs su 'gro'o zhes rjod pa 'byed cing gnas brtan gyi zhabs la phyag na
le// gnas brtan gyis ston pa'i thad du shog cig 'gro ba yin no zhes klu'i rgyal po botul nasadug mang par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kying du phyin no// klu'i rgyal pos bcom ldan
'das la phyag byas te/ btsun khyod la skyabs su la gro'o zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bka' stsal nas/ dag slong 'khor dang bcas pa mgon med brag
sprin gyi gnas su gshegs so// mgon med bras sbyin gyis btsun pa yun ring por mi byon pa ci zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mo'u 'gal gyi bu dang/ dga' bo nyi dga'
gnyis g.yul bkyicozhes bka' stsal to/ btsun pa su zhig pham su'uzhig rgyal bar gyur ces gsol pas/ khyim bdag mo'u 'gal gyi bu rgyalabar gyur/ dga' bo nyi
dga' pham par gyur tozhes bka' stsal to// mgon med zas sbyin gyis btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la zhagabadun durim pa bzhin du gdugs tshod gsol bar zhus/ gnas brtan
@#// la bkur sti dang bsti stang bgyid par zhus so// sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong lnga brgya po rnams la bkur sti dang bsti stang zhag bdunadu bgyidapara'atshal lo/
kyi bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// klu'i rgyal po dga' bo nye drags 'dul ba'i
mdo rdzogasaso/// paN+Di ta chen po nan+tab+hi'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i 'gro tsa ba shAkya'i dag slong nyimargyal mtshan dpol bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams
kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// sa'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/
rgya gar skad du/ mahA kAphyogs pa su rta/ bod skad du/ 'od srungs chen po'i mdo// 'phags pa dkona mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshol lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
dus gcig na/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ka lan ta ka'i gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po pa pu li'i phug nabazhugs te/ nad dam pos gzir
zhing sdug bsngal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das srod la'i dus su so sor thams cad rtog cing bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ga la ba der gshegs shing nye bar gshegs
ba te/ gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te/ bzhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs spyod ji ltar bza'
dga' dod dag/ ji ltar sdug bsngal myong/ ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur/ zhi bar byed pa'i thabs kyis ni zhib ma yin no// de nas dad ldan pa 'od srus nades gsolod// btsun pa bdag
ni bza' ba dang btung lam srid par gyur/ bdag nadadas pos gzir bar gyur te/ zhib 'am mi zhi bar 'gyur/ zhi bar byed pa'i thabs mdzad du gsol/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bo
'di ngas legs par bshad pa bya'o// demang du bsgoms pa byas pa na/ mngon par shes pa dang/ byang chub pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// bdun po gang zhe na/ dranang
mang dag byang chub kyi yan lag 'di 'od srungs des yang dag pa'i khyang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do// de mang du bsgoms par byas ba na/ mngon pa shes pa dang/ byang chub pa dang/ mya
ngan las 'das par gyur to// yang 'od srungs ngas chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do// de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na/ mngon par shes pa dang/
byang chub pa dang/ myang n las 'das pa gyur to// yang 'od srungs ngas brtson 'grus yang dgabyang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad do// de mang du bsgoms par byas pa na/ mngon/
u@#// par shes pa dang/ byang chub po dang/ mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// yang 'od srungs ngas dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag chub shad do// demang du sgom
ka par byas pa na/ mngon par shes pa dang/ byang chub pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// yang 'od srungs ngas shin tusbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag bshad do// de yang
zla dubasgoms par byas ba na/ mngon par shes pa dang/ byang chub pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// yang 'od srungs ngos nyid da'adzin yang dag byang chub kyi mnalag tu bshad do// de
mad du bsgoms par byas pa na/ mngon par shes pa dang/ byang chub pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// yang 'od srungs ngas btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag tu bshad
do/ de mang dubasgoms par byas pa na/ mngon par shes pa dang/ byang nub pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// da srungs 'di na byang chub kyi yan lag bdun du ngas bshad
yado de'ang du bsgoms par byas pa na/ mngon bar shes pa dang/ phyang chub pa dang/ mya nganalas 'das par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i byang
chub kyi yan lag la bslab pa 'bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'o dosrungs chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod dod/
wa00/de ma thag tu nad zhi bar gyur nas/ tshe dang ldan pa'od srungs chen po langs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po'i nad zhi bar gyur to// gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po mdo rdzogs so//
paN+Dita chen po Anan+dashu'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa 'i 'tshe ba shAkya'i dag slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis sna b rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang
chen po dang la thar ba gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// sa'i stang du nyi ma dang zla ltar gyur cig/snga 'gyur yod// ts+tsa/ rgya gar skad
du sungasU tra/ bod skad du/ nyi ma'i mdo/ 'phags bdakon mchog gsum 'gus bas phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

mnyan yod ni rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshelha'i bu nyi ma lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgrogs na 'dzin gyis bzung ngo// de nas lha'i bu nyi masakhacom ldan
'das rjes su dran pa yid la bya ste/ gi dus su tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to// sangs rgyas dpa' bo dod 'dud// thams cad myur du grol ba khyis// bdag 'di'i khar bcug
pas na// bdag ni khyodal skyabs su mchi// danas bcom ldan ' das kyis lha'i bu nyi ma'i rmad du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin la rigs su bcad pa bka' stsal ba/ sangs
tha// @#// rgyas 'jig rten la brtse bas// dgra bcom de bzhin gshegs pa la// nyi ma skyabs su song bas na// sgragacan pa dzin gyis nyi ma mthong// gang zhig mun pa snang bas
gsal bar byed// rnam snang drag po'i gzi brjid dkyil 'khor can// nam mkha'i nyi ma sgra gcan sgrib ma byed// nyin 'di ni sgrag can gyis tho zhig/ de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra
gcan 'dzin gyis lha'i bu'i la grol bar byas nas/ sngar gyi gzugs bzhin du gang su zhig gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzang ris kyi drung du song zhing song nas saMms mi dga' zhing yi
tsi mug pas ba spu langs par gyur to/ phyogs gcig tu' dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'a nas/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin la/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris
kyis tshugs subacad pa sbas pa// ci phyir yid ni skrag par 'gyur// sgra gcan 'dzin gyis nyi ma thong// gzugs kyi ma 'gyur kun tungan// ci phyir 'jigs pas 'dir lhags//
des smras pa// sangs rgyus tshigs bcad bros nasazhi// bdag gis nyi ma ma btangan// mgo bo tshal pa 'dun 'gas shing/ 'tsho bal ni bde ba med// nyi ma'i mdo rdzogs so
paN+Dita chen po A nun+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos pa'i 'khog shAkya'i dag slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dapal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag
khang chen po dpalathar ba gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// sa'i steng du 'o ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/@#/// rgyagar skad du//
tsan su tra/ bod skad du/ zla bo'i mdo/ 'phags pa dkona mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gisazos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na
rgyal byed tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu zla ba lha ma yin N+Didabang po sgra gcan 'dzin gyis bzung nas/ de nas lha'i bu zla bas bcom ldan
'das rjes su dran pa yid la byas de de'i dus su tshugs su bcad pa 'di gsol to// sangs rgyas dbang po de la 'dud// thams cad myur du grol bar gyis// bdag 'di'i kha ru bcug pas
na/ bdag ni khyod la skyabs su 'gro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba'i ched du/ lham yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin la tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa/ sangs
rgyas 'jig rten la brtse bas// dgra bcom de bzhin gshigs pa la// zla ba skyabs su song bas na// sgra gcan 'dzan gyis glu ba thong// de nas lha ma yin gyidabang po sgra gcan
'dzinagyisalha'abu zlabagrol bar byas nas/ sngar gyi gzugs bzhin du nga su zhig gi lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris kyi drung dusong zhing song nas/ somasam dga' zhing ya chug
pas ba spu langs par gyur pas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas yang lhag yin gyi dbatso sgra gcan 'dzin la/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags
bzang ris kyis tshog su bcad pa smras pa/ ci phyir yid skrag par gyur// sgra gcan 'dzin gyis zla ba thong// gzugs kyi rnama'agyur kun tungan// caphyi'i 'jigs pas 'di ru lhags
sgra gcan 'dzin gyisags pa// sangs rgyas tshigs bcad thos nas ni// zla ba bdag gis ma btang na// mgo bodol pa bdun 'gas shing// 'tsho ba la nibadab med// zla ba'i mdo
rdzogs so///paN+Dita chen po A nan+dashrI'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos bsal tsub shAkya'i dag slong nyin rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi
gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dbal thar pa gling dubasgyur cing zhus tagatan la phab pa'o// sa'i stong du nyim dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/ snga'agyur yang yod//
rgyagar skad du/ mahA oM g+ha laM sU tra/ bod skad du/ bkra shis chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// 'dis
bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodan rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de nas lha du ma rnams mtshan mo kha dog sna tshogs pa//
dang ldan pa'i 'od rnams kyis dus gcig la rgyal byed tshul lod kyis snang bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang du bzhugs pa der lhags te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas
nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa mang du zhus so// lha dang mi rnams mang po yis// bkra shis/
panibasam gyur pa// bkra shis pa la the tshom skyes// bkra shisa mchog ni gsung du gsol// lha'i yang lha yis bka' stsal pa// sdig pa zams cad rnam bar 'joms// 'jig
rten kun la phan pa'i don// bkra shis de rnams khyod la bshad// byis pa rnams la bsnyen mi bya// mkhas pa rnams la bsnyen par bya// mchod la mchod pa'i phan bya ba// 'di ni mchog gi
bkra shis so// sngar byas pa yibasod nams kyis// 'thun pa'i yul du gnas pa dang// bdag nyid mchog gi smon lam bya// 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so// bden dang lag ba'i bzo/
dang ni// 'dul ba'i sbyor bas legs par bslab// gang gis 'di ni le gas par bslab// gang gis legs par bshad pa tshig/ 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so// pha dang ma la bsnyen bkur
bya budang chungs rjes su gzung// mi mthun pa yi las dbye// 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so// sbyin ba chos kyi spyod pa dang// gnyen 'dun rnams ni rjes su gzung// kha na ma tho'o las/
mi bya 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so// sdig la dga' ba spang bar bya// chang gi btung ba rnam par spang// gang zhig chos la bag yod pa// 'dini mchog gib
[P]/ shis so// glo bur bla ma gus par bya// byas pa shes shing gus par bya// dus su chos nimahanapar bya// 'di na mchog gi bkra shis so// gangan pa ni bzod par bya// dag sbyong rnams/
tsho na mthong bar bya// dus su chos kyi 'bol gtam bya// 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so// dka' thub dang ni tshangs spyodabya// 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong bar bya// mya ngan 'das pa mngon
rasum gu// 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so/ 'jig rten chos la dris pa na// gang zhig sems ni ga lo ma bya// mya nam dwaga' mad bzod bya// 'di ni mchog gi bkra shis so// daltar
bshad par byas pa rnams// thams cad du ni rgyal ba dang// thams cad du ni 'bar 'gro/ de rnams del mchog bkra shis// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
lha de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bastod do// bkra shisa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so///paN+Ditachen po A nan khri'i zhal snga nas/ mang du thos
pa'i latsub shAkya'i dag slong nyis lamtshan dpal bzang gos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan s gtsug lag khang chen mo dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pago//
0stong dunyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/ snga 'gyur yang yod///rgyas/ra skad du/ Ar+ya kAmang ka ra pa ri pIts+tsha nAm mahA yA na sU tra/ bod
skad du/ 'phags pa bde byed kyis zhus pa zhes khyab thog ba chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i yulan/ sar skya'i gnas ni shA rnams shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dag slong lnga brgya'i dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig dubazhugru
so pa'i tshashAkya'i bu bde byed ces bya ba sor skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas//
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshol nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas shAkya'i bu bde byed bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
khadas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chos du dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ tshogs
chung dus kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mngon par sgrub par bgyid/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar bgyid/ rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gum pa'i dus
bgyid par 'gyur/ skyes nas kyang mngon bar shes pa lnga dang ldan par 'gyur/ mi khom pa thams cad rnam par spong zhing/ khom pa 'a byor pa thob par 'gyur/ gzugs
kyang thob par 'a gyur/ spobs pa thogs pa ma mchis pa dang ldan par mnga'agyur/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan zhing/ stong pa nyid la lhag par mos par yang 'gyur/ rtag tu rab tu
'byung ba la mngon par dga' bar gyur/ khyim na gnas kyang rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur lags/ de skadacos gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
shAkya'i bu gzhon nubad bud la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su zhubarasams pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/
skya bo gang po la bde ba dang/ 'jig rten la snying brtsab dang// skyabo phal bo tsho'i don dang/ lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/ legs so legs so// de'i
phyi rigs kyi'akhyod legs par rab tunyon la yid ' zhig dang/ ngas khyod la bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na ji skad smos pa'i yon tan de dag rjes su 'thob ste/
bzhi gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan zhing/ bzod pa la gnas pa de pha rol gshe yang slar mi gshabadang/ brdags kyang slar mi rdeg pa dang

ba mtshangajus kyang slar mtshang mi 'drub dang/ khros kyang slar mi khro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag da ldan ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
las phyir mi ldog cing/ ji skad smras pa'i yon tan phunasum tshogs pa yang rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to/ bde bar gshegs pas
de skad gsungs nas/ dbazhin du ston pas gzhan yang bde skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu spos kyang gshe bar mkhyod la// gnod byas gzhan la de ni gnod ma byed// de ni ma lus
sbas pa byas nas kyang// byang chub sams dpa' yon tan de dag 'thob// sdig pa'i tshig rnams rtag tu srung byed cing// sdig pa'isams kyi dbang du mi 'gro la// sdig las 'og/
rta 'bras bu de thob nas// la shes mchog nyidamyur du thob par 'gyur// skya bo gang dag 'tshog rdung dga' byed cing// khro gtum gnod par sems pa'i sems ldan rnams// sangs
rgyas ye shes yongs su sbas nas su// ma mkhaso de dag sdug bsngal mi bzad ldan// de lta bas na gzhan la ma ba chog cing// rgyudang mi rgyu rnams la dbyug pa spong// sems can
kun la phan dang snying brtser ldan// des 'dir yashes dam po myur du 'thob// skyo bo rmongs pa khros pas phil non pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i stan las de ring ste// de ni 'og lta
mi nyis brgya nyi shu tham pa// rnams kyi ngana'adzin yin// de lta bas na mkhasams dkrug mi bya// byang chub sams dpa' gang 'disi khro zhing// bden pa rjes srung gzhan la mi gnod pa//
spyad pa dkonab 'di dag rdzogs byas nas// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshonAmadzes phun sum tshogs// mi mkhas rtag tu phung zhing sdang sems ldan// pha dang ma la'ang 'di ni gus mod/
kun nas nyon mongs rtsa par rab gnasapa// skyes bu tha ma'i nyes ba 'di rnams yin// dbas rtag tubazod pa kho na bston/ dug slong chos sgar la bstan par bya// dag pa'i bshes
gnyen yongs su mi gtong ste// de la byang chub mchog ni dka' ba med// rigasakyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
lasaphyir mi ldog cing/ ji skad smos pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yang rjes su 'thob bo// bzhi gang zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di la chos don du gnyer ba dang/ chos 'dod pa dang/ sa
kyi kun dga' la dga' ba mos pa dang/ chos 'dzin pa dang/ chos ston pa yin/ bud mod yongs su spong zhing bud med la ston bar ma byed pa yin/ sbyin pa'i bdag po dang/ kun 'byed
pa'i ngang tshul can dang/ kun brgyad pa la dga' ba dang/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su slong ba yin/ stong pa nyid la mos pa dang/ stong pa nyid la gnas pa yin te/ rigasakyi
mamadabuchos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ban bod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing/ ji skad smos ba'i yon tan de dag skyab thob par 'gyu'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyis daskad ces bka' stsal to/ bde bar gshegasapas de skad gsungs nas/ de bzhin du ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can gang dag
chos ni 'dod pa dang// chos kyi don du brtson 'grus skyod pa dkon// gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed pa// de dag ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur// gzhan las thos nas lang
dag 'dzin byed cing// pha rol don du gnyer la chos ston pa// shes ldan de dag 'khor du zhus pa med// blamad byang chub mchog la reg par 'gyur// log par ltung rgyu bud med rnam par
spang rgyal sras rtag tu tshangs par spyod par 'gyur// tshangs par spyod la bstan par gnas shing// 'khor lo bla nad dam pa skyor bar byed// bud mang rnamakol son ma dga'
yodad// 'di ltar sdug bsngalanyam thago skam par 'agyur// dedag bsnyen ma'i bamad pa ste// de bas yongs su spongs la byang chub spyod// de nas shagi bu bde byed bstan pa la de thos
nas tshim zhing mgul yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ rang gi lus las rgyan bkrol te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde legs su gtor to// da/
bas// nas bcom ldan ba das kyi mthusacu nade dag bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i drang thad kyi stong gi bar snangala'an po che'i khang pa brtsigs pa zhig tu 'dug par gyur nas/ rin
po'i khang po brtsigs pa de nas mi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa lnga brgya byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la rgyan rnams 'thor zhing/ bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
yar sems bskyod nas/ tshig 'di skad cas bcom ldan 'das bdag cug gyis dag ba'i rtsa ga'adi samasacan thamasacad dad thunamod dbu gyis/bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
tsA chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes 'dzor to// de nas shAkya'i bu dad byed kyis kyang sprul pa'i mi de dag mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang lus kyi spu zing zhes byed par gyur te/ bcos
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma 'di rnams gang nas mtshis/ shar phyogs sam/ lho phyogs sum/ nub phyogs sam/ byang phyogs sam/ 'og
gam stang gi phyogs sam/ 'on te phyogs gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bum 'di rnams ni shar phyogs nas mA'ongs/ lho dang/
nub dang/ byang phyogs dang/ 'og dang/ stong gi phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshams gang nas kyang ma 'ongs rta/ 'di rnams na lha ma yin/ glu ma yin/ gnod sbyin m
yin/ dri zam yin/ lha ma yin ma yin/ nam mkha' lding ma yin / mi 'am ci ma yin/ lto 'phye chen bo ma yin/ mi ma yin/ mi ma yin pa ma yin no// sa'i khams la
mi stan/ chu'i khams lam ston/ ma'i khams lami snyan/ rlung gi khams la mi ston/ nam mkha'i khams la mi ston to// 'di dag la ni gzugs med/ tshor ba med/ 'du
gas med/ 'du byed rnams mod/ sems mod/yidamad/ rnam par shes pa med/ lasamad/ las kyi rnam par smin pa mod/ 'jig rten 'di mod/ 'jig rten pha rol mod/ 'odra
ba med/ 'gro ba med/ gnas pa med/ ramir pho mad/ skyob ched do// 'on kyang rigs kyi bu 'a di dag ni sprul pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di dag ni gzhi med pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di
dgan srogamad pa zhes bya ba yin// 'di dag skyes bu med pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di dag ni gang zag med pa zhes byab yin no// 'di dag ni mtshan nyidamod pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di dag
dben pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di dag ni stong pa zhes bya ba yin no// 'di dag ni ngo bo nyid med pa zhes bya ba yin no// bad byang rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyidu mo gang dag de ltar chos thams cad
sbrul lta bur 'a dod pa dang/ bzod pa dang/ khong du chud pa dang/ mngon par dad pa dang/ yid chesapa dang/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi
sA ba/ @#/// thu mo de dag ni ba de byedunga'i bu zhes bya'o// nga'i rjesasu skyes bzhes bya'o// snang ba 'dzin ba zhes bya'o// 'od byed pa zhes bya'o// mun pa bsal ba zhes
bya'o/ nyon mongs pa spangs pa zhes bya'o// ston ba zhes bya// bsod nams kyi zhing zhes bya'o// yon gyi gnas zhes bya'o// dag sbyong zhes bya'o// bram ze zhes bya'o// tshor ba po zhes
bya'o// glang po zhes bya'o// mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sams dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i chos dang ldan/
( pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// lung bstan pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu gang su yang rung ba dag de ltar chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mi 'dod/ mi bzod
gi 'jug/ mi mos/ mi dad/ thos nas kyang sngapazhing skrag la dngang bar 'gyur ba dang/ slar zlog pa dang/ phyir gshi ba'i rogs kyi bu de dag ni dag sbyong ma yin pa zhus bya'o// bram ze
ma yin pa zhes bya'o// mu stags can zhes bya'o// dmigs pa can zhes bya'o// dkrugasam pa zhes khya'o// sdig pa'i grogs po zhes bya'o// yongs su spang bar byapa zhes bya'o// byang chub
sams dbar ngan g.yo cazhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'chal pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' srong lta bu zhes bya'o// byang
jug sems dar la sun 'byin pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gtum pa zhes bya'o// de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bad nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
sa phyin nas/ bcos ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pasu sems can ji snyed cig gi don mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ sdig can chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khribazhi stong gis mi skyo ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// ga
slong lnga brgya len ba med par zag pa rnams las sa mas rnam par grol// dge slong ma bdun cu rtsa lngas kyang ma spyi ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa// byang chub sems dpa 'bad byang dang/ dag
bsnyan ldabargya gzhun dag kyang mi skyoba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// dag bstanam nyi shu rtsa lnga yang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing drin dang bral ba rnam bar dug ste/ de dag thams
cad kyang mi skyeba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan bar gyur to// de dag thams cad kyang 'di nas shi 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yabadag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag
med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'a jig rten gyi khams bde ba can duskya bar 'gyur ro// der skyes nas thams cad lhan ciga' thun par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angaso dpag tulong pa rnams
kyisangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'dzin par 'gyur/ rjod par gyur/ ston par 'gyur/ yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur/ dedag phyis ga'i klung gi byamasnyad
kyi bskal pa 'das nas bsal pa bzang po zhes bya ba 'dri 'di nyidal/ stong gsum gyi stodachan po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
bar rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba kha gyod cing mchims brnangs la du bzhin du 'gyur/ de nyid nas phyir 'a gro zhing tshig 'di
( skad du/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grad 'di slanamadazhi bshad du gsol zhes smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ sdig can khyod de skad ma smra zhig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ bcom
ldan 'das thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor bu 'di ni thogs pa med pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
lhachos kyi rnam grangs la de'i mid cilags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems
dpa' res ba 'byud pa zhes bya ba zung zhig/ bde byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya bar yang thung zhig/ kun dga' bo ngasachos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod lag dadado// gzung ba dang/ bklag da dang//
mtsha bshad pa dang/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ya dag der rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir yongasas gtad do// deci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu ka/ rigs kyi bu mo thog pa chen po 'byung/
dgapar zhugs pa gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs par pha rol du phyin pa ldapo dag la bskal pa'i cusud pa bas/ rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu mo ba gang zhig chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di 'dzin dang/ 'chad bdad/ glogapa dang/ kun chub par byed da dad/ gzhan dag la yang rgya nar yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang/ tha na glogs bon du byas te/
'chad bad ni/ de bas bsod nams chos mang du bskyod pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mi rigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka/'a stsal to// gang zhig tshu[r]saji sa gros
par/ bskal dbcuran sbyin byin dang// bla na med pa 'i sbyin pa zhes// de nibasngags/rami 'gyur ro// gang zhig bskal dad nu rnams su// 'jig rten pa yi tshul khrims bsrung//
de ni dmigs gnas pas na// tshul khrims de dag par gyur// gang zhig sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa// mdo sde zab mo 'di 'phapa// tshul khrims de ni bla na med// saMs/
rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yin// gang la dir bskal pa bcu rnams su// bzod pa ba'i mar gyur la// gshe bar byed pa'i sog chags rnams// kun labazod par byed sgyur
ma @#// khyad 'din tshul 'di mthosan// bzod pa de nibasngags ma yin// gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing// gzhan dag la lad rab ston na// bzod pa den
bla namad// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yin// ga ngazhag tshula'adis thos bur// bskal pa dag ni bsu rnams su// 'chag pa dag las mi 'da' yang// brtson 'grus de ni
bsdags ma yin// gang zhig sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa// mdo sde zab mo 'di la dzas na// brtson 'grus de nibanamad// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa yin// gang zhig bskal
ba bcu rnams su// bsan gtan ldan pa'i mar gyural// bsam gtan rdo ba de gnas na// bsam gtanapazhes de mi brjod// nang dang phyi rol rnams la yang// rdul tsam chos kyang
ma rtogan/ bsam gtan dan ban mod// de ni bsam gtan pa zhes bya// de ltar sbyin dang tshul khrims dang// bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus dang// bsam gtan shes rab mnyam nyid
rgyu gyis don byang chub myur thob 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad sa bkrag stsalas/ tshe dang ldan ng kun dga' bo dang// shAkya'i bu bde byad dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'o
'khor de dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs to/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstodado// 'phags pa
mtha bde byed kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba ldog pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyimakhan po pradzA wa dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsAb ban+d+he ye shes sde la sogs pas bskyar cid
zhus te gtan la phab pa//rgyagar skad du/ Ar a na bi ta nA ga rA dzapa ri pIts+tshanAm mahA ya na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa klu'i rgyal po ma drosangasazhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig
na bam ldan ral do'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dag slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dag slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang/ byang nub sums dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang
thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ 'i tshobcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas bskor nas mdunagyisabyas te chos ston to// de nas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ klu'i rgyal po
'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang/ klu'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gis bskor to/ mdun du bdar nas silasnyan dang glu dbyangs len cing// klu'i mthu chen bo dang/ klu'i rdzu 'phrul chen
bos na tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sngos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byugapo dang/ phyi ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ pa don rnams thogs te/ bcos
#// ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas phyi ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'a das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar
rdzogs pa'i ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ sbyos dang/ 'phreng pa dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dang/ sil snyan
dang phag rdob pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas shing rang gi skya bon 'khor dang phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ 'dug nas kyang
thab mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to// gal te zhusanas lub lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbyabar gnangan/ bcom ldan
kho dus de dazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhugo/ de skad cus gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du/
klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po khyedasems can rnams kyi ched du/ de bzhin gshegs dal ci 'drib zhig longs su dri ba 'dod/ gsol ba/
bcom ldan ba das bdag byang chub sems dang bar sems can gyi mchog/ sems can chen po skyes bu dam pa sang ga ltar rnam par rtsen pa'i sems can rnams kyi nad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa
ma 0 gongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan ' sa 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'a dren ba/ 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi gos pa// spyod pa dang bsam pa rnam par dag pa/ phan pa'i dngos la
yang dag par zhugs pa// gsol ba 'batab par soms can thugasacad la dag pa'i bshes gnyen bgyid pa// stobs bcu'i stobs kyi shugs la yang dag pa dazhugs pa// ngan pa'i rtogs
can gyi tshogs kyi smad yang dag dar rab tu'ajon da// bdud dang phyir rgol pa bcom pa// soms ma zhum ra// brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha shin tu pagos pa/ yid yongs su mi skyo ba/
dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs dpag dus na chis pa bsags pa/ tshul khrims dang thos pas mi ngoms pa/ sems can thams cad lasams mnyan pa// tha dad ba'i 'du shes dang bralab/ mtha'
lta ba gnyis ka dang bral ba/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa/ shes pa la mkhas pa// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs pa// zab cing gting dpag
dga' ba dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bgyid pa dang bral ba// thams cad makhyen pa gnas ma bskyod pa// busan pa rdo rje ltar brtan til phyed pa// blo zla ba ltar dri mas
gnas shing shin du dkar ba/ sams nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs pa// bskal pa grangs ma mchis par yid yongs su mi skyobar sa 'dzan pa// soms sa dad/ chu dang/ mo dang
rlung dang mnyam pa/ gnod sa mas dang/ thab dang/ zhe sdang dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyags pa dang/ dregs pas thams cad yang dag par rad pa// stong pa nyid
dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa la smon lam shin dubatab pa/ sgyum dang/ rnalam dang/ mig yor dang/ brag ma dang/ smig rgyudang/ muzla lta bu'i chos kyi tshul la shin
chu zhugs pa// sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun gyi gdung rigs 'dzin pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tubasor ba/ dga' ba dang/ mchog du ngag 'bo dang/ dang ba rab tu thob pa//
u dum wa ra'i me tog ltar 'khyung ba shin tu dka' ba/ rtse gcig bgyid pa// yid la bgyid pa ma 'dres pa/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du
bdag ra bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nanapo de bas kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos la rab tu zhugs pa rnamA
dang/ sems can rnams kyi rgyud dub dag de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu bar 'tshalan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'chos kyis rnam par
! rtson pa// rdo rje lta bu'i yon tan la 'jug pa// spyod pa zab mo dang/ gzungs kyi sgo'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa bshad du gsol/ nyan thos gdul ba'i slad du bden pa ba'i rnamapar
gdon ma 'tshal bal 'jug ba shes pa'i sgo 'jug pa// rang sangs rgyas gdul ba'i slad dubartan pa'i chos la 'jug pa shes pa sgo la 'jug pa// thag pa chen po pa gdul ba'i slad du
chos thams cad la 'jug pa shes pa'i sgo la 'jug pa// bdud kyi phyogs tshur gcod pa/ ltabar tshur pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa// na mos pa thams cad dang bralaMb/ soms/
cad thams cad kyi sems sbyong pa rab tushesal/ so so yang dag dang rig pa la 'jug/ chos thams cad rab tu ston pa// ji ltar mos pa bzhin chos las rnam par grol bar bgyid
bde= byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad du gsol/ bas
ldan 'a dus ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal dang/ rgyugs pa dang/ dregs pa bcom pas ye shes kyi stobs can rnams lags/ ji ltar na las kyi rnam par smin pa la rtan pas
chos kyi stobs can rnams lags/ ji ltar na 'jig rtenagyi zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa la sangasAmamachis pas sbyin pa'i stobs can rnams lags/ ji ltar na rnam par smin pa ma
bar bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na smon lam gyis yang dag par song zhing ngan song thams cad kun tu chud pas tshul khrims kyi stobs can rnams lugs/
ma bya@#// ji ltar na sems can sdang ba thams cad dang du len pa'i rang bzhin can pas bzod pa'i stobs can rnams lags/ ji ltar na lus dang srog la mi lta bas brtson 'grus kyi
stobs can rnams lags/ jilta na rab tu zhi ba la gnas shing bsam gtan las ldog pa yang mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi stobs can rnams lags/ jiltar na sdig pa'i lta b rnams
zlodang bral zhing/ ma rig pa dang gtiug gi mun pa dang yang bral bas shes rab kyi stobs can rnams lags/ ji ltar n samasacan yongasasu sminapar bgyi ba la longs su smin
zla par bgyi ba'i go cha 'tshal bas thabs kyi stobs can rnams lags/ ji ltar na lha'i mig dang/ lha'i rna ba dang/ pa rol gyi sems 'atshal ba/ sngon gyi skye ba dang rdzu 'phrulagyi
brgyabs rnam par rtson pas mngon par shes pa thob pa rnams lags/ ji lta na slobs pa rgyun mi 'chad cing tshug dang yi gami zad pas spobs pa'i stobs can rnams lags/ ji ltar
na gros pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin pas gzungs thob b rnams lags/ ji ltar na chos dkon mchog gcig la yang dag par gzhol bas bskyod pa ma mchis bdang/ rgya mtsho'i phyagargyu'ita'i
'dzin rab tu thob pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas la lta b rnams M par dag pa la yang dag par gzhol bsasangs rgyas rjes su dran po bskyed pa ma mchis pa rnams la gas sa
ma[4 ]la lta ba rnam par dag pa la yang dag par gzhol bas chos rjes su dran pa rab tu thob ba rnams 'gas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i dag bdun la yang dag par gzhol bas dge 'dun rjes su dran/
ba'ab tu thob pa rnams lags/ byang chub kyi sems mabaskyod pas tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa rnams lags/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa laser swA ma
mchis pasagatong ba rjes su dran bar b tu thob pa rnams 'dwags/ dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rjes su dran pas lha rjes su
dran pa bskyud pa ma mchis pa rnams lags/ donas klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhub 'di dag zhus nas/ de'i 'og tu tshugs su bcad de zhus pa// 'jig rten
phyogs rnams mdzad pa rang byung// lhag pa'i bsam dang bsam ba ci 'dra dang// 'jug pa'i spyod dang spyod pa ci 'dra ba// byang chub sems dba'a rnams la bshad du gsol// byams pa
sbyor dang snying rjes 'jug ba dang/ dga' la 'jug cing btang snyoms sgom pa dang// bsam gtan rnam thar rnams la sbyor dag pa// de ni ma smad padag la'ashad du gsol// yang dag spong
dang dran pa nyer gzhag dang// rdzu 'phrul stobs dang dbang bo lam sgom dang// byang chub yan lag bden dang yang dag rig/ yon tan 'byung gnas rnams la bshad du gsol// sbyin dul/
sdom dang tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// bzod dang des dang de bzhin brtson 'a grus dang// shes rab thob pas rab tu rtogs pa rnams// jiltar 'gyur ba de dag bshad du
gsol// mngon shes rig dang so so yang dag rig/ dran dang shes bzhin de bzhin bag yod dang// thabs dang ldan dang tshulani rtogs pa rnams// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ladengashad
blo gsol// dga' dang mchog tu dang ba yon tan dga'// 'phags pa'i sbyangs dang rig dang nor bdun dang// dgon par gnas shing nyon mongs lamachisa gnas // ji ltar 'gyur de de dag
bshad du gsol// ji ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang// gzungs la'ang shin tu rab tu gnas ba dang// rgyunami 'chad par chos ni ston ba dang// bskyod pa mamachis thos pa
'dzin par 'gyur// zhi gnas rjes su 'thun dang lhag mthong dang// shes rab zab dang shin tu blo yangs dang// ye shes mtha' yas rtogs pa mnyam med du// byang chub sems dpa'
mkhas pa ji ltar bgyur bdud kyi stobasabcom shin tu thul bar dka'// ngan pa'i tshogs can pha rol sa ba 'joms// ri rab 'dra bar mi g.yo shin tu 'phags// dga' ba'i sems
can sgrub lta bur spyod// stong pa mtshan med skyon med rnam grol dang// sgyur smig rgyu lta bur chos nges dang// 'dus byas mi las ngo bo nyid mos pa// de ni ma smad badag la bshad dugaso'
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po lags so legs so// klu'i bdag po khyod ltar sngon gyi dag bal rtsa ba'i rgyun/
ba dang/ snying rjen po ma btang ba dang/ gsol ba ma btub par sems can thams cad la dgaba'i bshes gnyen byed pa dang/ 'khor ba na yongs su ma skyor dang/ sangs rgyas dang/
sa dang/ dag bdun gyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar soms ba ni yang legs so// klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par shin tu nyon la yid
la zung zhig dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di dag dang/ yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba des khyod la bshad do// ki rgyalapo madros pas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang/ bcos ldan 'a das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po byang chub sems
dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su 'dzin to// chos gcig po gang zhin/ 'di lta sta/ sogs
thams cad mi gtong ba'i thams cad mkhyenang sams so// de'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de'ang rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis shin tubasdus pa yin te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pas bsdus pa yin/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bsdus pa yin/ byams pa chen pos bsdus pa yin/ snying rje chen pos
bsdus pa yin/ yongs su mi skyo bas bsdus pa yin// stobs kyis bsdus pa yin M/ rnam par gnon pasaM bsdus pa yi// mkhrus bsdus pa yin/ so so brtags pas bsdus
pa yon// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsdus pa yin// chos spyongapas bsdus pa yin// dag ba spyod pas bsdus pa yin/ bsdu ba'i dngos pos bsdus pa yin// sdom pas
