byamya// pa/ lus la gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i skyes par gyur/ nam mkha'i ngos nas 'di'i lha'i gos rnam pa sna tshogs pa yid du 'ong ba yang bab par gyur to// gzhan
yang dar gos kyi mar de bab pa na ji ltar skad cig de la dur khrod chen po nyi ma'i 'od zer yang mi sna bar gyur ba de ltar na nam mkha' dkyil 'khor khebs pa zhig bab bo// de nas gnas brtan kun dga'

bo'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid che ba/ lha dang mi rnams 'dun par byed pa'i ngo mtshar de mthong ba dang/ nam mkha'i ngos na gnas pa'i lha byung brgya stong du mas ca co'i sgra phyung ste/ a ma'o ngo mtshar
cha'o/ a ma'o rmad du byung ba chen po/ a ma'o gnas brtan kun dga' bo/ yon tan gyi bdag nyid chen po// a ma'o zla tsha ba nyid/ a ma'o sbyin pa'i zhing rnam par dag par gang la gos
gcig phul ba tsam gyi smon lam btab pa'i rdzas thogs nyid la bu mo ka shi mdzes dga' nor bud med kyi dbang po ma sang bar gyur nas/ skyes pa'i dbang po byung zhing 'di lta bu'i 'byor pa dang ldan
par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu de rnams rab tu dang ba'i yid kyis lha'i me tog gi rab 'bebs pa dang/ lha'i rol mo shin tu brdung bar gyur to// de nas skyes bu ka shi mdzes dga' bo gnas
brtan kun dga' bo'i che ba'i mthu stobs kyi shin tu yid du 'ong zhing bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod pa 'phral du sminapa'i 'bras bu la bltas to/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur pas 'dun par gyur pa'i
soms kyi rgyud la mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas spu ldang bas lus rtsub da ra byas pa dang/ langs te pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te// gnas brtan kun dga' bo la stod pa byed
la zhugs gaM/ gang gis de nyid mgo mdabadag/ khyod kyis bdag la srog stsal ba// shin tu rnam dag yon tan bsags// dpag yang nod dka' phyag 'tshal lo// rnam dag ye shes spyan
ldan pa// gal te khyod skyabs ma mdzad na// bdag srog lhag ma ma mchis te// grub khyod bdag srog rtsol ba lags/ ama'o yon tan bdag khyod// a ma'o sems can phan bzhed pa// gang
zhig nyam thag mi bzad pa// 'di las 'gro ba khyod kyis bskyabs// a ma'o khyod ni sbyin pa'i zhing// shin tu rnam dag rab rIdadakag/ gang la gos gcig phul bas kyang// rin chen 'di 'drathob
par gyur// bdag gis thub pa ru khyod la// da ltar gos gcig phul ba yis// 'bral du 'bras bu bzang bo 'di// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pathob// nyes pa chen po dag gi yang// gzhir 'gyur
bzhin du shes pa gang/ bud med nyid da de spangs nas// skyes pa nyid du bdag gyur to// de yang lha dang 'dra ba 'di// lha yirgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// nam mkha' las kyang gos kyi nar// yid du
'ong ba ba bab par 'gyur// bzhin bzangs yon tan ldan 'di la// gang zhigabasnyen bkur mi byed pa// rmongs sogs nyon mongs dga rnams kyis// skal ngan de ni bslus pa yin// des de ltar gnas
khartan kun dga' bo la mngon par bstodanas/ las kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong ba dang/ soms pa la zhugs te/ da ni bdag nyid 'o nga ba dang/ yid dumi 'ong ba las

kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du slar yang khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ des gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas snasar/ lags/
pa bdag lags r 'i gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyan par rdzogs nas dag slong gi dngos por gyur nas/ gnasabartan gyi thad du tshangs par spyad par bgyi'o// des yang gnasabartan
kun dga' bos rab tu byung ba nas/ jiltar nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dragra bcom pa 'bras bu thob par gyur pa de ltar chos bstan to// de nas bar skabs der ded dpon nyi ma chung ma dang
bcas pa bu dang bral ba'i mya ngan gyi sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing/ rgyal bo'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi dbus kyi sum mdo na/ sa las ldang zhing bdag nyid 'gyal bar gyur par/ yang dang yang sa la 'gro
ldog par byed cing/ lag pa gnyis kyis dag nyid la brtags te/ kyi hud bu kyi hud bu zhes nyam thag pa'i sgra'i nga ro mthon ra gyurapa na/ ded dpon nyi mas gnas brtan kun dga' bo nam mkha'i
dkyil nas byon te/ gzhon nugaser mdog yongs su skyob cing/ dur khrod chen po na ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung bas bzhugs so zhes thos pa dang/ yang chung ma dang bcas par bdud rtsi'i rgyun lus la
byug pa bzhin du yid mchog du dga' ba dang/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob pa bzhinangu mchog tu dga' ba skyes par gyur nas/ dA'i mod la langs te rings par 'gro ba'i gom
stabs kyis rgyal po'i khab nas phyung ste/ dur khrod chen por phyin pa dang/ ji srid cig na gzhon nu gser mdog ston ka'i zla ba rgyas pa sgra gcan gyis zin pa las rnam par thar pa lta bur gnas
brtan kun dga' bo'i gam du 'dug pa de dang/ gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i yon tan gyi stobs las byung ba'i 'byor pa yang mthong ngo// de nas lha dngami'i yid sdud par byed pa'i rmad du byung
ba'i cho 'phrul de yang mthong nas/ gnas brtan kun dga' bo la yid mgu ba skyes te/ mchog tu dad pa'i shugs kyis brlan pa'i nyams kyi rgyud dang/ lus thams cad kyis/ gnas brtan kun
dga' ba'i zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te/ langs nas bus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te/ dga' ba'i mchi ma'i chu rlabasakyis bzhin gyi pang khebs pa dad/ thal mo sbyar te/ gnas brtan kun dga'
bo lasod par byad par brtsams ba/ ama'o skal ba ze khyod kyi// bdag nyid chen po ston mdzad pa// gang zhig nyam thag mi bzad las// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i skyabs mdzad do// a ma'o thug
brtse'i bdag nyidache// e ma'o ye shes phun sum tshogs// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pa bzhin// rnam dag yang dag bstan pa mdzad// de bzhin bdag gi bu sdug 'di// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho
chen bo las// thugs rje'i ye shes dag gi mthus// khyod kyis yang dag ston par mdzad// gal te 'di la khyod kyis ni// de nyid dgongs par ma mdzad na// bdag ni chung mar
bcas pa 'di// yun ring sdug bsngal 'dam rdzab nug/ thugs rjen pos sras kyi mchog/ khyod nyid ring byon nas su// bdag bu'i sdug bsngal rgyamachobasgral// myang 'brog las rnam par bton//
mya ngan rang bzhin snying las tharaM/ mya ngan bcom lalas byung zhing// mya ngan nyon mongs 'jigs las grol// sdug bsngal gzab lasaM thar par gyur// mya ngan 'dam gyis deng ma gos// mya ngan mor
mas ma zung cing// mya ngan sbrul gyis ma zin la// mya nganamada' yis ma phogago/ madran ral gris ma bcad cing// mya ngan dgu yis ma rnyed la// mya ngan chu srin gyis ma zin// mya ngan ma yis ma
bsregs so// khyed nyid kyin soms can tshe// de ring dbugs ni 'byin mdzad cing// mig ni phyu par mdzad pa dang// med kyang tshim par mdzad par gyur// gang gis 'di ltar skyabs mdzad pas//
bdag cag mchog tu dga' 'gyur te// kun dga' zhes bya'i mtshon rtags da// a ma'o don dang bcas par gyur// donas dadadapon nyi mas gnas brtan kun dga' bo la bsod nas langs te/ gzhon
nugaser mdog gi gam du song nas chung ma dang bcas pas mgul nas dam du 'khyud de/ yang dang yang 'o byas la/ rab tu dga' ba las byung ba'i mchi mas kun tu khengs pa'i mig dang/ gzhonazhugs
mdog la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhipasas pa// ston ka'i zla rgyas gzugs kyi dpal// mdas dang gzi ni'aphrog pa'i lus// yid la re ba brgyas thob pa// mthong gis khyed la slar yang blta//
snum zhing sngo la yangs pa dang// mtha' mar mig ni bsngags 'os pa// khyad gdong gnas brtan kun dga' bo// byon nas slar yang blta ba yin// de nas gzhon nugasar mdog 'khor ba'i nyes
pas kun tu skyo ba'i sems dang pha dang ma la gnang la gsol te/ gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i nga pa gnyis la btud nas/ gnas brtan bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu
byung zhing bsnyan par rdzogs nas/ dag slong gi dngos po thob par gyur nas/ lags par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par sbyad par 'tshal lo// de'ang gnas brtan kun dga' bos rab tu
byung nas/ ji ltar 'di skad cig ma de nyid lanyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa de ltar yang dag par rjes su bstan pa dang/ des kyang dgra bcom pa nyidathob sta/ sngon
gyi skyab gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par bltas par brtsams pa dang/ jitsam pa bdag nyid bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan par mthong bas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag nyid kyis 'di
ltar shes kyis/ nganibasod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin pa ra shes la/ ngas ni ji tsam zhig sbyin pa byin pa dang/ bsod nams byas pa mthar phyin par 'gyur ba yin l/ de ni da ltar yang sems
can rnams bsod nams gus pa bskyod par bya ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyi bdag nyid che ba bstan par bya'o snyam mo// danas gos de rang gi lus las bud pa dang/ yang de lta bu'i

tshashaganyis pa byung bar gyur to// de nas yang dang yang du dbud par brtsams pa dang/ de bzhin du yang dang yang du byung bar gyur to/ des phud cing ludacing gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i mdun du gos kyi phung bo chen po/

zhig byas laM/ gos kyi phung po de dag kyang shin tu na chab/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar gyi phung bo la nyi ma 'char kha'i 'od zer gyis phog pa ltar 'od 'bar bar 'dug pa la skya bo chogs mang pos bltasanas
wA mchog tu ngo mtshar gyi dga' ba'i yid kyis smras pa// a ma'o ngo mtshar che ba/ a ma'o rmadadubyung ba/ e ma'o bsod nams kyi bdag nyid chen po// a ma'o legs par byas pa'i bsod nams kyibadag

nyid chen po 'dis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par rin po che'i gos phud du zin kyang mthar thug pa yang mi snang ngo// de nas des gos de rnams kyang pha dang ma labyin la/ de gnyis kyis kyang gnas brtan kun dga'
bo lasogs pa dag slong gi dga' dun thog mar byas pa nas/ ji srid dur khrod chen por 'dus pa'i skya bo'i tshogs chen po rnams la byin te/ der srog chags re re la yang gos thung re bskon yang/ dag
slong gser mdog gi bsod nams kyi mthus gos de yang yongs su gtugs par ma gyur to// de nas dag spong gser mdog stong gi nam mkha' la mngon bar 'phags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rgyal po'i/
[o]khab kyi grong khyer du song nas/ sum mdo'i dbus su 'dug ste/ mdun du gser mdog can gyi gos lus las phud cing gos kyi phung po chen po byas te/ sgras rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer ga ngas shing
smras pa// shesaldan dag ngas gos kyi phung po 'di yongs su btang gis/ khyad rnams gang la ji tsam dgos pa de tsam yong zhig ces bsgrags pa thos pa dang/ skad cig ma de nyid la srog chags
ba stong dang ga tu med pa la dus par gyur pa dang/ jitsam na grong khyer gyi dbus kyi sum mdo na gsar gyi mdog can gyi gos samado'i phung bo shin tu che ba/ 'dzam bu'i nubo gsar gyi phung po ta
nyi ma 'char ka li bod kyis phog pa ltar 'bar bar gyur pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa gsar gyi mdog can gsar btso ma'i rtswa ltar dpal gyis mchog tu 'bar zhing nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug
pa mthong ba dang/ skye bo'i tshogs mang po mchog du ngo mtshar gyis bsdus pa'i sems kyis rgyud dang mchog tu dga' ba'i rlabs kyis gang ba'i bzhin pad+ma dang/ de la lta zhing bsams pa dang/ e
ma'o ngo mtshar che/ a ma'o rmad du byung ba/ bdag nyid chen po' dos las gang zhig byas na/ gang gis 'di lta bur rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu chapar 'gyur ba/ gal te bdag cag rnams kyis kyang

da ltar byas te/ gang gis bdag cag rnams kyang de ltar bsdu che bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes mngon par 'dod pa skyes shing/ som nyi'i dpyang thagal 'jubazhin du phan tshun sla bar rtsom pan/ de rnamA
'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni 'di ltabadag nyid chub/ rdzu 'phrul zla ba/ mthu che ba/ brtul zhugs grub ba/ lha'i shes pa dang ldan pa yin pas 'di nyid la yongs su
dribar bya'o snyam mo// de nas skyo bo'i tshog sachen po de ngo mtshar gyis mchog tu mig gdangs pa dang/ lag pa thal mo sbyar to/ nam mkha'i dkyil du zhenapar lta zhid/ tshe dang ldan pa gsar mdog
phyag byas te sa gcig tu sa la// lha yi tsha shes spyan dang ni// skal ba chen po khyod ldan bs// gang gis khyod ni mthu che ba// den la de dag bshad pa'i rigs// 'jig rtan 'di dang pha rol tu//
longs spyod dang na yon tan rnams// phun tshogs gang gis thob par 'gyur// de na bdag cag la bshad rigs// de nas sems can chen po de// snying rjes drangs pa'i yid ldan pas// da dgachem pa'i
tshig chagyi// sgras na phyogs rnamaga' bongs par 'gyur// 'di nyid don ni bshad ba'i phyir// khyed rnams la ni ngas 'di bstan// go rims bzhin du ngas bshad kyis// nga yi tshig 'di mnyen par
gyis 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// longs spyod dang ni yon tan rnams// phun tshogs bsod nams kyis 'thob cing// bsod nams kyis bdag rdzu 'phrulan// gal te sdug bsngal khyang mi
'dod// bde ba phun sum tshogs 'a dod na// kha sod nams sogs pa bde 'gyur bas// myur ba nyid du bsod nams kyis// 'jig rten 'didad pa rol tu// bde ba gang ci'ang rung ba dang// mya ngan/
[z/ ]'das pa thob pa ni// bsod nams nyid kyi 'bras bu yin// nor can tshong dbon bram zad ng// ded dpon la sogs gang dag ni// longs spyod rgya chen spyod 'gyur ba// dunapasod nams 'bras bu yin/
mngon par yid dga' bu dad 'khor// mdza' ba la sogs phun tshogs pa// gang zhig mi la yod gyur pa// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// gzugs dong mdangs ni phun sum tshogs// yid
dngamig ni 'phrog byed ga/ 'a thob cing mi yul rgyal srid gang// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin/ mi phyed pa yi 'khor nyidadang// mi zad nor gyi thun sum tshogs// mi yul na ni nges thob
gang da ni bsod nas 'bras bu yin// skye ba dran zhing skal bzangs dang// thos ldan tshig ni bzung bar 'os// mis ni gang zhig 'thob 'gyur ba// de nibasod nams 'khras bu yin// longs
spyod phun tshogs rgya chen dang// rtag par gnyin dang lhan cig tu// dga' bsam yul gang spyod pa// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// grangs med nor gyi phun tshogs dang// 'gran zla med cid
brtan pa nyid// mal gang zhig sprod 'gyur ba// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// gang zhig sgyu mi snyan gling ni// bdag gi mad cing yongs 'dzin med// ma yi tshe ni ngos gyurd// de ni bsod
nams khras bu yin// 'bras kyi sA lu'i 'bras bun// ma rmos par n na ba// gang zhig de ni mi rnams sbyor// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// dpag bsam shing las sna tshogs pa'i//
gos dang rgyan rnams byung ba yis/ mi rnams rab tu gangs gyur pa// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin/ gang zhig sgra thag sgra mi snyan gling// mi rnams 'phros pa'i rjes
thogasal// den lha rnams dag tu skyes// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// bdud rtsi 'bras cha nasogs phun tshogs// sa bla yi ni lhabu ltar// lha yi longs spyod 'a sprod pa// de nibasod nams
( 'bras bu yin// gang gi mthu yis rgyal po'i dpal// lha 'dra'i phun sum tshogs thob pagi/ mi yi dbang por rnam mdzes pa// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// byis pa ra 'khor lo sgyurapa nyid
sa chen la ni longs spyod thong// lha dbang bzhin du rnam mdzes gang// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// ma lus pa yi mi rnams dang// rin chen bdun sogs phun tshogs pa'i// 'khor lo sgyur
la spyod pa gang// de na bsod n sa 'bras bu yin// phun tshogs sum du rtsa dbang 'dra// thob nas gang zhig spyod pa dang// thag bzad sangs sogs lha rnams la// don bsod nams 'bras bu yin//
rgyu khajig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams kyi// nor gyi gzhi yi 'byor pa la// dga' bas sna tshogs longs sbyong gang// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// dga' ba'i tshal la sogs par ni// lha mo rnams dang
lhan cig tu/ 'byor pa lha rnams spyod pa gang// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// sna tshogs lha yi rgyal srid sogs// phun sum tshogs la lha dbang// rtag tungaga' bsasprod pa dang// de ni bsod
03 nags 'bras bu yin// gzhal yas khang gnas lha rnams ni// ji ltar mngon 'dod lha rnams kyi// longs spyod la longs sbyod gang// de ni bsod nams 'a bris bu yin// gang su gnas na bzhu
bo yi nga tshodang mdog la sogs pa yis// lha rnams las kyang lhag pa'i lha// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// 'dod khams mchog gyur sna tshogs pa// lha yi longs spyod phun sumatshogs/
'dod khams dbang phyug laspyodagag/ de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// lha rnams dang tshigs rnams su// ji ltar dga' ba'i 'dod pa ni// 'bad pa med pa thob rgyur gang// de bsod nams 'bras bu/
min ngagang 'ang tshungs pa lasogs bag/ bsam gtanas pa bsam gtan gyi// bde ba'i dam pa thob gyur ba// da ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// bsam gtan bsam gtan las byung ba//
srid pa khrid pa'i bdeb gang// zhi ba'i bde ba thob gyur pa// de ni bsod nams 'a brasa'u yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan zlos gang// lon tana mchog dang ldan gyur cing// rdzu 'phrul mozhing bag
nyid ni// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// gang yang bskal pa brgya 'das nas// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang nuban/ bdag nyidar ba thob gyur pa// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// tshod med
dang dmadapa'i// yon tan gyis legs brgyan pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas su gyur pa gang// de ni bsod nams 'bras bu yin// gzugs dang lang tshobasngags par 'os// skyes bu rigs
kyi rgyunagyur dang// rang dang rjes bskrun yid 'phrog pagi/ bud med bsod nams dag gis 'thob// bsod nams kyis ni mtho ris thog/ lha yi bu mo'ang bsod namA
kyis 'dod pa kun yang yang dag 'byor/ mngon 'dod bsod nams rnams kyis kha thob// bsod nams kyisan blonodang// dbazhin blo gros dri med ba thob// bsod nams kyis na gnas 'dad/
bsod nams kyis na dranagasala'athob// sdug ba nyid dang sgrumakhas dang// dbyangs snyan grags ldan bsod nams kyis// dag ba'i bshes gnyen 'byon pa rnams// thams cad bsod nams
dag gis 'thob// bsod nams kyis ni mi 'thob pagi/ bde ba 'jig rtenadogazhamed// de bas bde ba 'dod rnams kyis// rtag tubasod nams bsags par byas// dbazhin gshegs pa rnams
gzigs la// bsod nams nyung zad ngas byas pas/'brasabu shin tu rgya che ba// jaltar mngon par 'dod pa 'thob// 'dod khams lha tshogs drug po ru// rgyal srid dbang phyug bdag po ni// skyabastong
phrag bye ba ru// da las bde ba yang dag spyad// dpagamada' gran zla med pa dang// de bzhin mi yi dam pa yi// 'khor lo sgyur sogs rgyus yis// nga yis longs spyod phun tshogs spyad// bsod nams
de yi bdag nyid cha/ dazhigang dang/ ra skyes pa// dadang gzhi mthug gi/ bde dang bdag ni ldan par gyur// gzug ldan thos pa phun sum tshogs// kha nas up+pal dri byung zhing// sdug cing tshug ni
0 gzung 'og dang// shin tu yid 'od dpyadas snyan ldan// da lta'od bsod nams de nyid kyis// nga yi gzugs sogs yon tan ni// phun sum tshogs shing yid 'ong// mngon par 'a dod pa 'di la
so sogs longs sbyod pa yi// rgyal non rigs su skyes pa dang// 'dzam khu nu bo'i gsar ba dra ba// gos kyis lus la bkab pa yin// nga'i lus yun lag thams cad las// tsan dan
lta bu'i dri 'byung zhing// kha nas ut+pal sngonubo yi// drinyid 'byung bar gyur ba yin// gos dang yin chen la sogs pa// phun tshogs gang zhig mngon 'dod na// de yang bsams pa tsam gyis ni//

tham cad du ni 'byor bar rgyug/ shAkya seng ga'i bstan pa la// rab tu byung ba ngas redanas// dgra bcom nyid ni ngas thob ste// nganabasil la rgyur mya ngan 'das// nga yi skye ba phrag sta// yang srid bdag la
sa yod ma yin/ gnas mad mya ngan ba das nas ni// slar yang ngani 'ong mi 'gyur// rnam smin 'bras bu rgyas pa yi// las gang bsgrub par gyur ba na// de 'dra'adi ltar bod zin kyang// de yimathar thug
mgatogs so// de ltar de las rmadadu byung ba dang/ dbag tumed pa drang/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams gyi chab 'i bdaganyithos pas/srog chags brgya stong bya ba dpag tu med pa
mchogatu dad pas brlan ba 'i sems kyi rgyud dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba largyab kyis phyogs pa rnams kyang sbyin pa na gtong/ bsod namasan byed cing/ so na lam
'debs par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gser mdog gis skye bo'i tshogs mang po de ltar rnam pa du mar bsod nams la gus pa bskyod par bya ba'i phyir/ bsod nams bdag nyid mig
ngang tshu bshad nas/ stong gi nam mkha' de nyid nas rdza'aphrul gyis dur khrod chen po song sgyu/ gnas brtan kun dga' bol sogs dag slong gi dga' dun rnams rims bzhinadu phyag byas nas/ phyogs
gcig tu bgago/ de nas rgyal bo ma skyes dgras blon po rab gtum phrag dog gi rang bzhin gyis bu mo ka shi mdzes dga' mo la sdug bsngal 'di dang 'di byas la gzhon nugasaramadegal skur pa btab
ste/ nyes pa med pa nyid dugasad pa'i phyir yongs su spangs so zhes ltar grags pa thos so// thos nas kyang shin tu khros pas 'khrugs pa'i mig gis nang 'khor rnams la smras/ shis ldan dag

ci'i phyi lta bu'i skyes bu ngan pa 'dis las su bya ba'i tha snyad bya/ blon po rab gtumanings rnam pa thams cad du spangs so// blon po rab gtum yang de nyid du 'dus par gyur to// de nas blon po rab gas
rgyu gyis rgyal po'i tshig de thos pa dang/ 'chi ba'i 'jigs skrag cing yi mug rmongs pa'i mig gis yanalag thams cad rab tu 'dar bzhin du myur bar langs te/ rings par bros par brtsams pa dang/
deskya bo'i tshogs mang bo'i nang du zhugs te gnas pas/ de phyin s srog chags brgya stong du ma zhig gis bdas te/ skya bo'i tshogs mang pos kun nas yongs subaskor nas bzung ngo// bzung nas kyang/
0 ]thal lcag dang rdog pa la sogs pas bsnun pa la zhugs te/ de brdegs bzhin dushin tu sdug bsngal drag po'i shugs kyis nyam thag cing cho nges 'debs pa la zhugs pa// 'phags pa kun dga' bo yongs/
su skyobs shig/ bdag ni mgon med// skyob pa med pa/ skyabs med pa// snang ba yod pa lags kyis/ sdug pa'i srog gis bskyab tugasol/ gnas brtan kun dga' bos kyang skye bo'i tshogs mang
bo la sbas pa/ shes ldan dag khyed rnams kyis 'dim gsad cig/ ngasargyal po ma skyes dag la shes par bya'o/ de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i rig mnos nas de
tang ko/ gnas brtan kun dga' bos kyang rgyal po lagazigs pa dang/ rgyal bos gsol pa/ ci zhig gsung/ gnas brtan kun dga' bos sas pa/ rgyal bo 'di thong zhig/ rgyal pos gsol
ba dam zhig bcas la gtad bar bgyi// gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos la dul ba la rab tubyung nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas brtan gyi bstan bkur bgyid na gtang bar bgyi'o// gnas brtan/
kun dga' bos smras pa// de bzhin du bya'o// de'ang skya bo'i chogs de rnams kyi bcud mad par brdegs pa sdug bsngal drag po'i nor bas bcom nas brgyal te la dug pa dang/ gnas brtan kun dga' bos/
tshe dang ldan pa gsalam dog la gsungs la/ bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis blon po rab gtumagyi lus la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rab tu sol cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa gsar mdog sems can thams cad
[s ]// la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas rab tu zhugs pa'i sems dang/ bdenapa'i byin gyi rlabs byed pa la zhugs te/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis blonapo rab ba/tum 'di ltar

shin tu gnod pa byed pa yin yang/ bdag gis na khong khro ba phran tshogs kyang m skyod pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des 'di'i lus la sdugabasal gyi tshor ba mad du slar sos par gyur cig/ bden pa'i
byin gyi rlabs byas pa'i mod kho na la blon po rab gtum gyi lus sdug bsngal gyi chor ba dang bral te/ lus bdabang gyur nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bsan pa la shin tu dad par gyur nas/ gnas brtan

kun dga' bo'i gan du song ste zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas smras pa// gnas brtan kun dga' bo bdag ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste bsnyan par rdzogs shing dag slong gi dngos po

thob par bgyis la/ bdag gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyipara'atshal lo// de nas gnas brtan kun dga' bos kyang rab tu byung ste/ ji ltar de skad cig ma de nyid la nyon mongs
pa thams cad sa nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob ba de ltar rjes su bstan pa dang/ des kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang/ de nam mkha'i dkyil du'aphags te/ mo'i phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pas skye bo'i
tshogs mang po yid tshim par byas nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas babs to/ gnas brtan kun dga' bo lasogs pa dag slong gi dag bdun rnams la rims bzhin du phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/

[ro]/denas rmad du byud pa de dang/ gnas brtan kun dga' rdo'i se bdag nyid chab mthong nas/ 'khor de rnams gnas brtan kun dga' bo la rab dad pa gyur to// de nas 'khor de rnams de ltar mngon par dad pa
la gzigs nas/ gnas brtan kun dga' bosagang zhig thos pas srog chags brgya stod dpag tumad pa rnams kyis khyadapar chen po thob par gyur pa de ltar chos bstan par mdzad de/ la las rgyun/
du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob ba nas/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas pa'i bar dang/ la la ninyan thos kyi byang nub tu sos bskyod pa nas// la la ni sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang/ chos la 'bad

pas// dge 'dun la bag pa'i bar la rnam par bkod do// ded dpon nyi ma nub dang bcas pas kyang bden pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas lha brgya stong dpag tu med pa rab tu dang ba'i yid dang ldan pa rnams kyis
lha'i gos kyis phab cing/ lha'i rol mo rnams kyang brdungs par gyur pas dang/ lha'i ma tog ut+pal dang/ pad+madang/ ku mu da dang/ butsA'i ka dang/ man rab la sogs pa ma tog bus mo nub pa tsam

mal sna tshogs pas dur khrod chen po der gcal par bkram mo// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras lha dang mi rnams shin tu 'dun bar byed pa'i 'phrul rmad du byung ba de mthong ba dang/ mchog tudad pasasams

kyi rgyud dga' bar gyur nas ched du brjod pa nyid du brjod de/ a ma'o ngomatshar ba/ ama'o rmad du byung ba/ a mgo 'phags pa kun dga' bo rang gi yon tan gyi bdag nyid chen po rab tsubastan te/ a ma'o de
tsa spya// bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i bdag nyid che ba bsal bar mdzad pa/ ma na kho gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
mkhyen cing gzigs pa de dang/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos 'di la bstan pa rnam par g tad la de ni 'bras bu yod par mdzad do// e ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma nub par gyur nas/ 'phags pa kun
dga' bo'i rigs rang gi yon tan gyi 'od zer gyi dra bas phyogs thams cad khyab par mdzad do// a ma'o de bzhinagshegs pa'i zla ba mi rtag pa la ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gnagyis zin nas/ 'phags pa

kun dga' bo'i zla bas de ring blo gros kyi 'od zer rnam par brtse bas gdul bya'i ku mu ta'i nags rab tu rgyas par mdzad do// a ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngalab rtsub pa'i nyi ma'i zegyis
kun tu ga/dus pa// gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i sprin chen pos rang gi gsung gi bdud rtsi'i char gyis 'jig rtan rnams tshim par mdzad do// a ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la dgongs pa mang dag par
rdzogs bar mdzad do// a ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i sgrub skyid bstan par mdzad do// a ma'o de bzhinagshegs pa'i bstan pa gces par 'dzinapa nyid gsal bar mdzad do// ama'o tan
thos kyi mchog nyid 'brasabu yod par mdzad do// shin tu rmad du byung ba 'di dang rang gi yon tan gyi bdag nyid chab stobs dang/ mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams rdzogs par mdzad pas thams cad

[zl]mkhyen pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid chab rab tu mdzad do// amakho bdag nyid chen po 'dis bcom ldan 'adas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de'i bka' drin la lan glan pa'i blo gros ston par mdzad pa yin no// de
nas rgyal bo de gnas brtan kun dga' bo la rab tu dad pa'i shugs kyis bsdus pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang/ gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i gan du song ste/ lus thams cad kyis gnas brtan kun dga'
kho ra ma sa gnyis la phyag byas te// langs nas pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te rab tu dad pas ba spu langs pas rtsub par byas pas lus dang lag ba thal mo sbyar te/ gnas brtan kun dga' bol
man pa ba stod pa'i rtsom pa/ skyes bu'i mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// thos pa'i rgya mtshophyag 'tshal go/ rgyal ba'i bstan pa gces 'dzin pa// rmad byung bsam yas phyag 'tshal lo// sa ma'o sangs/
rgyas bstan pa yi// bdag nyid ba yang dag bstan// rmad byung bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'gro la phan bde khyod kyis mdzod// gang de bcom ldan 'angs dang ni// 'phags pa 'od srungs blo ldan ng//
khyod la kha stan pa rnams gtad pa// deng de 'bras bus par maMdzad// rmad byung bsam gyis mi khyab pa// bgro ba'i don chen mdzad pa 'di// kun mkhyen yon tan bdag nyid che// de ring khyod la gzugs
bar n rgyug/ gal te rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// de ltar 'gro dona mdzad gyur kyang// 'di ni kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs// thugs rjeldan pas mtshar yin// khyad ni nyan thos nyid 'gyur zhing//
tsa bla@#// thugs rje che ldan ji bzhin du// sams na don chen gang mdzad ba/ 'di ni'i tu ngo mtshare// ma ma bo 'di ltar bag med pa// ma ga d+ha yi skye bo 'dis// khyed 'dra ba la
brtson mdzad pa// rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas la de ni// bstan pa khyod la gtad gyur pa// gang gis dang ni bde gshegs bzhin// rmad byung shin tun bo mdzad//
de nas de gnas brtan kun dga' bo'i yon tan gyi bdag chen po'i rimatshar gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su drananas rtag tu phyag 'tshal ba/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis
lha mchog/ gang khyod nyan thos 'di lta bur// rtag tu 'gro la phan brtson pa// dpa' chen po la phyag 'tshal bstod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che// mthong ba nyid du yang dag bstan// jiltar
'gro chogs 'di khyed kyis// stong pa smin pa snyam du sems// de nas rgyal pos/ gnas brtan kun dga' bo la zhusab/ gnas pa rtan dod dbon nyi ma chung ma dang bcas pas sug las ci zhig bgyis na/

las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug pa dang/ nor che ba dang/ longs spyod rtsa bar gyur ba dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyi bstan pa la bden pa mthong bar gyur/ dag slong ka shamadzes dga' bo dang dag slong bab
gtumagyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ gang gis phyug pa dang/ nor ba dang/ longs spyod che bar rgyas shing/ bcom ldan 'das kyibastan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra
[ra ]bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis/ dag slong gser mdog gis las ci zhig bgyis na/las de'i rnam par sminapas phyug cing nor la/ longs spyod rtsa ba'i rigs su skyes shing/ gang ltar gzugs
bzang ba dang/ blta na sdug pa dang/ mdzes pa dang/ yan lag dang/ nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa dang/ gser btso ma'i mdog gi kha dog gi shin turgyas pa dang ldan pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi yi
dang mig 'phrog pa dang/ gsar gyi mdog can gyi gos kyis lus dkris pa dang/ 'di'i yan lag thams cad nas tsan dan gyi dra byung ba dang/ 'di'i kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung ba dang/ de skyes pa
tsam gyis khyim der gos kyi char dang/ ma tog ka bzhika rara'i char ba bab par gyur cing/ gos de dag kyang gsar gyimadog can nyid du gyur pa dang/ 'di ltar shin tu rdzu 'phrul tshe//
mthu rgyab dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis pa lags/ gnas brtan kun dga' bos ba gsungs pa
rgyal bo chen po 'di rnams nyid kyis sngon gyi skyab gzhan dulas gang zhig byas shing bsags bas/ 'di rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig kha sa so so myong bar 'gyur/ rgyalapo chen
bo las byas shing bsags pa dag pa dag ni sa'i khams la rnam par smin pa ra mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma 'gyur/ me'i khams la ma gyur/ rlung gi khams lam 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dag pa dang/
@#@#// ma dag pa byas shing bas bdas ba dgan zin pa'i phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par gyur te/ las rnams bskal ba brgyar yang ni// chud mi za ba 'a nga chogs
dang dus// red na lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ 'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
bar gzigs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba

sna bla na med pa// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ dganyen ldan zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung// gnyen ldan gyi tshal zhes bya ba na bzhugs so//yang de'i

tshado'i dus na rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan n rna can zhes bya ba ded dpon phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod dang/ yongs su bzung nga/ yas shing rgyab/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa// rnam thos

kye kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran ba/ rgyal bo'i pho brang gnyen ldan na skyes bu'i mchog tu gyur ba zhig gnas pa dang/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse ba khyod/ dag 'a bar

byed dag 'a mgur spyod pa byed do// de ltar rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pas chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur pa nas/ ji srid ded dpon n can chod pa lnga brgyas bskor te/ rgya mtsho chen po gzhug/

[/]kyi bar du smra'o// de'ang mngal du ji ltar skye bar gyur pa de ltar ded dpon can gyi tsho sar gtogs pa dang/ zhing du gtogs pa dang/ yul gzhan dugatogs pa'i nor gyi rigs las der la la ni mas tshig
la ni rkun mas khyer/ la lan mi rnams kyis khyer te khros par gyur to// ji tsam naded dpon nan gyi chung ma zla ba tshang ba dang bu rgyas par gyur to/ pags pa nyag bo shin tu gzugs mi sdug pa mi

sdug pa'i mtshan ma bco brgyad kyis lus smad bar bya ba/ de'i kha dang de'i lus las gang zhig bsnams na khyim na gnas pa'i 'khor shin tu' ngagadong rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyurab/ de lta bu'i shin tu'ang

dris zhib par gyur to// khye'u de skyes pa tsam gyis la/nga gi khyim der rdzas ma lus par tshig bar gyur pa de lta bu ma byung ba dang/ red dngon gyi chung ma nyam thag pas khye'u de phrogs te khyim de las byung ngo//

gang gi tshe yang ma des khyim de dang rdzas ma lus par bsregs nas/ rang nyid zhi bar gyur pa de ni/ drod dbon gyinud mo gnas dan pa byed tshig pa'i zhig ral can zhig tu zhugs nas gos phyud sa la bting ste/

byis pa bsnyal nas tshaba'i dbugs ring po phyung ste/ ded dpon rjes su dran zhing du ba la zhugs so// kyi hud 'di lta bu'i phyin ci log kun tu gnas pa ni sdug bsngal lo// ded dpon rnacan gyi ban po dang bram/

dang / las byed pa'i skyes bu de rnams kyis rgud pa gang yin pa de mthong ba dang/ ubu chag kun kyang drag par 'gyur gyis 'dang zhes smras te/ skrag pas ded dpon gyi chung ma sus nas thams cad bros par/
[rz# ]@#/// gyur to// der mngag gzhug pa'i bu mo gcig gis bsams da// ngas ni dadadabon rnacan gyi khyim phun sum tshogs pa dum wa kun tulongs spyad nas/ da ded dpon gyi chung ma gnas

skabs 'di lta bur gyur pa na/ gcig bu spungs nas bdag bros pa gang yin pa ni bdag gis tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ de la gcig bu ded dpon rna can gyi chung ma'i gam na 'dug go/ ded dpon gyi chung
ma de'i nor thams cad mer bsregs pas nyi ma gcig gi bkra'i pa'i ng med par gyur to// de nas bu mo mngag gzhug ma ded dpon rna can gyi mdza' bo dang/ 'brel pa dang/ gnyen rnams gang yin pa de rnams/

sbyar kyi gam du song sa snas pa/ bzhin bzad s dag ded dpon sna can gyi chung ma gnas skabasa'adi lcabur gnas na de gso zhing bskyang bar mdzod cig dang zhes sbas pa dang/ gang gnas de rnams de gso zhing bskyang

gal zhugs pa de nyid kyi tshe/ de rnams kyi rigs la'ang sdug bsngal brgya phrag byung bar gyur pa dang/ de rnams kyis bsams pa/ ded dpon can gyi bu 'di ni shin tu'ang bkra mi shis pa zhig ste/ 'di 'dasod

nams ma yin pa'i stobs kyis ded dbon rna can gyi khyim gyi 'a byor pa shin tutsha tsho ba rnam par 'jig par gyur la/ de gal te lubu cag rnams kyis gso zhing bskyang ste/ yu bu cag rnams kyi khyim du'ang 'di lta

bu'i gnas skabs la byung bar 'gyur gyis/ 'di ltar rnam pa rnams cad du ming dang bzung bar rigs pa ma yin no snyam nas/ bumo mngag gzhugs de la smras b/ khyod phyi nas kyang nged kyi khyam du 'jug par

sa byed cig/ bu mo de ltar bar bcad pa dang/ bsams pa// de ni ded dpon gyichungam rnam po thams cad nas thams cad du grwa ba med par rgyugan/ 'di ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gzhan du na ngasan khur ba de blangs pa

min gyis// shin tu 'bad pa nyid kyis da bdag gis ded dbon gyi chung ma bskyang bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas gzhan gyi khyim du song nas glo ba'i las byed pa zhugs nas de glagang dag redapa thob pa des ded dpon
gyi chung ma dang/ bdag nyid dang/ khye'u gso ba lazhugs so// khyobu de ni shin tu'ang mi sdug pas ma sdug ces ming btags so// bu mo mngag gzhug ma de'ang las kyi dbang gis/ nyi ma re re zhing gla ri
ba thob dar gyur to// de nas srog chags gsum po shin tunyam nga bas gso bar rtsom pa dang/ ded dpon gyi chung mas bsams pa/ ngan khran po dang/ branamo dang/ las byed pa'i mi dang/ mdza' shes ma
nye du rnams kyis yongs su spangs nas/ gang bdag cung zad 'tsho ba 'di na bu mo ma dag gzhug ma 'di'i yon tan yin pas/ bdin da'i ma dang 'dra bar brtsi ba yin mod kyi/ des dus ji srid cig tu gcig
dug las byed mi nus te/ longs su skyo bar 'gyur la/ glaci tsam red pa des kyang 'tshog nus kyis/ des na ngas kyang rang gi las kyi nus pa nyams su myong bakhya zhing/ glu ma'i las bya'o zhes rnam par
bsams nas/ bu lo mang gzhug ma de dang lhan cig pa gzhan gyi khyim du zhugs te/ gama'i las byed par brtsams pa dang/ de ni shin tu'ang gzhon sha can yin pas bgros pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal
gyis yongs su gzir cing las su byed pa na yang dang yang du rgyal bar gyur to// de nas yongs su skyo bas dbugs tsha ba ring po byung nas/ ded dpon rna tan rjes su dran zhing ngu ba la/

zhugs te/ kyi hud 'di lta bu'i phyin ci log kun tu gnas bzhi sdug bsngal lo// gang grong khye lam lus ba'i mchog tu gyur cing/ dpal gyi phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong nas kyang tshor de nyid la grong
khyer thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur nas/ daltar gzhan gyi khyimadu gla mi'i las byed pa'i sdug bsngal dang/ yid mi bde ba chen po rjes su myong bar gyur to// de de ltar sdug bsngal gyis yongs su gabrir

cing du ba bltas nas bu mo mngago gzhug ma de tsho de 'a debs pa la zhugs te/ kyi hud tshe 'di nyid la ded dpon rnacan gyi chung ma las ka ga pa la sogs pa gos sna tshogs gyon pa dang/ lus drizhim pa'i ma

dog gi 'phreng ba du mas brgyan pa dad/ mkhur ba la rdzas dri zhim po du ma sbyar/ dri zhim pos bsgos pa dang/ lha'i bu mo bzhin du dga' ba'i tshul kyi skyed mos tshal du song nas/bran podang/ bran mo dang/ las byed/
lha pa'i mi dang/ mdza' bshes dang/ nye du rnams dang/ zas dang/ skom dang/ gosadang/ rgyan la sogs pa ci rigs par 'gyod pa yin na/ da ni sa de nyid du skyag langs shing lus la dri ma'i rdzogs
kyis gos pa dang/ bkres pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi lus dad yan lag la sogs pa thams cad yongs subaskams pa// ras brnyings shing des pa shin tudri ma can gyi dum bu'i rnying/

zhigabargya stong gi gnas su gyur pas/ rgyud pa'i phyogs bkab ba/ grong khyer pa thams cad kyi tha snyad du gyur nas/ gzhan gyi khyim du gla mi'i las byed pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba chen po
nyams su myong bar gyur to// khyama'o bsal ba'i phyin ci log/ kye ma'o longs spyod rnams kyi shin tu g.yo ba/ kye ma'o las rnams kyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i ng smos pa// dar gyi gosAsogs rab gyon
zhing rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan te/ sngon chad lha la bu mo 'dra// da ltar lam po che na ba khyam// skal ba de nyid zad gyur pas// lus la dri mas gos gyur cing// sadri nga yi dum bu gyon//

da ltar 'a di la dran gyur ba yin// sngon na lha yi bu mo ltar// skyes pa mig gi bdud rtsir gyur// daltar yid gs mo 'dra bar// mthong nas de nyid yid kyang skyo//sngonani nor gyis phunasum tshogs// grong
khyer dga' ba'i mchog gyur gang// de ni da ltar 'khongs pa bas// shin tu 'bongs pa nyid du gyur// sngon ni phun tshogs chen po la// dga' bas yongs su longs spyod pa// mngon sdug bsngal ldan pa

ma// gnas skabs dang bdes thob pa gyur// kyama'o 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ngan// kye ma'o phunatshogs mi rtan nyid// gang zhing de lta'i bder gyur nyid// sdug bsngal snod can nyid du gyur// de nas ded dpon

gyi chung ma de mngaga gzhug pa'i bumo dang lhan cig tu ril ba de nyid kyis gzhan gyi khyim du gla mi'i las byed pa la zhugs ban/ gzhon nu gzugs ngan gyi bsod nams kyi dbang gis nyin re bzhin grwa 'irid pa 'gro
par gyur to// jitsam na dus gzhan zhig gi nyi ma nub kyi bar nyin mo las byed du bcug kyang ci'ang red par ma gyur ba nas/ ji srid las kyang sus kyang byed du ma bcug pa dang/ ji tsam

naded dpon gyi chung ma mdag gzhag ma'i bu mo de dang lhan cig kun tu skyab rtsom ba/ yang da ni las kyang byed du ma bcug gis/ rnam pa thams cad du slong mo spyad par bya'o zhes bgros// de slong phor thog

nas slong mo spyod pa la zhugs so// gang gi tshe gzhon nu gyi sdug pa gro nus ba de'i tshe de la mas bu da ni khyod rang nyid slong mo spyod du song// longs spyod cig ces smras nas/ dog de la slong por byin pa dang/ de
slong por thogs nas tshong dus su zhugs pa dang/ debang pags pa 'i mdog shin tuganag pa/ gzugs shin tum sdug ba/ mtsham don pa po brgyad dang ldan pas smad pa 'a 'os pa mthong ba dang/ 'jig rten

ba rnams shin tu'ang sgrub kyis phyogs pa/da gyur nas thur du lta zhing 'grogo/ degang gi khyim gyi sgosong ba der de'i lus las dri shin tu mi zhim ba la byung ba dang/ mod kho na la sna khung gnyis bkag nas nigashing dang/ rdo dang

rgya mo la sogs su dardzogs te 'di nas myur dusong zhig ces/ grong khyer gyi mi gtsadag ba dan rdzob ba go shas lta bur lta zhing sbrid pa byed de/ gang dang gang du song ba de dang der shing dang/ rdo dang/ gyo mo la

sogs ba rnams kyis brdegs nas skyod par byed do// des slong mo gcig kyang rAd daram gyur cing/ shing dang/ rdo dang/ rgya mo la sogs pa rnams kyis brdegs pa des slong phor yang chag par gyur nas sme sngags

'don bzhin du ma'i drung du phyin te/ shin tu'adazhums par gyur pas ro des ba degs pa la zhugs so// de nas des mthong ba dang/ bung brdungs te smras pa// kyi hud bu khyod sdug bsngal te// su la'ang gnod pa ma byas

bar snying rje spungs ba gang zhig gis// 'di ltar brdogs pas khyod sdug bsngal// de nas gzhon nu mi sdug pas sgra dang bcas par rab tu dus te smras pa/ gang dang gang gi khyim sgorano// slong mo spyad phyir bdag

'gro ba// de dang de ni rgya mo rje// shing la sogs pas bdag la brdegs// de thos pa dang/ ded dpon gyi chung mas gzhon nu mi sdug pa'i mgul nas 'khyud de slabacas pas ngus te skyas pa/ nyes pa med kyang

shin ni// gang dag gzhan gyis 'jigs gyur pas// skye ba gzhan du bu khyod kyis// sdig pa mi bzad byas par nges// kyi hud khyodon sdug bsngal lo// bde ba kun dang rnam bral ba// shin tu mi sdug gyur pa na//
dman pa ji tsam mthong ko/ som ldan snying rjecis ma// kyi rgyud bcom zhing nyams pa bdag/ bu khyod kyi naslongs mo'i stod// bcom pas lus kyang bag yin te// slongs mo tsam gyis 'tshob yin//

ba dang ma dang bral ba dang// khyim gyi rten ni med gyur la// gang gis snying rje spangs nas ni// khyod kyi slong sdod de bcag gyur// rigs rgyud thams cad nyams myur cing// bshes dang gnyen gyis rnam spangs
pas bla mamadza' bo mgon gyuranyid// slongs snod su yis bcag par gyur// kyi hudabu sdug dman pa mthong nas ni// khyod las yis dpa' tshul bstan bar gyur// kyihud sngon gyi rang gi las kyis
ni bu sdug khyod ni gnod pas bcom par gyur// kyi rgud dman pa'i bu la dpa'o pa ni// gang gi snying la brtse ba me soms pas// rdo dang so bag rtsub pa lta bu yi// sems ldan ng
yin de ring khyod kyis sos// kyihud sgo brgyas bcom pa yi// sdug bsngal gyis gdungs slongs mo rgyu// ji ltar khyod la gzhan brdeg pa// 'jig rten yid n slob gyuraM// bkras dang skom pas longs
sgo dub cing// phun tshogs kun gyis rnam spangs pa// nad dang sdug bsngal rnams kyis gdungs// khyadalasu zhig brdeg par brtson// nyam thag dman pa'i bzhin gyis ni// du zhing b.las pas rab
gzird// lkog ma bskams pa mthong na dang// khyed lasu lis brtse ma byas// deng ni nad kyis zil mnan cing// sdug bsngal ldan pa brtsi spangs te// rigasabasnyams drags pas dkrugs pa ni//
gang gi bu khyod ji ltar brdegs// kyi hud gang gis khyod bkros ga zig/ slongs chos nyer bsags gyur pa li// bza'i ba chung du de yang deng// khyi dad lta yang spyod par byed// kyi dud bu sdug sngal

kyi ngan pa// nga ko dani ji ltar byed// sngon byas sdig pa byed pa bo// mi sdug las kyis bcom par gyug/ de ltar de rnam pa dums mya ngan byed bzhin du/ chag cing grugasad 'i ba nasakyikhum bu'i mdun du khrag
gis rgyun gyis yan lag gos pa'i bu la 'khyud nas/ phyag dar dang/ rgya mo dang/ mi gtsang ba dang/ tsher ma sogs pas khyab pa'i sar bsnyalato/ dolakhu dal bus lag pas mnye bar brtsam pa dang/ ]

0 jitsam na srid bar de na tshong dpon gyi khudang/ ded dpon gyi budang/ gzhan yang mtho zhing mtho ba'i bram ze dang/ khyim bdag rnams ka shi ka'i ras dang/ ba ku la'i ras dang/ ko dam pa'i ras dang/ dar

dang/ mon dar dang/ ras phra zhing 'an che ba sna tshogs gyon pa dang/ mgul gdub dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ rnam dang/ doshal dang/ sa go de sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ dri zhim pa'i ma

tog gi tshogs kha bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lus la spyad bab gro ba mthong ba dang/ de bdag nyid shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i gnas skabs la bltas shing bu mi sdugapa deb nga dbazhin dman pa la bltas nas/

dbugs tshab ring bo byung ste/ mchi ma dang bcas par shin tu dman pa tshigs gsang mthon por smras pa// thunatshogs du ma brgyas khyab pa// rin chen gyis ni rgya mtsho bzhin// rgyas ba'i rigs su gyur rnam rgyag//

bde ba'i mchog la rjes su spyad// rgud pa'i rtsa las byung bas na// phyag dar khrod kyi gsob gnas shing// zas ma rnyed pas bgres pa dang// shin tunyam ngas tshog r gyur// mya ngan rgya mtsho sdug bsngal
chu rlabs 'jigs// gdung ba'i chu srin mi bzo brgya yis khyab// dbul ba'achu klong rgya mtshor zhugs gyur nas// kye hud bcomazhes sgra ni rnam par sgrogs// rgud pa'i nusrani brgyayis kun tudakrug/
'khongs pa'i dba' rlung sa 'jid pa rab tu g.yo// nad ces 'jigs pa mi bzad nub pa yi// dbu ba'i rang bzhin chu bor zhugs 8ra gyur// sdug bsngal rdo gyod nad ni rtsub pas khyab// gdung
gru@#// kha sang ge'i sgra yis gang ba'i lug// mya ngan bya ni brgya phrag lhags gyur pa// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal gnas ni thob par gyur// bag med 'khrul pa bdag gis bsams pa//

sngon/ dam pa rnama'asbyin pas byin pag/da ltar 'di na skal ngan dman pa yi// dregs ldan gdong la rtag tu lta bar byed// dman dang skal ba dang bul rmongs dang ni// slongasamo spyod la songs mo mang du
ma byin b// gang des gnas khang tsam yang 'byor par ma gyur bgi/ dman zhing 'phongs pa'i mi bzad dug tu zhugs par gyur// nges pas stong kun gyis bkur ba'acham dang// yang dag phrad kyang
brnyas shing bsnyen bkur mabyas pa// gang des de ltar yu bubang b.rus par gyur pa dang// da ltar 'gro ba'i 'phongs pa'i snod du gyur ba yin// gang gis rdo dang bong ba yis// 'gro 'di bdag cag
! brdags gyur pa// sngon gyi rgyu bar legs bsdams pa// mang bo nges par brdags pa yin// gang gis 'jig rten pa rnams ni// kun nas yongs su snod gyur pa// sngon na bla ma'i skya ngo// yongs susbyos

rgyub rgyur par sa// gang badri brnyas pa'i sdug bsngal ni// shin tu mi bzad rjes thob pa// sngon chad bla ma'i skye golag/ yongs suparnyas bar rgyur bar nges// yu bus sngon gyi skyob la// glo bur lhags
la gos dag ni// ma byin pa ni gang yin pas// da ltar yu'u gos med gyur// gang gis gnyen bshes dang bral// mu bu sdug bsngal yun ring du// skye bo mang po du ba yi// nga ro 'don du bcug pa yin
[e]gang gis gsag ma rdos khyab pa'i// sagazhir yu bu nyal gyur pa// sna tshogs gos kyis bkab ba la// mal stan sngon ma byin pa yin// stanan rnam pa sna tshogs da/ dam pa rnams ni ma byin pas//

gong gis tshe ma mang po las// khyab pa'i sa yi gzhi la gnas// gang gis tsher mas khyab pa la// sa gzhir yubu rnams sgrub// sngon chad lham dang bzhon pa ni// bde ba skyes pa ma byin yin// nyi ma'i 'od
tshogs rnams kyis dbus kyi ma snang byas// phyag dar phung po gang gis 'di na yutu gnas// slong ba'i 'gro la khang pa'i gnas tsam phal cher ni// gnas kyi sar stsas des dar ma byin gyur pa yin///
gang gis da ltar yu bu shin tu kha bskums la// mgrin pa bsams shing kha dang 'gram pa yongs bsams pa// med la chu 'dod kun tu bltas nas sngon chad ni// de la bsil gyur cha ni spyin pa ma byin laM//
slong dang sbrag 'phongs pa la sbasam byin pa dang// gnyen dang mdza' ba bshesamin rtsa lag chogs la'ang min// legs par spudanas thams cad las kyi longs spyod pa// des na 'dir ni zas khral pu'u
yongs su 'khyam// srid pa gzhan du rnam pa mang bor nges par na// gzhan gyi don sgrub mkhas pa rnams la'ang ma tshang 'drubs// gang gi bde na da ltar 'jig rten dman pa'i yang// shin tu mtshang 'dru'i
gnas su lu bu nye bar gyur u dusanges par rnam mdadu// rigs kyis khangs shing drags nal// yon tan ldan pa'i ng brngags pas na// gang gis da ltar mi bgrad skad/ da 'khor pa'i rgya mtsho'adi
[p]@#// nyid du// nad rnams thams cad s la byed pa// sman sngonachadam byin pas// gang gis nad kyis sngon gdungs yin// pha ma khrus ma byas shing ma dang bshes la'ang min//
bla ma tshim par ma byas 'jig rten mgon 'a ba nga min// gang gis khrus dang btung bralabyabs skye gyur cing// 'di na sdug bsngal brgya yis skul bcom mgon med gyur// bkras dang skom pas yongs
dug cing// bza' dang bgo pa rnam bral ba/ rar dang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa// yu bu su zhig skyong bar gyur// 'jig rten du ni rnyed dka' ba// gang gis de ni srog ster cing// yu bus
gang gis bran dang ni// de ring su ya las byed bya// @mkho dbul ba sprug bsngal te// kye ma'o bsod nams ma byas nyid// 'di ltar rgyas pa'i grong khyer du'ang// mgon med lubu ji bzhinano//
bde dang lta ba'i gzhan dag dang/ ded dbon gyi chungam bgres pas yongs su gdungs ba'i yid dang/ bdag nyid smra sngags 'don cing gnasaso// ded dpon rna can yang rgya mtshon por gru zhig pa dang//

kyisdus dbang gis byis pa gcig dang lhan cig spang leb la 'jus te chu'i ga nas las brgal nas shin tu nyam thag pa chen pos slong mo rgyu zhing rgyal po'i pho brang gnyan ldan du phyin pa dang/ de dang phyi rol
gyi zhing gcig tumtshan mo gnas par gyur pa na/ de'ang zho shas 'tsho ba'i rgyas bu gzhan zhig gnas pa des de shes pa dang/ de 'disnyam du sems te/ ded dpon 'di shin tu rid pa dang/ 'dog ra'i

rdzas thams cad nyams pa dang/ khye'u gcig dang lhan cig 'ongs na de la khyim gyilo rgyus ji ltar brjod par bya/ yang na rang nyid kyis shes par 'gyur gyis snyam nas/ des de la lag pa bkru ba'i nu byin/
te/ ma bu'i snum 'a khur ga nyis byin no// de nas ded dbon rna can gyi lag pa stong pas khyim du'ajug par mi bya'o snyam nas/ ma shi snum 'khur gcig bzhag nas khye'u'i lag tu gtad cing/ gcig

khyad khyad du bgos te bza' ba'i don du khyab de dang lhag cig khros so// de nas nyi ma gnyis pa ma shab snum la khur de thogs/ shin tu rtsub cing lus nyam chung dang/ shin tu dri ma dwang bcas par gcig tsam

zhig gyon nas rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhugs te rang gi khyim du chas so// gzhon numi sdug pa'i ng namanangs pa'i dus nyidan bgres pa dang skom pas yongs su nyam chung ba'i bzhin dang/ skal ba ngan pa

bdag 'di na gnas pa ci zhig bya/ srog kyang dgos ba mad kyis/ song labadag legasod par bya'o snyam nas/ des ma lasmas pa/ ma bdag ni pha'i skyed mos tshuladumachizhes smras te/ rgyud mos tshal der mas
go ded dbon rna can zhang rang gi khyim dang nye bar byin pa dang/ ji tsam zhi gnas ringapo ma lon par dur khrod kyimadog can gyi sa'i chogs tsam lhag ma lus par mthong nas bltas te/ 'di ci zhig yin
zhes bsams nas/ gnas zhig pa'i phyad dum der zhugs pa dang/ gnas zhig pa'i phyed dum de na chung ma bran mo zhig dang lhan cig gnas la shin tu dman pas nyam chung ba'i bzhin dang/ ras kyi dum bu
0 (@#// drim can gyis zhi ngas skadapa'i phyogs bkab/ dri ma'i tshogs kyis lus la gos pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang kyi hud 'di ci zhig yin zhes sas te/ brgyal nas sa la 'argyal ba

dang / rlung grang mos phyog pas yun ring mo zhig nas dran pa red de/ de chung ma'i thad du phyin pa dang/ 'di ci zhig yin zhes sus te/ gsang mthon pos chonges 'debs pa la zhugs so// de nas chungams ji

sgoltar rgyur thos pa dang/ dbugs tshab ring por byus smras pa// ngas ni nges par sbyin pa'i zhing la bya ba ma byas pa gang gis 'ad ltar rgyud par gyur na/ da 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gang la skyabs su 'gro

rgyu bar bya/ su'i ba zhin la blta bar bya/ 'jig rten dman zhing gzhan pa la thugs brtse ba ni su zhig yin/ suzhig 'osan nga dbul ba'i rgya mtsho 'di las brgal bar bya/ su zhig 'ongs na rgud pa'i 'das 'di

lta bu bkru bar bya/ su zhig 'ongs na sdug bsngal gyi nu bo 'di las brgal bar bya/ su zhig 'ongs na dbul ba'i dgra 'di las rgyal bar bya/ su zhig 'ongasan sdug bsngal thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i shing dbyung bar bya/

su zhig 'ongs na sdug bsngal gyi zhing 'di rtsa nas gdon par bya/ su zhig bo ngas na bkres pa dang ston pa'i mche ba gcig sapa'i khanas ha ha zhes 'jigs pa'i sgra gcan gyis dbul ba'i srin po chen po med/
bar bya/su zhig 'ongs na dbul ba'i spyod 'di la sa rgyal ba bya/ su zhig 'ongs na bsus pa dang skom pa la sogs pas 'dag tu 'bar ba'i 'di gsad par bya/ su zhig 'ongs na rgud pa gsol ba'i glanga'o/

cha ba de ga dul bar bya/ su zhig 'ongs na nga'i sdug bsngal dpag med pa'i dug gim pa dang ldan pa'i dbul ba'i sprul chen 'di'i dug 'di dug med par bya/ su zhig 'ongs na nga'i thams cad 'phrogaba'i dbul
ba'i dpa' bo bzlog par bya/ su zhig 'ongasananga'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyis bsdams pa'i bdag nyid can gyi dbul ba'i lcags sgrog 'di gcad par bya/ su zhig 'ongs na nga'i dal ba'i btson pa 'di la

brgal bar bya/ su zhig 'ongs na nga' dbul sgo gu kha sa'adi dbye bar bya/ su zhig 'ongs na nga'i dbul ba gshin rje 'dis snang bar bya/ su zhig 'ongs na da'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di las brgal bar bya/ su zhig 'ong
nang ba'i dbul ba'i 'brog dgon b 'di las tharang byazhes bya ba la sogs snying rje zhing dman pa ladamigs pa'i tshig rnam pa du mas brjod cing tshong 'debs par gyur to// gnas skabs der sangs rgyas
ldan po dag rnams ni mimakhyen pad/ mi gzigs lam/ thugs sum chudab ma/ rnam par mi rig pa rtsa'angame mda' ba ni chos nyid yin pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston ka'i nyi mar kaltar
'od zer dmar ser brgyad pa dang/ nor bu rang la yon tan gyis yongs su spras pa sa/ kun nas dmar ser du snang ba dang/ nyi ma 'char khas phyiba'i pad+ma'i go sa'am lus pa'i tshogs dang/ ut+pal dang/

margad dang/ 'ja' tshon dang/ a mad pa'i grub da 'khyil ba dang/ mar gyi rgyun byug pa'i mang tshogs ltar shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyi tshogs bkra shis pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyis rab ba dpag tu med pa'i
tshogs rnam par 'jig cing/ rgashi srid pa'i gzeb 'dzin par mdzad ng/ dag ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa la mnyam par gzhag par stobasu gyur pas/ku mudadang/ dung dang/ kun dadang/
dris med pa'i dngul dang/ mu tig dang/ kha ba dang/ bab rtsa ba dang/ dri ma med pa'i glang po chos so bcag pa dang/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi phung po'i rtse na gnas pa'i mig stong ldan gzhu lha

klobu'i 'od zer ba khyil ba'i snang ba dang/ nam mkha' mthu' mad par zla ba brgya stong 'char ba ltar dkar zhing 'jam pa la/ snum zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba'i 'od 'a dom gang ba dang/ smin ma mdzes pa'i
! bar nas byung ba'i smina mtshams kyi mdzod spu rnam par mdzes ba dang/ pad+makha phyi ma thag lta bu'i zhal mnga' ba/ bskal pa grongs med pa gsum du phyag dang/ zhabs dang/ spyan dang/ yan lag
gi mchog dbu dang nyid kyi sha dang/ kong dang/ pad+ma gzhon nu lta bu'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sras dang/ btsunamo dang/ glang po dang/ rta dang/ shing rta dang// rgyan dang/ gos dang/ stan dang
mal stanadang/ nor du dod/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ dngos po thams cad dang/ rgyal srid la thogs pa yongs su gtong bas bla na med pa'i byang nubaspyi tshogs yongs sul pal par mdzad pa// chag
pa mam dbab/ bdud kyi stobs rnams rab tu bcom par mdzad pas ston ka'i zla ba dri ma med pa ltar shin tu dkar zhing gsal ba'i grags pa'i tshog sastong gi 'phrod bsabaskorab/ ri bo 'al 'char ka'i b+hA

ba'i 'od zer gyi rnyogs kyi lcag ma'i rmal pa'idakyil 'khor dang/ rnam 'char ka'i 'od zer gyi tshogs dang/ sbyin gyi tshogs las 'byung ba'i glog brgyastong dang/ brgya byin gyi glang po che'i mche ba/dung gis

bskyel ba dang/ sa 'og 'khrugs ba dang/ 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs rgyas ba dang/ dbang po gzhu 'od kyi rtse mo dang/ nor bu mar gad bcag pa dang/ zla bo rgyas pa dang/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang/ klu'i

dbang po'i gtsug gi nor bu dang/ brtu'i rdo ba dang/ tsam pa ka rgyus pa rnamad pa lta bu'i rtsod kyidakyil 'khor gyis sku la bskor bar gyurang/ nyid kyi thugs su chud pa'i ye shes kyi mas nyon mongs pa'i

tshad rmid sug bar mdzad pa// lha brgya stong gis zhabs la btud cing cod pan gyi gtugs pas nor bu dang/ gsar gyi 'od ze'i gyis shin tu mdzes shing brgyan pa'i zhabs dang bar dang ldan pa// glang bo chu gzhon nu'i

dkan dang/ rgyasgrags kyi khu ba dang/ bdad/ ston ka'i mtshams kyi sprin gyi tshogs dang (a sho ka dang/ le brgan rtsal ma rtog gi chun po dang/ zad s kyi mdog can gyi zhabs dang ldan pa// son mo srub cing

zangs ltar dmar ba'i zla tshes rgod pa'i lta bu'i dri mamed zhabs kyi pad+ma dad ldan pa/ srid pa'i 'khri shing bton pa/ gti mug gi mun pa ma lus par rnam bar bsal ba/ 'gro ba ma lus pa'i gnyen du gyur pa//
dkos pachad par gzhan la mnyis ba/ shin par gyur ba// la shes kyi spyod yul bsam gyis ma khyab pa// 'dod chags chen po'i dug rnams bsal ba/ dka' ba brgya stong gi bsnyenapa'i gtan tshogs/
bya@#/ dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsags shing shes rab kyis sras da gnyon mongs pa ma lus pa'i shing rtsa nas 'don bar mdzod// tshangs pa dang/ dbang po dang/ rta dbang
dang ma dang/ gshin rje dang/ bden bral dang/ chu lha dang/ rlung lha dang/ lus dran po dang/ dbang ldan la sogs bstanapa/ mngon par bstodad// thugs rje nadang ldan pa// 'jig rtenal
(banab zhugs pa// bsrung ba gcig pu ba/ nyag gcig dang 'bu/ zla med pa// gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la gnas par mdzod pa/ 'dul ba'i bsdus pa sa gsum phyagazhi/
la mkhas pa/ nu bo bzhi las brgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs legs par gnas pa// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms pa/ yan lag lnga spangs pa/ ya na lag lnga
las yang dag par 'das pa// yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ yan lag brgyad pa'i lam ston par mdzad
pa mardzagyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu lamakhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ phyogs bcur snyan pas yang dag par rgyas pa/ brgya phrag bcur dbang sgyur ba las khyad par du 'phag
pa rnams ni/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lanagasum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas/ su na'aphel/ su na'agrib/ sun gnod par gyur/ su na nyam ngabar gyur/ sun sdug

bsngal bar gyur/ sunangan song la gzhol/ su ni ngan sod la bab/ su ni ngan song lab/ suni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las nye bar gdon par bya/ sun deng ngag la khor ba'i srin pos rnam par ga tses pa

las thar pa'i bya/ su ni deng dus dbu la ba'i sbrul gyis dug pa las yongs su bskyab par bya/un der ngas zhe sdang gi mes lus kun nas bsags pa la dam pa'i chos kyi rgyur gyis dbang bskur bar bya/ su ni/

dang ngas gti mug gi mun nag gi nang du zhugs pa la/ rab rib med pa'i snang ba bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rtse mo la bskyon par bya/ sun ring bas sdugabasngal thams cad zad par byed pa'i lam gyi
mchog mnalag brgyad pa bstanapar bya/ sun dang ngas dbul ba'i sgo glegs mthu med pa gzhig par bya/ sun dang dus mi shes pa'i rab rib kyis mig mdongs pa la ya zhes kyi mgasAn rjes su sprin pa/

byasu'i dngangs lcags sgrog chen pos bcings pa las thar bar bya zhes makhyan pa'i gzigs pa 'jug go/ yang smras pa// rgya mtsho chu srin rnams kyi gnas// dus rlabs yol bar 'gyur yang srid// 'dul bar bya ba'i
sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las yol ba mad// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 'jig rten ma lus pa 'di dag gzigs par gyur pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi ded dpon ma can dbul ba'i sdug bsngal gyi 'dam rdzab tu shin tu mya ngan gyis zhing gnas par gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang yang thugs rje chen pos yang dag par bskul ba'i thugs dang
lhung bzed bsnams shing chos gos mnabs te/ gnyen ldan gyi spyad mos tshal nas mngon par byung nas gnyen ldan du gshegs so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam pa

gzigs rgyal po ba pho brang gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa dang/ de mthong nas rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ tshong dpon dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag ga dang/ grong khye'agyi skya bo rnams dang/
ded dpon rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 'di bsod snyoms la byon gyis/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i bsod snyoms ngas gang bar bya'o snyam nas/ srog chags brgya stong
dbab tu mad pa rnams bca' ba dang bca' ba rnams thogs te gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ded dpon rna can la rjes su thugs brtsapas
tshod dus kyi dbus na phyugs rab tu zhi zhing sku la trim 'char ka'i 'od pas lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'bar ba lta bu dang/ ston ka'i zla ba rgyas pa'i mtshams sprin gyis bskor blta bu dang/ lha'i skyed mos

tshal gyi dbag bsamachu shing lta bu dang/ gser gyi mchod sdong bdud rtsi'i gyu 'i shing gi yal gas brgyan pa lta bu dang/ gser gyi gzhong pa'i stang dutil mar gyi mar ma bltams pa lta bu dang/ rin po che'i

bo rin pocha phra mo sna tshogs kyis sdus pa lta bu dang/ dad pa'i rgyal dodo gsar gyi bad+ha'i rdul gyis gos pa lta bu dang/ sa srungs dal gyis 'bab pa'i pad+ma'i dngul gyis brgyan pa lta bu dang/ song ga ldongs

0 kyis phyugs pa lta bu dang/ sa thams cad kyi dpalagyi tshogs lta bu sku shin tul bar ba lta bu dang/ zhabasakyimathil gnyis shin tulegs bar byas pa'i shing rta'i 'khor lo nor bus spras pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/

lta bu dang/ zhabs kyi mthal rab tu gsar pa'i kha rgyas pa ltar shin tumanyen zhing gzhon sha chags pa dang/ zhabs kyi mthil dang labe'u drang/ g.yung drung dang/ dga' ba 'khyil ba dang/ chu dang ldeng

ngos kyis brgyan pa dang/ zhabs gnyis la zla ba rgyas pa'i dbyibs lta bu la zangs shin tu sbyangs pa lta bu'i mdangs dang/ 'od dang ldan pa'i se mo shin tudri ma med pa gcig tu gsal ba legs par skyes pa//

blta na sdug cing mtho ba lasanamo dag dang/ zhabs kyis mo'i thogala'i 'phreng bas spras shing mnyam ra med pa dang/ leg par skyes pa dang/ ring zhing zlum pa la yas pa'i so'amo dang/ 'jam zhing shin tu

mnyon la shang ba la ltar re ba/na bad ba'i rting dang gnyis dang/ dpal gyis 'bar ba'i nyi ma nam mkha'i dkyil na 'dug pa lta bur phyogs kyi dkyil la kho thams cod ma lus par kun tu snang bar mdzad cing/ deng dpon n can

gyi gnas zhig pa'i khyad dum der byon to// de nas yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsar btso ma bzhin du sbya pa'i'od 'phro ba lta bu dang/ mar gyi rgyan gyis blug pa'i ma'i tshig lta bu dang/
shin tu kha rgyas pa'i king shu ka dang/ a shoka dang/ ut+pal dmar po dang/ u rata da ka dmar po dang/ ga ra war dang/ a pa ka dang/ le brgan rtsi'i khu ba dang/ mtshamos kyi sprin dang/ glang po'i
@#/// dkan dang/ pad+ma dmar po dang/ glog brgya stong sa lhag pa'i 'od zer yang dag par b gyad par mdzad cing/ gang gis de'i ched kho na la gnas zhig pa'i phyad dum phyi dang/ nang du
bcas pa gsar bzhun ma ltar snang bar gyur pa de ltar mdzad do// d mthong nas ded dpon can gyis 'dicazhig yin snyam ste langs pa dang/ bcom ldan b des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par

gzigamtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa// chos zhes bya b.lus dang ldan pa lta bu dang/ mar gyi sbyin blugs blug pa'i rdzas thogs kyi me lta bu dang/ gsar bzhus pa'i khu ba'i mdangs dang/ kar ni kar dang/ gur

kum dang/ la brgan rtsi dang/ ldong ros dang/ ba ma dang/ ut+pal dmar po dang/ ston gyi mtshams kyi sprinadang/ rma bya'i lkog ma'i mdangs dang/ gsar dang/ mthing shun dang/ mtshal dang/ a ti nug da dang/ ku

ran da ka lta bu'i 'od kyidakyil 'khor gyis sku la bskor ba mthong ngo// mthong nas dad dbon rnacand shin tu dad pa chen po skyas te/ ngas bcom ldan das la ci zhig dbul thur bu snyam du bsams te/ bdag

rgyanyid kyi 'byor ba la bltas pa dang/ ma sha'i snam khur gcig po yod par mthong ba de blangs te/ chung ma la smras po//bzang mo ngas ni lag pa stong pas nga khyim du 'jug par mi bya'o snyam nas/ ma sha snyam/
bakhur gcig khyer to'o sa ta/ bcom ldan 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs 'dabang yon gnas kyi dam pa/ dman po dang zhan pa rnams la rjes su thugs brtse ba yin la/tshad la

sbyin pa'i sa bon nyung zad tsam zhig btab pas kyang dbul ba'i sdug bsngal rtsa nas 'a byin par mdzod pa yin na/ bcom ldan 'das de la ngas ma ka'-i snyam 'khu 'di dbul bar bu 'a ma/dzes smras pa// rje
sras legs kyis de ltar mdzod cig/ 'di tsam gyi dag pa'i rtsa bas kyang 'khor ba na bde ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang/ ded dpon gyis bsams pa/ ma sha'i snam la khura' di ni na chub n

pa yin la/ da ni grong khyer 'di nyid du de lta bu zhig tu gyur nas/ da 'di lta bu'i ngan pa rgyal po dang/ blon po dang/ bram ze dang/ khyim bdag dang/ grong khyer gyi skye bo dang/ ded dpon rnams kyis gal ta mthong
bar ji ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya/ gzhan dun lo mas dkris pa dbul bar bya sta/ de ltar nani 'di rnams kyis shes par mi 'gyur ro snyam rang gi gnas zhig pa'i phyed dum gyi nang du
zhugs te/ lo ma btsal bar bsams pa dang ci'ang rnyed par ma gyur to// de nas ded dpon de shin tu'ang yi mug par gyur te/ kyi hud 'di lta bu'i sal ba zhan pa ni sdug bsngal lo zhes dbugs

tsha ba ring po phyung nas/ de'i go ba gnas zhig pa'i phyagadum de nas byung ste/ dad pa chen po'i shugs kyis mtha' snum kha khur po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi lhung bzed du tshul/
phul nas kyang zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te/ smon lam byed pa'i brtsams pa/ bcom ldan ba das sbyin par bya'i chos yongs su phul ba'i dag ba'i rtsa ba 'dis skyo ba 'di nyid nas bzung ste/ nyin/
[4s]byamya// zhag pa cig tsam yang dbul por nam du'ang ma gyur cig/ shin tu phyug pa dang/ nor dang yo byad yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs la/ ded dpon na can gyis btud pa tsam de nyid kyi rjes thogs khon la shin tu zhan cing rid pa de ma snang bar gyur nas/ sngon gyi mdog mdas lcabu/
dang ldan par gyur to// de nas ded dpon natsa na gyis smon lam btabanas langs ba dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs slar bazhud de gnyen ldan gyi skyed mos tshal du gshegs

ts+tshA so di nas ded dpon can ba nyan ldan gyi chod dpon dang ded dbon rnams kyis ngo shis par gyur to// de nas der ded dpon zhig gis/ grong khyer pa de rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// nga dang khyed rnams
kyis ded dbon rna can rgud par gyur ba la btang snyoms su la rtog pa ni rigs pa ma yin no// de nas ras gcig bting lta yang smras pa/ grogs po dag mang pos ni cig gcig legs par gdon nus kyis/
gcig gis na mang po ma yin pas de la gang gis ma der yongs su gtang ba de ras 'di'i stod du'og cig ces smras pa dang/ du ma zhig gis mgul gdub dang/ gdu bu dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ rdo
shal dang/ so mo dang/ lag gdub la sogs pa rgyun ba rgyastong dpag tu med pa zhig byin pa dang/ ka shi'i ras dang/ du gu la'i ras dang/ dar dang/ son dar la sogs pa shin tuphra zhing

[o/]rags che ba sna tshogs pa'i gos thung brgya stong dang ga tu med pa byin te/ de la skad cig ma de nyid du gos dang/ rgyan gyi phung po chen po zhig tu gyur to// de nas ded dbon rnacan gyis 'byor pa de labartags
nas chung ma la snas pa/ bzang go zhing gshin pa la sbyin pa'i sa bon btab pa'i myu gu 'thon pa la ltos/ de'ang dga' ba dang mgur gyi ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs
de la phyag byas nas/ rgyun dang gos de rnams gnas zhig pa'i phyad dum der zhugs par brtsams so// khye'u mi sdug pa'ong ba'i skyodamos tshal der zhugs nas bkas pa sa gdungs pa'i yid dang/
rang nyid mchog tu gzugs ngan pas 'di ltar yang dang yang du mya ngan byed cing bsams pa// shin tu sdig pa'i las byed pa dang/ mchog tu sdugabasngal ba'i skal ba can/ shin tu gzugs ngan pa/
mthong n bgAmi shes pa/ nga gson pas kyang dgos pa ci zhig yod de/ bdag nyid kyis srog dbul bar bya'o snyam nas/ sgyid lug pa'i yid kyis mod khon la/ pa la'i shing gi yal ga'i rtse mor 'dzeg
ba dang/ shing gi yal ga cha gnas shing gi yag dang lhan cig tu ltung ste/ tshong bas nyam thag cing 'dug go/ bar skabs der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasal ni mi mkhyen pa 'am/ migakhrigs pa
ma thugs su mi chud pa 'am/ rnam par mi'i ga pa ci'ang mi mnga' bas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis sangs rgyas kyilha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ khye'u
ga/ mi sdug pa de ltar sdug bsngal ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang thugs chen pos mang dag par bskul te/ skyedamos tshal des rdzu 'phrul gyis gshegs nas nyid kyi sku las 'od zer 'a gyad pa/
mdzad do// bkus pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal de'ang rgyun chad par gyur nas de'i chod las ba dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs bsalar byob brgyasong dpag tu med par
h+phe mthong ba shin tu rnyed par dka' ba/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi snang bas 'bar bar byas pa'i sku dang ldan pa mthong// de mthong ba'i mod la bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas

g+ha rnam par gzigs la dad pa chen po skyas te/ des kyang yung bsags pa gos kyi dum bu khru gang gyon te 'dug pa las/ des dad pa skyes pa'i shugs kyis lug las phud de/ de dang karani la ma rtog gachug
dad ba shugs chen pos 'phral du bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi skul gsol lo// debad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegrwa ba dgrakhacom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyisadz+dzaltar gos kyi

dum bu de da bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad dang ldan patsam du gyur nas sku lagasol ba dang/ ma tog kar ni kab de dbu'i steng du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam du gyur nas gdugs ltar gnas de ltar byin gyis brlabs
so/ demazod dang/ rtsomi sdug pa shin tu'ang dad pa chen po skyasanas/ de dad pa chen po'i shugs kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag byas te/sgragasod
[z/]chen pos smon lam khyad pa/ brtsams pa// rkang gnyis mchog gyur sbyin pa ni// 'di yin 'di nas gzugs ngan nyid/ deng nas brtsams te legs glangs nas// bdag ni gzugs bzung nyidathob shog/
gsar gyi mdog can gos rnams ni// gser sbyangs lta bu khyon ba dang// bdag gi lus dang kha nas kyang// tsan dan ut+pal dri ltar shog/ gser gyis gasnang gyur cing// 'jig rten kun la yid du 'ong//
nad kun las ni rnam thar cing// bstan bcos don kun pha rol phyin// kun tu nga nor dang yang dpa/ldan/ sdug bsngal thams cad rnam spangs pa// kun mchog kun gyi bya bar 'os// rgyan kun gyis
rnam brgyan shog/ rdzogs sangs don kun grub gyur cing// sems can rnams la mas gzin shog/ dri med yon tan dbal kun ldan// bde zhing rdzas kun ldan la shog/ de nas smon 'a de byas
pa dang/ dus mnyam pa nyid la/ khyabu mi sdug pa'i gzugs mi sdug pa 'phral du mi snang bar gyur te/ mdzes pa// blta na sdug pa// lus kyi pags pa'i mdog gsar gyi mdog can gyi
gzugs bzang bar gyur to// 'phral du de la nam mkha' de las gser gyi mdog can gyi gos byung bas lus la bu 'dab cing rin chab 'i dbu rgyan dang/ rnam la sogs pa rgyan gyi khyad par rnams byung bas
brgyan to// lha rnams kyis kyang matog kar ni kar dang/ ul dang/ tsam pa ka dang/ pad+madang 1 ku mu da dang/ mnar ba la sogs pa ma tog gi char chen po phab pa dang/ lhakhItsan dan dang//
a ka ru dang/ gur kum dang tam la'i lo ma'i phyi ma'i char phab cing/ 'di skad ces kyang sbas so// e ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa la bskrun pa'i sbyin pa'i sa bon khyad pa/3/

nakyi myu gu yang dag par byung ba yin no// lha'i me tog dang phyi ma'i char yang pus mo nub pa tsam dusbyad mos tshal de thams cad du phab nas gnas so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par
gzigs skyod mos tshal de nas mngon par byung ste/ gnyen ldan gyi rgyud mos tshal du gshegs so// de nas ded dpon rna can gyis kyang chung ma la smras pa// bzang mo gang zhig skyes nas ded la 'di lta
bu'i chung pa byung bar gyur pa 'a bu de ga song// des smras pa// de slad mos tshal du 'gro'o zhes zer ro// des smras pa/ dad nyid du yi mug pas bdag nyid gsod par 'gyur gyis/ dor myur du bzhud cig/

'i ded dpon rna can gyis smras pa// yu bu'i bu'i minganoraM/ gzugs na ji lta bu zhig yod/ des smras ba/ rje'i sras shin tu blta na mi sdug bas mi sdug ba zhes bgyi'o// de nas deng dbon de shin tu myur ba'i
gom stabs kyis rgyud mos tshal de song ba dang/ gzhon nu mi sdug pa lus gsar gyi mdog can shin tu rin che ba'i gos sar po phra ba lus la gyon pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// mthong na yid
'khrog pa// lha'i bu gzhon nu bzhin du dpal gyis mchog tu 'gor bar mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang a ma'o gang la 'di lta bu yod pa/ la don skyes bu skal ba dang ldan pa'o zhes zer zhing

gzhon nu la smras pa/ khyi bu khyod su gi bu yin/ des smras pa/ rna can zhes bya ba ded dpon zhig yod de/ ngani de'i bu yin no// ded dpon can gyis bsu nas ba/ gakhon na la ngas ni nga bstings so sum dusams

shad shin tu ltad mo skyes te/ mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing gzhon nu de la yang sasaso// kyi gzhon nusu'i bu yin ba bden bar sbos shig/ mi sdug pas snyas pa// 'dir ma zhigabartagapar bya ste/ nga ni bden pa/

nyid du ded dpon rna can gyi bu yin no/ des smras ba/ a ma'o gzhon nu 'di ning la shin tu'ang bstis so snyam nas smras pa gzhon nu ngas ni shin tume sdug go zhes thos nas/ khyod ni gzugs bzang na de thabs
gang gis khyod gzugs bzang bar gyur/ gzhon numi sdug pa sa dga' bas mig gdangs te sgra gsang chapos sas pa// dang ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal med// sems ni yongs su gdungs pa na// shing gi pa laga'i

rtsala'adzegs te// bdag gis rang nyid lhung bar byas// lhong nas yan lag smad pas gzig bdag ni rgyal ba nyid du gyur// sems med dbugs nam thon pa la// skad cig tsam zhig rnam par gnas// de nas rnamagakhrig

rdzogs sangs rgyas// sems can rnams la rjes brtse ba// mgon po bdag la thugs brtsagi phyir// skyed mos tshal ni 'dir byon to// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang zhing// pags pa gsar ni sbyangs pa 'dra//
btso ma'i gser 'dra'i 'od rnams kyis// phyogs bcu'i dga' gangs par mdzad// de sku'i 'od zer rab bsal bas// bdag la reg pa tsam gyis na mnyamatshad bdud rtsi'i rgyun kyis mi/
'di dag thams cad tshig pa'i mdzad// bkus skom ltung ba'i sdugabasngal dang// ma lus bdag gi bkami shis// de yi mod la zhi gyur cing// bdag ni sems kyang red dar
[M/ ]gyura'adicin zhes phyogs bcas pa// bdag las de tshe thub bani/ shin tumadangs bzang 'grob ya/ 'phunasum tshogs pa'i gnas rgyur mthong// bdagagis blta bya ban chen de/ mgon
blopo dbal gyi mchog gis ni// phyogasa rnams rgyas par gsal mdzad ng// mthong nasabadag sngar dad par gyur// de nas rab dga'i sems kyis su// bdagagi gos kyi dum bu ni// lung bsabatsosar
du nyid la/ mchog tu dga' bas phul bar gyur// ka'anika yi me tog gcig/ bdag gis brtul zhugs bzang de la// gtor ba de yang thub ba yi// stang du gdugs bzhin gnas par gyur//
des kyang dga' zhing mgu ba yi// zhabs gnyis 'ani rab btud de// shin tu dar ba bskyed pa yi// bdag gis smon lam 'di byas so/ mgon po sbyin pa 'di yisan// da nyid bdag gzugs nar//
yongs su spangs shing gzugs bzang ba'ang// srid pa'i rgya mtshor thob pa ngashog/ gser gyi mdog can gos rnams kyang// gser sbyangs lta bu gyon pa dang// bdag gi lus dang kha dog dang/ tsan/
! ngan ut+pal dri ldan shog/ bdag gis smon lam de dag ni'adon byas par gyur pa na// gzugs dang kha dog 'di 'dra ba// yid du 'ong ba byung bar gyur/ gos ni rin thang cher gyur pa/ 2sar
0 zhing shin tu 'amal dag/ bdag gi lus la 'phral dun// skad cig de nyid dag la byung// nam mkha'i ngos nas lha rnams kyis// ma dog dang ni tsan dan dang/ a ka ru dang Sha cha 'ad// aka chog
ba 'di phab shu/ ca co nam brtan po dang/ yid 'phrog pa yi rnga brdung zhing// sangs rgyas bcom ldan phyag 'tshal zhes// bya ba'i sgra sbyabar gyur// deng ni dgab 'di bas pas/ bdag gi gabras/
'di dag dang// gsang 'dra'i mdogs 'di 'ongs// 'di'i byung bar gyur ba yin// de nas ded dpon rna can gyis de skad thos pa dang/ 'phral du da pa'i shugs kyis ba spu'i bu ga nas da ldang bar gyur
cing / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs la yang dang lang du phyag 'tshal zhing/ mchog tu bar dga' ba skyes pa dang/ bu gzugasabazang ba la mig mi 'dzums pa'i bltas de smras pa// khu tshur shog/
yu bu 'dang/ de nas gzhon nu bshugasabazas kyis bdagan la 'di las skyes pa yin no snyam nas shin tu gus pa dang bcas pas pha'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas 5b.legs par bye sa sa pa pa dang

lhan ci'i khyim du chas so// de'i tshe lha'i dbang bo brgya byin lha'ishes pas logau tu 'jug par gyur pa yin pas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ded dpon sna can 'dinasas rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lhag par bya ba

byas pa yin na/ de rtsa khyim na gnas pan rigs pa ma yin no snyam nas/ lha'i bu las sna tshogs pa la smras pa/ las sna tshogs pa song la/ ded dpon rna can gyi khang pa rin po che sna bzhi las gru ba'i
rnam pa gyisang shig// de nas las sna tshogs pas brgya byin gyi tshigamanyan te/ skad cig ma de nyid la rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du bongs nas 'a'i bon sna bzhi'i pha gu las brtsigs shing
ka ngas bteg pa/ khyams mtho zhing mdzes pa skar khung dang/ sgo khang dang/ sa na lcog gis legs par bkod ba'i yan lag can dang/ gdung phran la spang leb legs par bkodapa/ shin tu mthong

ba khang pa thur dazhi pa shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i rta babs kyis sgo 'ba' mdzes pa dang/ ston ka'i sprinamadzes pa dang shugs kyi phung po dang/ zla ba'i 'od zer dang/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar dkar bgadugs pa ste

klu rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan bsgreng ba dang/ mu tig gi chun 'phyang dang/ gos kyi chun 'phyang gi tshogs po gsapa/ grong khyer gyi mchogam lus pa 'bamadzes par byed pa'i gnas su gyur pa// shin tu 'ang 'a nga'i

gsar gyi spang bzhin can gsa' du mngon par 'byung ba'i a nu'i rgyan byas shing/ yan lag brgyad pa'i chus yongs sugang ba'i bum pa bcud kyis sgo na bar gnas par byas pa// dang ga tu midang waMrang dang/
klob b+hum dang/ shel dang/ sdug dang/ mthon ka dang/mthon ka chen po la sogs pa'izhi pom rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing/ gter du mas yongasasu khes pa/ rin po ma'i rdzing dang/ yo byad kyis ro sa
'u'ong pa'i bar pa ba mchog gcig byas so/ de nas ded dpon rnacal khyim lo pa dang/ de'i chung ma dga' zhing mgu la 'dus bas gsar gyi'al ba las chubyin te smas pa/ rje'i sras khyed kyi bsod nams
[s/ ]kyi mthus 'ga' zhig gis 'di lta bu'i khang pa'i mchog dus so// de nas ded dpon rna can gzhal yas bang de la mngon par lta zhing mchog tu ga la ba dang ni gdeg skyed/ rgya lha29 4
la zhin tu'ang dad pa skyes te (ba spyalta ba dang/ thal mo spyi bor ba de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcos pa dang dag pa rdzogs gas pa'i sangs rgyas pa sam gsal bu pa [']da
bzhib kyi nor bu rin po che bso nams zhing bla na med pa la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smos te/ phyag byas nas rab tu dga' bas rgyus pa'i bzhin dang skyas pa a ma'o ston nang b+hA na shing [} ]9 pa sa
cad rab gas pa// gang du bdag gis sa bon btang// 'bras bu de nyid stsol bar mdzad// sbyin pa ngan ngon de tsamani// legs par sbyar ba kun phul ga/ nyams dga' m zos pa'i gsa' dang ni//
cherang bzhin khyim 'di gang// rtsig pa'i lhag ma lus pa tsam// bdag khyimamya ngan 'phral byed pa'i// sprin dang nges par bul ba yi// zla ba'i khur ltar dka' 'di gang/ byama' sa rdzul bu ga yi//
skar khung ldan pa'i lus yang gang// rin chen ba mchog du ma yi// skar khung ldan pa' khyim 'di gang// khros pa'i khyis khyab tshor ma dang// mi gtsang tshogs kyi gzungs de ga khyim 'di
sngon chad de 'dra lag zhichen gsags 'di gang yin mtshar// sbrul gyis bor ba'i pags ring ni// 'phung ba'i gos kyis khung de gang// phra ba'i gos ni phun tshogs bkra/ ya'aphung/
[o/]@#/ (ba 'di gang// khyimos bsdus pa'i rus gong na// dkar bos gsalabakram khyim de gang// dri zhimam tog bzang po ni// sil mas nye bar mdzes 'di gang// mya ngan mchi
[B?]ma'i rgyun gyis ni// rtag tu brlan pa'i khyim de gang// dri zhim glatsitsan dan gyi// chuyis chag chag btab 'di gang// me lces tshigacing lnga rnams kyis/ mi gtsang rta babs can de gang//
zlogaser dang 'an chanamu tig mchog/ 'thung bsanya ba'amadzas 'digang// spang leb chag pa'i sgo las ni// bsgribs pa yin khyim de gang// shel las bsgrubs pa'i sgo legasan// sgo 'phar ldan pa 'di'i

gang tar na yun nyams pa nya// 'jig dumakhyad nga'i khyim de gang// nor bu'i rang bzhin ka dag dang// sgo khang gis ni brgyan 'di gang// smre sngags sgra yisakron tu yang// khyab pa'i bzhi mdo de ni gang// rol

mo'i sgra dang gling bu yi// skad dang yang dag ldan 'digang// sngonani thod pa'i tshigs dang ni// phyag dar phung bos khongs de gang// ni chen phung po mdzes pa rnams// nang du bsags pa 'di ni gang// lcog dad
rgyu gdung bran bkod pa rnams// ma lus lhags par gyur te gang// nang na mthon ka chen po dang// shel ni'in chen pazhag 'digang// stand bralaba'i so phagani// gcig la brtan par gyur te gang// sna
tshogs gos ga logs nang tshangs can// brgya phrag dang zhi ldan de gang// sngonan gsogams khyab gyur pa'i// sa yi limal de gang// rgya chen dar ldan dpalagyi gi/ nyams su dga' ba khri 'di gang//
rtsas g.yogs pa la lastanani// padag la rab tu rtsub de gang// shing bal yang zhing 'jam pa bstan// deng rab yid du 'ong ba gang// khyim na khyi yis gang gyur pas// shin tu dri ka shisade gang//
gzhalal khang na yid 'onganga'i drizhim dam bsabasgos 'di gang// sngon du khang pa'i phyi nangan// gos dang pa snal mas khyab de gang// sna tshogs rin chen mchog gyur pas/ rnam smras
nyams dga' 'deni gang// khra yisamigatsang ri mo ni// dkar po bsgyur ba 'phyang de gang// rgyan sna tshogs mu tigag/ dra bas nye bar mdzes 'digang// sdug bsngalatshig smo lag pa dag/
bsgrung pa'i khang ba de ni gang// dri mad gdugs dang ba dan dag/ bsgreng bas brgyan par gyur 'di gang// skyob pa bsod nams shing gyur pa// gang zhig khyon bsaM bdag dang nyid// dbul ba'i rgyu
mtsholas sgrol pa// mgon po de la phyag 'tshal 'ako/ gang zhig byon pa sa bdag cagan// thun tshogs 'di 'dra thob gyur pa// thams cad mkhyen pa rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten mgon la phyag
'tshal lo// rnam par rgyal bzhin bsam yas pa'i/ yon tan dpag med rnams kyis brgyan// mang dag byon nas deng bdaganyid// gzhal las khang mchog thob bar mang/ ston pa de ni legs
red pas// tisi'i rtse mo ba sprang pa lta'i// ston ka'i zla ba ltar dka' ba'i// gzhal yas khang mtho thob par gyur// de nyid grong khyer 'di'i mgonamang// dbul ba'i sdug bsngal can gyur nas//
shargya// de nyid kun gyi mchog gyur cing// noratshe dang ldan par gyur// sa bon de da btabatsan rgyas/ 'bras bu 'phral du sel ba po// 'jig rtenu mchogagyur khyab bdag
da/ su zhig gsan mchod 'os min/ de nas ded dpon rna can dad pa 'a shugs drag pos sems kyi rgyud brlan pa dang/ bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das byon nas nga la 'byor pa 'di lta bu thob par
mdzod ba yin ng sa/ dayang ngas dang po nyid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs khang pa 'dir spyan drangs lo/ nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pa la bshes gtsang
dbul bar bya'o snyam nas dus ba chen pos de bzhinagashigs pa rnam par gazigasanyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa khang ba'i nang du spyan drang sde/ zhal zas ro brgyapan zhag bdun gyi bar du
dras nas zhabs gnyis la phyag byas tre/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byadathams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas par gyur to// de nas de ma gzhan zhipid la zhing bsrung ba'i skyes bu zho shas 'tsho ba
zhig bos 'bras chan gyi them po zhig byin pa dang/ de thogs te zhing lasal chas pa na/ lam gyi bar zhig tu zho shas 'tsho ba'i skyes bu de ngag bas gzhan zhig 'asaded dpon n can gyis mo
